src: जब मैं घर गया तो मैंने हर एपिसोड देखने की कोशिश की.
mt: When I got home, I tried to watch every episode.
ref: When I got home I tried to watch every episode.

src: जिम ने बॉब से अपने किरदार का लोकप्रिय जुमला कहने को कहा.
mt: Jim asked Bob to say his popular catchphrase.
ref: Jim asked Bob to say his character's catch phrase.

src: लीटा ने उन्हें कहा कि उसके पास करने के लिए काम था.
mt: Leta told him she had work to do.
ref: Lita told them that she had chores to do.

src: उसने एक फ़ुटस्टूल निकाला और उस पर पैर रखा.
mt: He pulled out a footstool and put his feet on it.
ref: She got out a footstool and stepped on to it.

src: जब वह बात कर रही थी, तो कुत्ते ने किचन में सभी जगह कीचड़ फैला दिया.
mt: As she was talking, the dog spread mud all over the kitchen.
ref: While she was talking, the dog dragged mud all over the kitchen.

src: एक दिन हेक्टर घर पर कॉफ़ी तैयार करने का फ़ैसला करता है.
mt: Hector decides to make coffee at home one day.
ref: One day Hector decides to brew coffee at home.

src: जब वह उससे मिली, तो उसने उसे लंच पर अपने साथ बैठने के लिए बुलाया.
mt: When she met him, he invited her to lunch with him.
ref: When she met her, she invited her to sit with her at lunch.

src: जब उसने पुरस्कारों के दौरान अपना नाम पुकारते सुना तो वह चौंक गया.
mt: When he heard his name called out during the award ceremony, he was shocked.
ref: When he heard his name called during awards he was shocked.

src: लॉरी ने एक लंबी चमकीली ड्रेस पहनी थी.
mt: Lorrie wore a long, brightly colored dress.
ref: Laurie wore a long sparkling dressed.

src: उसने महसूस किया कि वह एक ख़ूबसूरत पुराना ट्रेन डिपो था.
mt: He felt that he was a beautiful old train depot.
ref: He realized it was a beautiful old train depot.

src: यूनिफ़ार्म पहनने के बाद बॉब को फ़िश बर्गर बनाने का काम मिला.
mt: After donning a uniform, Bob was given the job of making fish burgers.
ref: Bob got to work making fish burgers after donning the uniform.

src: उसने बात सुनी नहीं.
mt: He didn't hear her.
ref: She did not listen.

src: वह एक ख़ूबसूरत आर्किड के सामने बैठता है और ड्रा करना शुरू करता है.
mt: He sits in front of a beautiful orchid and starts drawing.
ref: He sits in front of a beautiful orchid and begins to draw.

src: वह उन्हें ज़ैतून के तेल में तलता है.
mt: He dips them in olive oil.
ref: He fries them in olive oil.

src: उसने फ़ैसला किया कि वह वहां की यात्रा करेगी.
mt: She decided to travel there.
ref: She decided that she would travel there.

src: फ़ुटपाथ पर चलते समय, वह फिसल गया और अपने घुटने को बुरी तरह फाड़ लिया.
mt: While walking on the sidewalk, he slipped and badly bruised his knee.
ref: While walking on the sidewalk, he tripped and busted his knee open.

src: सभी कुछ चमकदार और नया लग रहा था.
mt: Everything looked shiny and new.
ref: Everything looked shiny and new.

src: मैं हैरान था कि मुझे एक कार ने टक्कर मारी जा रही थी!
mt: I was surprised that I was hit by a car!
ref: I was shocked that I was being hit by a car!

src: जब उसने ख़ून देखा तो वह घर भाग गई.
mt: When she saw the blood, she ran home.
ref: When she saw the blood she ran home.

src: जब भी वह ज़ोर से पढ़ता था तो उसकी क्लास के बच्चे उस पर हंसते थे.
mt: Whenever he read aloud, his classmates laughed at him.
ref: Whenever he read out loud his classmates laughed at him.

src: उसने फल पर बहुत सारा पैसा ख़र्च दिया और काफ़ी समय उसे तैयार करने में.
mt: He spent a lot of money on the fruit and a lot of time preparing it.
ref: She spent lots of money on the fruit and lots of time preparing it.

src: बदकिस्मति से उसने इसे तोड़ दिया.
mt: Unfortunately, he broke it.
ref: Unfortunately she smashed it.

src: हमारा अच्छा तालमेल था और हमने साथ में अच्छा समय बिताया.
mt: We had a good rapport and we had a good time together.
ref: We had a good understanding and had a good time together.

src: वह अक्सर अपनी पंक्तियों को दुहराता था.
mt: He often repeated his lines.
ref: He rehearsed his lines often.

src: सहपाठी अक्सर उसके काम को ख़तरे में डालते हैं.
mt: His classmates often put his work in danger.
ref: Classmates often put her job in jeopardy.

src: एक दूसरी कार ने स्टॉप साइन पार किया और हमसे टकरा गई.
mt: Another car ran a stop sign and hit us.
ref: Another car ran a stop sign and crashed into us.

src: वह गाते हुए घर के चारों ओर फिरती है.
mt: She sings as she walks around the house.
ref: She goes around the house singing.

src: उसने दिमाग लगाया क्योंकि उसने एक खुले आदमी को खोजने की कोशिश की.
mt: He tried to find an open man.
ref: His mind raced as he tried to find an open man.

src: वो कुछ देर मुझे घूर रहा था.
mt: He was staring at me for a few seconds.
ref: He was staring at me for a while.

src: अपने डॉक्टर की नियुक्ति पर, उन्होंने निराशा व्यक्त की.
mt: "I was disappointed with my doctor's appointment," he said.
ref: At their doctor's appointment, they expressed discouragement.

src: एक दिन, कैथरीन ने फ़ैसला किया कि वह एक कर्लिंग के अभ्यास सेशन पर जाएगी.
mt: 1 day, Catherine decided to go to a curling practice session.
ref: One day, Catherine decided she would visit a Curling practice session.

src: फ़्रांसिस लाइसेंस पाने के लिए बहुत मेहनत से पढ़ाई करता है.
mt: He works very hard to get his French license.
ref: Francis studies very hard to get a license.

src: जैसे ही सारे डांसर ने मंच पर आकर शोभा बढ़ाई वह बहुत सुंदर था.
mt: As soon as all the dancers came on the stage and added beauty, it was very beautiful.
ref: As the dancers graced the stage it was beautiful.

src: मैंने जल्दी से ब्रेकफ़ास्ट खाया और क्लास में जाने के लिए चलना शुरू किया.
mt: I quickly ate breakfast and started walking to class.
ref: I quickly ate breakfast and began to walk to class.

src: अगले दिन स्कूल में, गैरी लिसा को हॉलवे में मिलता है.
mt: The next day at school, Gary meets Lisa in the hallway.
ref: The next day at school, Gary sees Lisa in the hallway.

src: वह एक रात की क्लास में दाख़िला लेता है और बहुत मेहनत से पढ़ाई करता है.
mt: He enrolls in a night class and studies hard.
ref: He enrolls in a night class and studies very hard.

src: एक दिन उसने एक साधारण, लेकिन बढ़ियां क्वालिटी वाला, कैमरा ख़रीदा.
mt: 1 day he bought a simple, but good quality camera.
ref: One day he bought a simple, but high quality, camera.

src: कर्मचारी ने मुझे इसके लिए वारंटी ख़रीदने के लिए मना लियाशायद कभी ज़रूरत पड़ गई तो.
mt: 1. Employee asked me to buy a warranty for it. Maybe I'll need it someday.
ref: The employee convinced me to buy a warranty for it just in case.

src: जैसे ही वह पार्क से निकल रहा था, उसने देखा कि वही गुब्बारा एक पेड़ में फंसा हुआ है.
mt: As he was leaving the park, he saw the same balloon stuck in a tree.
ref: As he was leaving the park, he saw the same balloon stuck in a tree.

src: उसने सभी कंटेंट को उचित टेम्पलेट पर ट्रांसफ़र कर दिया.
mt: He transferred all the content to the appropriate template.
ref: She transferred all of the content over to the proper template.

src: फिर वह सॉवेनिर की ख़रीदारी करने गया.
mt: He then went to buy a sovereign.
ref: Then he went shopping for souvenirs.

src: मैंने पट्टे के लिए अपने पूरे घर में देखा.
mt: I looked for a rental in my entire house.
ref: I looked through my house for the leash.

src: उसने अपनी स्थानीय कॉफ़ी शॉप पर चल कर जाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: He decided to walk to his local coffee shop.
ref: He decided to walk to his local coffee shop.

src: उसने पैकेज डिलीवर किया और वह उसे अंदर ले आई.
mt: She delivered the package and brought it inside.
ref: He delivered the package and she brought it inside.

src: फ़्रैंक के माता-पिता ने उसे पहले अपना होमवर्क करने के लिए कहा.
mt: Frank's parents had him do his homework first.
ref: Frank's parents told him to do his homework first.

src: टिम्मी ने पूरे सप्ताहांत में 3 पॉइंटर्स की शूटिंग का अभ्यास किया.
mt: Timmy practiced shooting three pointers all weekend.
ref: Timmy practiced shooting 3 pointers all weekend.

src: ड्रेक ने तुरंत पुलिस को फ़ोन किया, लेकिन वॉलेट नहीं मिला.
mt: Drake immediately called the police, but the wallet was not found.
ref: Drake immediately called the police, but the wallet was not found.

src: उसने टायर जैक और आयरन निकाला.
mt: He used a tire jack and iron.
ref: He got out the tire jack and iron.

src: वह अलग-अलग लैपटॉप पर तब तक रिसर्च करता है जब तक कि उसने एक बिल्कुल सही नहीं खोज लिया.
mt: He researches on different laptops until he finds one that is exactly right.
ref: He researches different laptops until he has found the perfect one.

src: उसने अपनी मां से उसके बाल काटने को कहा.
mt: He asked his mother to cut his hair.
ref: He asked his mother to cut his hair.

src: वे मुझ पर गुस्सा होना शुरू हुए इस बारे में कि मैं कितना बुरा हूं.
mt: They started getting mad at me about how bad I am.
ref: They started to get mad at me about how bad I was.

src: उसने स्टैम्प के लिए भुगतान किया.
mt: He paid for the stamp.
ref: She paid for stamps.

src: उसने सहकर्मियों के साथ बातचीत करने के लिए फ़ोरम को खोला.
mt: He opened the forum to talk with colleagues.
ref: He opened up the forum to chat with coworkers.

src: बॉब ने अपने प्लास्टिक बैग को छोड़ देने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: Bob decided to stop using his plastic bags.
ref: Bob decided to forego his plastic bags.

src: उनमें से एक कलाकार के पास उचित रेट था.
mt: 1 of them had a proper rate.
ref: One of the artists had reasonable rates.

src: फिर उसने अपनी मदद करने के लिए निकोटीन पैच लगाया.
mt: He then put on a nicotine patch to help him quit.
ref: Then she applied to nicotine patch to help her.

src: वह अपने साथ कुछ किताबें ले गई लेकिन वह जल्दी से उन्हें ख़त्म कर लेगी.
mt: She brought some books with her, but she will finish them quickly.
ref: She took a few books with her but she would go through those quickly.

src: लेकिन ऑफ़िस में एक प्यारी सी नई नर्स है.
mt: But there is a cute new nurse in the office.
ref: But there's a cute new nurse at the office.

src: वह एक पाई खा रहा था जब उसे अपने मुंह में कुछ बहुत सख़्त महसूस हुआ.
mt: He was eating a pie when he felt something very hard in his mouth.
ref: He was eating a pie when he felt something very hard in his mouth.

src: रॉब ने फ़ैसला किया कि वह भी इसमें शामिल हो ही जाए.
mt: Rob decided to join in as well.
ref: Rob decided he may as well join.

src: अब शनिवार को शाम हो चुकी थी और उसका कॉल अब तक नहीं आया था.
mt: It was already Saturday evening and his call had not come yet.
ref: It was now late Saturday and she hadn't heard anything.

src: वह उदास सी लिविंग रूम में गई.
mt: She went to the gloomy living room.
ref: She walked sadly into the living room.

src: पैन मुझे मुक्के मारती रही.
mt: Pan kept punching me.
ref: She continued to throw her fist at me.

src: ऐश्ली जब बड़ी हुई, तो वह बेवकूफ़ों की तरह बर्ताव करने लगी.
mt: As she grew older, she began to behave like a fool.
ref: Ashley started being stupid when she grew up.

src: हर बार जैसे ही पैम बच्चे को सुलाती, कुत्ता भौंकने लगता.
mt: Every time Pam tries to put the baby to sleep, the dog starts barking.
ref: Every time Pam got her baby to sleep, the dog started barking.

src: वह कैंपस घूमने गई.
mt: She went around the campus.
ref: She explored the campus.

src: वह सिर्फ़ इतना कर सकता था कि उस जगह को नोवोकेन से शून्य कर दे.
mt: He could only do so much to make that place zero with Novocaine.
ref: All he could do was numb the area with Novocaine.

src: फ़ॉर्ड के दोस्त उससे कहते कि वह सारे मज़ों को छोड़ रहा है.
mt: Ford's friend tells him to leave all the fun behind.
ref: Ford's friends warned him that he was missing out on fun.

src: मैंने तर्क करने की कोशिश की, पर नहीं कर सका.
mt: I tried to argue, but failed.
ref: I tried to argue but couldn't.

src: आइडिया सोचने के लिए, उसने अपने पूरे घर में चीज़ों को देखा.
mt: To come up with the idea, he looked around his entire house.
ref: She looked through her house for ideas.

src: वह सीढ़ियाँ चढ़ी और घर की तमाम चीज़ों को देखकर चकित रह गई.
mt: She climbed the stairs and looked at all the things in the house and was amazed.
ref: She climbed the ladder and was amazed at all the stuff in the house.

src: उसे कठफोड़वा की आवाज़ सुनाई दी और वह उसे पेड़ों में ढूँढने लगी.
mt: She heard the sound of a crow and went looking for it in the trees.
ref: She was heard a woodpecker and began looking for it in the trees.

src: बॉब किसी गैस स्टेशन पर गया और वहाँ सोडे के लिए पूछा.
mt: Bob went to a gas station and asked for some soda.
ref: Bob walked into a gas station and asked if he could have a soda.

src: वह बहुत ऊब गया था.
mt: He was very bored.
ref: He was very bored.

src: उसे वेटिंग लिस्ट में डाल दिया गया.
mt: He was placed on the waiting list.
ref: He got put on the waiting list.

src: अब टामी के पास नया लीसा फ़्रेंक ट्रैपर कीपर था.
mt: Now there's a new Lisa Frank Trapper Keeper at Tami's.
ref: Now Tami had a new Lisa Frank Trapper Keeper.

src: जब वह वापस आई, ट्री गिरा हुआ था.
mt: When she returned, the tree was down.
ref: When she returned, the tree was knocked over.

src: उसने तय किया कि वह एक नई और ज़्यादा आरामदायक कुर्सी खरीदेगा.
mt: He decided to buy a new and more comfortable chair.
ref: He decided to buy a new, more comfortable chair.

src: रेक्स, बगेट लेने के लिए दौड़ा.
mt: Rex, ran to get a bag.
ref: Rex runs out to get a baguette.

src: उसने पूरे दिन कड़ी मेहनत की और यहाँ तक कि काम को घर भी ले गई.
mt: She worked hard all day and even took work home.
ref: She worked hard all day and even took work home.

src: घड़ी में सिर्फ़ कुछ ही सेकंड बचे थे और गेम टाई हो गया.
mt: There were only a few seconds left on the clock and the game was tied.
ref: There were only seconds left on the clock and the game was tied.

src: हवा से पेड़ों की डालें इतनी ज़्यादा हिल रही थीं कि मेरी पत्नी सो नहीं पा रही थी.
mt: The trees were shaking so much that my wife couldn't sleep.
ref: The wind blew the tree branches so much my wife could not sleep.

src: अंत में, केट ने ऑनलाइन कीबोर्ड देने
mt: In the end, Kate gave online keyboard
ref: Kate finally went online and ordered her keyboard!

src: शुरू करने से तीन हफ़्तों के बाद, उसे एक कॉल आया.
mt: 3 weeks after starting, he got a call.
ref: Three weeks after he began, he got a call.

src: उसकी सबसे पसंदीद लाइब्रेरी में मिस वाटसन काम करती थीं.
mt: Her favorite library was where Miss Watson worked.
ref: Her favorite library was staffed by Miss Watson.

src: जब वे पहुँचे, तो वह अपने घुटनों पर बैठकर पार्क का सर्वे करने लेगी.
mt: When she arrives, she will be sitting on her knees surveying the park.
ref: When the arrived she sat on her knees surveying the park.

src: हाइवे पुलिस ने स्टीव की कार को रोक लिया.
mt: Highway police stopped Steve's car.
ref: The highway patrol stopped Steve's car.

src: उसने एक हफ़्ते तक और कोई बात नहीं की.
mt: He didn't say anything for a week.
ref: She talked of nothing else for a week.

src: उसने तय किया कि वह अपनी मुश्किल ज़िंदगी के बारे में किताब लिखेगा.
mt: She decided to write a book about her difficult life.
ref: He decided to write a book about his hard life.

src: मैंने इसके लिए लगभग तीन महीने तैयारी की.
mt: I prepared for this for about three months.
ref: I trained for it for about three months.

src: हालांकि, यह बहुत भारी था और एक ईंट की तरह गिर गया.
mt: However, it was very heavy and fell like a brick.
ref: It was far too heavy, though, and fell like a brick.

src: उसने एक टिमटिमाते हुए तारे को देखा, जो चल रहा था!
mt: He saw a dim star moving!
ref: He saw a twinkling, moving star!

src: उसने तय किया कि आज रात मूवी डेट के बाद, वह उससे शादी करने के लिए पूछेगा.
mt: He decided that after a movie date tonight, he would ask her to marry him.
ref: He decided to ask her to marry him tonight, after a movie date.

src: उसने पेड़ पर चढ़ने की कोशिश की, लेकिन वह गिर गया.
mt: She tried to climb the tree, but she fell.
ref: He tried climbing the tree, but he fell.

src: हालांकि, वह बेहतर थी पर ठीक नहीं थी.
mt: However, she was better but not well.
ref: Although she was better she wasn't well.

src: हालांकि, जब उसने उन्हें धोने के लिए उतारा, तब वे दूसरे कपड़ों के साथ मिल गए.
mt: However, when he took them to wash them, they mixed with other clothes.
ref: When she took them off, though, they got mixed in with other laundry.

src: इससे, उसे उल्टी जैसा लगने लगा.
mt: From then on, it felt like he was upside down.
ref: It made him sick to his stomach.

src: जैसे ही उसकी आँख लगी, उसकी बेटी का पिल्ला उसकी गोद में कूद पड़ा!
mt: As soon as she fell asleep, her daughter's puppy jumped into her lap!
ref: Just as she fell asleep, her daughter's puppy jumped into her lap!

src: वह एक दिन वहीं जा रहा था और उसने देखा कि वह बंद है.
mt: He was going there one day and saw it closed.
ref: He was on his way there one day and noticed it was closed.

src: हालांकि, आज वह अपनी किताब भूल गया था.
mt: However, today he forgot his book.
ref: However, today he forgot his book.

src: उसके पीछे पुलिस की बत्तियां चमकने लगीं.
mt: Police lights started flashing behind him.
ref: Police lights started flashing behind him.

src: उसने अपनी सांसों को शांत किया और मानसिक रूप से खुदको तैयार किया.
mt: He calmed his breathing and mentally prepared himself.
ref: He calmed his breathing and readied himself mentally.

src: उसने रेडियो चालू करने का सोचा.
mt: He thought to turn on the radio.
ref: She decided to turn on the radio.

src: चौकीदार, मुआयना करने के लिए छत पर चढ़ गया.
mt: A guard climbed onto the roof to inspect.
ref: A janitor climbed on top to inspect.

src: मुझे विश्वास नहीं हुआ.
mt: I didn't believe it.
ref: I could not believe it.

src: बैठे-बैठे मैं उसे सूंघने लगा.
mt: I sat there and started smelling it.
ref: Sitting with it, I found myself smelling it.

src: हमने कैरसल, व्हिप, और कैटरपिलर की सवारी की.
mt: We rode the carousel, whip, and caterpillar.
ref: We rode the carousel, the whip, and the caterpillar.

src: मैंने जब भी वह फ़िल्म देखी, तो मुझे ऐसा लगा कि मैं उसी में खो गया हूं.
mt: Whenever I watched that movie, I felt like I was in it.
ref: Whenever I watched it, I felt immersed in the movie.

src: वह जॉगिंग और साइकिल चलाते लोगों के सामने से गुज़री.
mt: She passed joggers and cyclists.
ref: She passed people jogging and riding bikes.

src: उसने ज़ोर से मियांउ किया और कुत्ते की नाक खरोंच दी.
mt: He barked loudly and scratched the dog's nose.
ref: He meowed loudly and scratched the dog's nose.

src: मुझे चिड़ियाघर जाना पड़ता है.
mt: I have to go to the zoo.
ref: I have to go to zoos.

src: एक शाम को, मुझे यकीन था कि उसने यह नहीं किया होगा.
mt: 1. One evening, I was sure he hadn't done it.
ref: Sure enough, she didn't do it one evening.

src: अभ्यास के दौरान कोच ने उसे पिचर बनने का मौका दिया.
mt: During practice, the coach gave him the opportunity to pitch.
ref: At practice his coach let him try out as pitcher.

src: उसने पूरे कमरे में देखा.
mt: He looked around the whole room.
ref: She looked around the room.

src: डेंटिस्ट ने मार्क को बताया कि उसे अपने अक्ल के दाढ़ निकलवाने पड़ेंगे.
mt: The dentist told Mark that he would have to shave his beard.
ref: The dentist tells Mark that he needs to have his wisdom teeth removed.

src: उसने सोचा कि उस रात वह बहुत सारे बर्तन धोएगी.
mt: She thought she would wash a lot of dishes that night.
ref: She decided to run a load of dishes that night.

src: बिल ने बड़े-बड़े हांदों में गायों के लिए चारा निकाला.
mt: Bill pulled hay for cows in big bales.
ref: Bill poured out some grains for the cows in big bins.

src: घर पर, उसने सर्जरी के लिए अपनी बहन से कुछ पैसे उधार मांगे.
mt: At home, he borrowed some money from his sister for surgery.
ref: At home, he asked his sister to loan him money for surgery.

src: एक दिन डीलरशिप में एक पति-पत्नी आए और कार दिखाने को कहा.
mt: 1 day ago, a husband and wife came to a dealership and asked to see a car.
ref: One day a couple comes into the dealership and asks to see a car.

src: वे ज़्यादातर एक-दूसरे पर फुंफकारती थीं.
mt: They were mostly arguing with each other.
ref: They spent most of their hissing each other.

src: इसलिए, वह नई टाइलें खरीदने गया.
mt: So, he went to buy new tiles.
ref: So he went shopping for new tiles.

src: उसके बाद वह कुछ दोस्तों से मिलने गया.
mt: He then went to meet some friends.
ref: He then invited some of his friends.

src: 12 आदमियों ने उस कास्केट को ज़मीन में दफ़ना दिया.
mt: 12 men buried the rocket in the ground.
ref: 12 men put the casket in the ground.

src: पांचवें राउंड में उसे एक लेफ़्ट हुक पड़ा, जिससे उसकी आंख पर कट लग गया.
mt: In the fifth round, he was hit by a left hook that cut his eye.
ref: He got hit with a left hook that cut his eye in the fifth.

src: बाहर निकलते समय, उसने कुछ चिप्स खाए.
mt: He ate some chips on the way out.
ref: On his way out the door, he ate some chips.

src: कुछ टीमों ने फैंसी कारें डिज़ाइन कीं.
mt: Some teams designed fancy cars.
ref: Some teams designed fancy cars.

src: कोच ने कहा कि उसे स्केट्स पर और तेज़ होना पड़ेगा.
mt: Coach said he will have to skate faster.
ref: The coach said that he needed to be faster on skates.

src: वह घबरा गई और ढलान पर तेज़ी से स्की करके नीचे आने लगी.
mt: She got scared and started skiing down the slope quickly.
ref: She panicked and started skiing faster down the slope.

src: वह अपने लिए एक टिकट खरीदने में सफल रहा.
mt: He was successful in buying a ticket for himself.
ref: He was able to buy a ticket for himself.

src: एक रात पहले, बेचैनी की वजह से उसे बिलकुल नींद नहीं आई.
mt: The night before, he couldn't sleep at all because of his anxiety.
ref: He barely slept any the night before due to anxiety.

src: उसकी बेटी न तो हिलडुल रही थी न ही सांसें ले रही थी!
mt: Her daughter was neither breathing nor moving!
ref: Her daughter was not moving or breathing!

src: उसकी बहन जब उससे नाराज़ थी, तब उसने वह सीडी चुरा ली.
mt: When his sister was angry with him, he stole that CD.
ref: Her sister stole the CD while angry with her.

src: वह उसकी जांच करने गई और उसमें मौजूद सभी जीवों को देखकर अचंभित रह गई.
mt: She went to examine it and was amazed to find all the animals inside.
ref: She went to inspect it, and she was amazed at all the life in it.

src: हालांकि, वह यह सब भूल गई जब उसने पहली बार स्मोर चखा.
mt: However, she forgot all that when she first tasted a smore.
ref: However, she forgot these things when she tasted her first S'MORE.

src: वह घबराई नहीं.
mt: She did not panic.
ref: She tried not to panic.

src: ट्रॉय ने 56 पॉइंट स्कोर करके, अपनी टीम को जीत दिलाई.
mt: Troy scored 56 points to win the game for his team.
ref: Troy scored 56 points to win the game for his team.

src: उसने अपने उन दोस्तों को कॉल किया जिन्होंने उस समय, उसके साथ खाना खाया था.
mt: He called his friends who had eaten with him at the time.
ref: He called his friends who ate with him on these occasions.

src: कुछ दूरी पर एक चिड़िया उड़ रही थी.
mt: A bird was flying nearby.
ref: A bird was flying in the distance.

src: क्रिस्चियन घर के अंदर बंदूकों से खेलना चाहता था.
mt: Christian wanted to play with guns inside the church.
ref: Christian wanted to play with the guns in the house.

src: उन्होंने उसे सोने के लिए कहा.
mt: He told her to go to sleep.
ref: They told him to go to bed.

src: बेन ने एक स्थानीय शिक्षक की पियानो क्लास में दाखिला लिया है.
mt: Ben has enrolled in a local teacher's piano class.
ref: Ben enrolls in a piano class with a local tutor.

src: आखिरकार, उसने स्कूल में अपने शिक्षकों को इसके बारे में बता दिया.
mt: Eventually, he told his teachers at school about it.
ref: He finally told his teachers at school about it.

src: मुझे ज़मीन में गड़ा हुआ एक बक्सा मिला.
mt: I found a box stuck in the ground.
ref: I found a box that was buried in the ground.

src: एक लंबे वीकेंड पर, सैम ने कैरेन से मिलने के लिए अपस्टेट जाने वाली ट्रेन पकड़ी.
mt: 1. Over a long weekend, Sam caught the train upstate to meet Karen.
ref: On a long weekend, Sam took the train upstate to go visit Karen.

src: उसके जंगल में लकड़ी के कुछ टुकड़े और लट्ठे मिले.
mt: Some pieces of wood and a log were found in his jungle.
ref: He found some sticks and logs in the woods.

src: शुक्रवार को काम पर वह बीमार थी और उसे बहुत मतली आ रही थी.
mt: She was sick at work on Friday and was feeling very nauseous.
ref: On Friday she was really sick and nauseous at work.

src: उसने एक शिक्षक की क्लास ली और रोज़ हिंदी बोलने का अभ्यास करने लगा.
mt: She took a teacher's class and started practicing Hindi every day.
ref: He hires a tutor and practices speaking Hindi every day.

src: उसने गुस्सा दिखाने के लिए उसके सामने चुप रहना शुरू कर दिया.
mt: He started to sit there quietly in front of him to show his anger.
ref: He gave her the silent treatment.

src: हम मज़े करने के लिए बहुत उत्साहित थे.
mt: We were very excited to have fun.
ref: We were all so excited to have fun!

src: उन्होंने चॉकलेट और ओटमील कुकीज़ बेक कीं.
mt: They baked chocolate and oatmeal cookies.
ref: They baked chocolate and oatmeal cookies.

src: आखिरी बार मैंने जिससे बात की उसने मुझसे झूठ बोला था।
mt: I last spoke to someone who lied to me.
ref: Last one I talked to lied to me.

src: लांसिंग के लोग बिना बिजली के अपने घरों में कैद रहे।
mt: People in Lancing were trapped in their homes without power.
ref: The people of Lansing were stuck in their homes without power.

src: उसने अपनी पहली स्विंग पर गेंद को उतनी जोर से हिट किया जितना वह कर सकता था।
mt: He hit the ball as hard as he could on his first swing.
ref: He hit the ball as hard as he could on his first swing.

src: वह उदास महसूस करने लगी और उसे लगा कि सब भूल गए हैं।
mt: She began to feel sad and thought that everyone had forgotten her.
ref: She began to feel depressed and thought everyone had forgotten.

src: मैंने कई अलग-अलग जगहों पर आवेदन किया।
mt: I have applied at many different places.
ref: I applied to many different places.

src: उसने अपने पैसे बचाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to save his money.
ref: She decided to save up her money.

src: फिर उसने एक बचाव का रास्ता सोचा।
mt: Then he thought of a way to save himself.
ref: Then she thought of a loophole.

src: जब उन्होंने उसे दिखाया कि कैसे खेलना है, तो वह शुरुआत करने के लिए उत्साहित थी।
mt: When they showed him how to play, he was eager to start.
ref: After they showed her how to play she was excited to begin.

src: फिर उसने सबवे ले ली।
mt: He then took the subway.
ref: Then she took the subway.

src: मैडलिन ने तुरंत एक गुलाबी बैग देखा जो उसे पसंद आया।
mt: Madeline immediately noticed a pink bag that she liked.
ref: Madeline immediately saw a pink bag she loved.

src: पौधा बढ़ना बंद हो गया।
mt: The plant stopped growing.
ref: The plant stopped growing.

src: रिपोर्ट्स के मुताबिक, वह आखिरकार स्वस्थ हैं और खेलने में सक्षम हैं।
mt: Reports say he is finally healthy and able to play.
ref: According to reports, he is finally healthy and able to play.

src: उसने एक कार्यक्रम बनाया और उसे प्रत्येक दिन के लिए टास्क को विभाजित किया।
mt: He created a program and divided the tasks for each day.
ref: She made a schedule and broke it up into tasks for each day.

src: हालांकि, उसने सेल पर एक बहुत अच्छी शर्ट देखी।
mt: However, he saw a very nice shirt on the cell phone.
ref: However, he sees a very nice shirt on sale.

src: वह बैठ गई और काम करने लगी।
mt: She sat down and started working.
ref: She sat down and began to work.

src: अब हमारे पास लगभग साफ कपड़े नहीं बचे हैं।
mt: We now have almost no clean clothes left.
ref: Now we have almost no clean clothes left.

src: बॉब रास्ते पर चला और प्राकृतिक दृश्यों को पसंद किया।
mt: Bob walked along the path and liked the natural scenery.
ref: Bob walked along the path and admired the scenery.

src: मेघन और स्कॉट टिकट खरीदने की बहुत कोशिश कर रहे थे।
mt: Meghan and Scott were trying very hard to buy tickets.
ref: Meghan and Scott were trying hard to buy tickets.

src: वहां पहुंचने पर वह अपना छात्रावास देखने गया।
mt: He went to see his dorm when he arrived there.
ref: When he got there, he went to check out his dorm.

src: उसके दौड़ने वाले दोस्तों में से एक ने एक ऑडिबल पुस्तक का सुझाव दिया।
mt: One of his running friends suggested an audiobook.
ref: One of her running friends recommended an audible book.

src: वह घर की खिड़की से अंदर घुस गई।
mt: She broke into the house through the window.
ref: She climbed in through the house's window.

src: कल रात उसे रोक लिया गया।
mt: He was stopped last night.
ref: He was pulled over last night.

src: खेलने के बाद वे बिस्तर पर लेट गए।
mt: After playing, they lay down on the bed.
ref: After playing, they laid down for bed.

src: उसने कार खरीदी और नक्शे पर यात्रा की योजना बनाई।
mt: He bought a car and planned a trip on the map.
ref: She bought the car and planned the trip on a map.

src: उसे लगा कि पहाड़ बहुत खूबसूरत हैं।
mt: 1. He thought the mountains were very beautiful.
ref: He thought the mountains were so beautiful.

src: अंत में एक मित्र ने एंड्रयू को एक अच्छी युवती से मिलवाया।
mt: In the end, a friend introduced Andrew to a nice young lady.
ref: Finally a friend introduced Andrew to a nice young lady.

src: वह अपना नाम अपने गेट के पास स्पीकर पर सुन सकती थी।
mt: She could hear her name being called on a speaker at her gate.
ref: She could hear her name over the speaker near her gate.

src: वह तीन घंटे बाद उठी।
mt: 3 hours later, he woke up.
ref: She woke three hours later.

src: पॉल अडिग था इसलिए उसने नौसेना में शामिल होने का प्रयास किया।
mt: He was rejected by the Navy because he was too tall.
ref: Paul was undeterred so he then tried to join the Navy.

src: बड़ी बिल्ली पीछे ही थी।
mt: 1. The big cat was behind him.
ref: The larger feline stayed close behind.

src: उन्होंने पाया कि रूस रंगीन और जीवंत था।
mt: They found that Russia was colorful and lively.
ref: He found that Russia was colorful and vibrant.

src: मैरी उपहार के रूप में अपने दोस्त के पास एक ले गई।
mt: Mary gave her friend a present.
ref: Mary took one to her friend as a gift.

src: म्यूजिक वीडियो चैनल या ब्लैक एंटरटेनमेंट चैनल उपलब्ध था।
mt: Music video channels or Black Entertainment channels were available.
ref: There was the music video channel or the black entertainment channel.

src: मैंने वहाँ गाड़ी से पंहुचा और अपनी स्विम ट्रंक पहन ली।
mt: I arrived by car and put on my swim trunk.
ref: I drove there and put on my swim trunks.

src: एक दिन वह अपनी गर्लफ्रेंड के घर गया।
mt: 1 day ago he went to his girlfriend's house.
ref: One day he visited his girlfriend's house.

src: लिआ आवेदन करती है और अगले दिन साक्षात्कार के लिए कॉल आती है।
mt: 1. Li applies for a job and gets a call for an interview the next day.
ref: Leah applies and the next day get a call for an interview.

src: मैंने अपना कार्ट ऊपर लोड किया।
mt: I loaded my cart.
ref: I loaded my cart up.

src: पंद्रह घंटे की ड्राइविंग के बाद, वह थक गया था।
mt: 15 hours of driving, he was tired.
ref: After fifteen hours of driving, he was tired.

src: मुझे विश्वास नहीं हो रहा था कि मैं बीटल को देख रहा हूँ।
mt: I can't believe I'm seeing the Beatles.
ref: I could not believe I was seeing a Beatle.

src: उसने अपने कमरे में छिपने और भगाने वाले को बुलाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to hide and call the police.
ref: She decided to hide in her room and call the exterminator.

src: उसने गर्मी को रोकने के लिए डार्क ब्लाइंड्स का विज्ञापन देखा।
mt: He saw an ad for dark sunglasses to block the heat.
ref: He saw dark blinds advertised to block heat.

src: बाद में, जॉय ने दोस्तों के साथ कंचे खेले।
mt: Later, Joy played checkers with friends.
ref: Later, Joey played marbles with friends.

src: तब शिक्षक ने उन्हें अपने डेस्क के नीचे छिपने का निर्देश दिया।
mt: The teacher then instructed him to hide under his desk.
ref: Then the teacher instructed them to hide under their desks.

src: उसे उन्हें बदलने की जरूरत थी।
mt: He needed to change them.
ref: He needed to replace them.

src: मैंने खुद को एक बाइकिंग ट्रेनर बनाया जिसने मुझे आगे बढ़ने में मदद की।
mt: I made myself a biking trainer that helped me progress.
ref: I got myself a biking trainer who helped me make progress.

src: पहले हमारी कार खराब हो गई और हम घंटों गर्मी में फंसे रहे।
mt: 1st We had a car breakdown and were stuck in the heat for hours.
ref: First our car broke down and we were stranded in the heat for hours.

src: कुछ दिनों बाद, मेरे सहपाठी ने मुझे यह पूछने के लिए संदेश भेजा कि क्या मैंने कर लिया है।
mt: A few days later, one of my classmates messaged me to ask if I had done it yet.
ref: A few days later, my classmate messaged me to ask if I had done it.

src: सैली अभी भी किनारे पर है।
mt: Sally is still on the sidelines.
ref: Sally is still on edge.

src: फिर, हम प्रयास पर काम करने के लिए तैयार हुए।
mt: So, we are ready to work on the attempt.
ref: Then, we set to work trying.

src: उसने स्कूल के चौकीदार की ओर इशारा किया और विल से कहा कि यह उसका भविष्य है।
mt: He pointed to the school's guard and told Will that this was his future.
ref: He pointed to the school janitor, and told Will that was his future.

src: जब नर्स ने उसे शॉट दिया, तो एमिली बाहर पहुंची और उसे मारा।
mt: When the nurse gave her the shot, Emily came out and shot her.
ref: When the nurse gave her the shot, Emily reached out and hit her.

src: हमने स्ट्रीट हॉकी खेलने का फैसला किया क्योंकि हम इससे परिचित नहीं थे।
mt: We decided to play street hockey because we were not familiar with it.
ref: We decided to play street hockey since we weren't familiar with it.

src: मुझे दिखा हर माउस बहुत महंगा था।
mt: I showed him every mouse was very expensive.
ref: Every mouse I found was too expensive.

src: उसे लेने के लिए वह घर वापस चली गई।
mt: She went back home to get him.
ref: She drove back home in order to get it.

src: हम टकरा गए और दोनों जमीन पर गिर पड़े।
mt: We collided and both fell to the ground.
ref: We collided and both fell to the ground.

src: उसे अपने गैरेज में प्लाईवुड मिला।
mt: He found some plywood in his garage.
ref: He found plywood in his garage.

src: एक रात, वह अपने तंबू में एक सांप होने पर जागा।
mt: One night, he woke up to a snake in his tent.
ref: One night, he awoke to a snake in his tent.

src: उसे एक विज्ञापन में मनचाही पोस्टिंग मिली।
mt: He got the job he wanted in an advertisement.
ref: He found a desirable posting in one of the ads.

src: वह खाना बनाने का अभ्यास करता थी और दोस्तों को खाना खिलाती थी।
mt: She practiced cooking and fed her friends.
ref: He practiced his cooking and served food for friends.

src: उनके पास अपना चिकन और तरबूज खाने का कोई तरीका नहीं था।
mt: They had no way to eat their chicken and watermelon.
ref: They had no way to eat their chicken and watermelon.

src: वहाँ इतनी बर्फ़ गिरी थी कि स्कूल की छुट्टी कर दी गई.
mt: There was so much snow that school was closed.
ref: It had snowed so much that school was cancelled.

src: जोलीन तय नहीं कर पा रही थी कि उसे किस रंग की नेल पॉलिश पसंद आएगी.
mt: Jolene couldn't decide which nail polish she liked best.
ref: Joline could not decide what color nail polish she would like.

src: वह बिना चिल्लाए घर से निकलने में कामयाब हो गया.
mt: He managed to leave the house without screaming.
ref: He managed to make it all way through without screaming out loud.

src: वह कॉलेज की किसी टीम में शामिल हो गया.
mt: He joined a college team.
ref: Then he joined a team in college.

src: उसने मैनेजर को बुलाया, पर उसने आने की सोची भी नहीं.
mt: He called the manager, but he didn't think to come.
ref: She asked for the manager but he never bothered to come.

src: अपने 18वें जन्मदिन पर, उसने तय किया कि वह टैटू बनवाएगी.
mt: 18th birthday, she decided to get a tattoo.
ref: One her 18th birthday she decided to get one.

src: उसने एक पैन बेकिंग सोडा का एक बॉक्स खाली कर दिया.
mt: He emptied a box of baking soda.
ref: She emptied a box of baking soda into a pan.

src: रॉब ने अच्छे से बर्ताव करने और अच्छा माहौल रखने की कोशिश की.
mt: Rob tried to behave well and keep a good atmosphere.
ref: Rob tried very nice to keep the peace and be nice.

src: घर में अंदर जाते समय, शैरन फिसल कर गिर गई.
mt: Sharon slipped and fell inside the house.
ref: On the way into the house Sharon tripped and fell.

src: उसने परिवर्तने के बारे में उसने एक गाना लिखा.
mt: He wrote a song about it.
ref: He wrote a song about his conversion.

src: फिर वह स्लेज से गिर गई.
mt: She fell off the sleigh.
ref: Then she slipped off the sled.

src: इसलिए, स्टेफ़ ने तय किया कि वह कम और सादा खाना खाएगी.
mt: So, Steff decided to eat less and simpler food.
ref: So Steph decided to eat simpler food and smaller portions.

src: एक दिन वह बहुत ही ज़रूरी गेम खेल रहा था.
mt: 1 day ago he was playing a very important game.
ref: One day he was in a very important game.

src: कोई दरबान आया और उसने सूज़न से थिएटर से जाने के लिए कहा.
mt: A doorman came and told Susan to leave the theater.
ref: An usher came and asked Susan to leave the theater.

src: उसने वह पौधा डेसी को दे दिया.
mt: He gave that plant to Desi.
ref: She gave the plant to Desi.

src: उसने गुडबाए कहा और घर चली गई.
mt: She said goodbye and went home.
ref: She said her goodbyes and headed home.

src: उसने प्रैक्टिस की थी और उसके माता-पिता भी देखने आए.
mt: She had practiced and her parents had come to watch.
ref: He had practiced and his parents came to watch him.

src: उसने यह पता करने के लिए पचांग देखा कि बगीचे के लिए कौनसे पौधे सही होंगे.
mt: He looked up the pachang to see which plants would be best for the garden.
ref: He checked the Almanac to see which plants were safe for the garden.

src: बे ने सोचा वह उसे छोड़ने वाला है.
mt: Bay thought he was going to leave her.
ref: Bay thought he was going to dump her.

src: वह भुनभुनाया पर साथ चला गया.
mt: He hummed along as he walked.
ref: He grumbled but went along.

src: हम शुरू में समझ नहीं पाए कि बात क्या है.
mt: We didn't understand what was going on at first.
ref: We couldn't figure out what was wrong at first.

src: जब वह मैक्सिको पहुँची, उसने तय कर लिया कि वह बहुत सी जगहों देखने जाएगी.
mt: When she arrived in Mexico, she decided she would visit many places.
ref: When she got to Mexico, she was sure to visit many different things.

src: हर क्रिसमस हमें खाली कप और बिसकुट के टुकड़े मिलते.
mt: Every Christmas we get empty cups and pieces of biscuit.
ref: Each Christmas day we found an empty cup and cookie crumbs.

src: वह घर के आसपास पहुंचे और नाश्ते के लिए समय नहीं था ।
mt: He arrived home and there was no time for breakfast.
ref: She rushed around the house and had no time for breakfast.

src: उन्होंने ग्रांट के पैसों से उपकरण खरीद लिए.
mt: They bought the equipment with the grant money.
ref: They bought the equipment with the grant money.

src: मैं अपने प्रितद्वंदियों के साथ फंसा हुआ था.
mt: I was trapped with my fellow passengers.
ref: I was tied with my opponent.

src: उसे बुरा लग रहा है क्योंकि वह जानता है कि बच्चा निराश होगा.
mt: He is upset because he knows the child will be disappointed.
ref: He feels bad because he knows the kid will be disappointed.

src: उसने अपना पुलिस का कुत्ता छोड़ दिया.
mt: He left his police dog behind.
ref: He unleashed his police dog.

src: जैसे ही मुझे ठीकठाक नाई मिला, मैं उसके पास बाल कटवाने के लिए गया.
mt: As soon as I found a good barber, I went to him to get my hair cut.
ref: Once I found a suitable barber, I dropped by for a cut.

src: मैंने कुछ चक्कर लगाए.
mt: I took a few turns.
ref: I did a few laps.

src: रयान और उसका दोस्त पूरे दिन पार्क में पक्षियों के साथ खेलते रहे।
mt: Ryan and his friend played with birds all day in the park.
ref: Ryan and his friend played with birds at the park all day.

src: उसने उम्मीद में अपनी कार दाहिनी लेन में रख दी।
mt: He put his car in the right lane with hope.
ref: He put his car in the right lane in anticipation.

src: जैसे ही उसने खिलौने को खड़खड़ाया, जोसिआ को बहुत दिलचस्पी हो गई।
mt: As soon as he shook the toy, Josia became very interested.
ref: As she made the toy rattle, Josiah became very interested.

src: facebook पर हर तरफ देख रहा था और एक छोटा सुअर देखा।
mt: I was looking around on facebook and saw a little pig.
ref: I was looking around on facebook and saw a mini pig.

src: कक्षा के पहले दिन, सभी को एक गीत गाना आवश्यक था।
mt: On the first day of class, everyone was required to sing a song.
ref: The first day of class, everyone was required to sing a song.

src: हालाँकि, जब प्रोम आ रहा था, तो उसने आखिरकार आगे बढ़ने का फैसला किया।
mt: However, when the prom was coming, he finally decided to move forward.
ref: However, when prom was approaching, he decided to finally make a move.

src: उसने मन लगाकर पढ़ाई की।
mt: 1. He studied hard.
ref: She studied hard.

src: उसने पिज्जा प्लेस पर फोन किया और उन्हें अपना कोड दिया।
mt: He called Pizza Place and gave them his code.
ref: He called the pizza place and gave them his code.

src: वह ऑडिशन देने वाले पहले लोगों में से थे।
mt: He was one of the first people to audition.
ref: He was only of the first people to audition.

src: हमने चॉकलेट खाई।
mt: We have eaten chocolate.
ref: We ate chocolate.

src: उसने सोचा कि वह अपने चेंज जार में छुट्टे पैसों को गिनेगी।
mt: He thought he would count his change in his change jar.
ref: She thought she'd count the change in her change jar.

src: मैं एक दोस्त से मिला और उसे अपनी साइकिल पर सवारी करने की पेशकश की।
mt: I met a friend and offered him a ride on my bicycle.
ref: I met up with a friend and offered her a ride on my bicycle.

src: आगे वे उनका घर देख सकते थे।
mt: They could see their house ahead.
ref: Ahead they could see her house.

src: वह अपने सारे कपड़े लॉन्ड्रोमैट ले गई।
mt: She took all her clothes to the laundromat.
ref: She carried all her clothes to the laundromat.

src: उसने हेडफोन चुराने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to steal the headphones.
ref: He decided to steal the headphones.

src: मैं हमेशा योजना बनाता रहता हूं लेकिन कुछ न कुछ सामने आता रहता है।
mt: I always plan but something or the other comes in front.
ref: I always keep planning to but something keeps coming up.

src: हालांकि, एक दिन वह सफाई करने का फैसला करता है।
mt: However, one day he decides to clean it up.
ref: However, one day he decides to tidy up.

src: मैंने सिर्फ अतिरिक्त समय पाने के लिए रात का खाना छोड़ने का फैसला किया।
mt: I decided to skip dinner to gain extra time.
ref: I decided to skip dinner just to have extra time.

src: हमने एक अजनबी से इसे हमारे लिए लेने के लिए कहा।
mt: We asked a stranger to take it for us.
ref: We asked a stranger to take it for us.

src: मैंने यह देखने के लिए एक कमीज उठाई कि क्या उसमें से दुर्गंध आ रही है।
mt: I lifted a shirt to see if any stench was coming from it.
ref: I picked up a shirt to see if it smelled bad.

src: वह लगभग अपने स्नान में सो गया, और उसकी माँ ने कहा कि यह सोने का समय था।
mt: He was almost asleep in his bath, and his mother said it was time for a nap.
ref: He nearly fell asleep in his bath, and his mother said it was bedtime.

src: जब एक बड़ा हिरन ग्लेड में घुसा तो उनका ध्यान भटक गया।
mt: When a large deer ran into the glade, their attention was diverted.
ref: Their attention was distracted when a huge buck entered the glade.

src: यह उसके ग्रेड के 50 प्रतिशत के लिए गिना जाता है।
mt: 50% of his grade is for this.
ref: It counts for 50 percent of his grade.

src: अंत में वह बुक क्लब में एक दोस्त से मिली।
mt: In the end, he met a friend at the book club.
ref: Finally she met a friend at book club.

src: हम कार में सवार हुए और एक साथ निकल पड़े।
mt: We got into the car and drove off together.
ref: We got in the car and headed out together.

src: ब्रिटनी ने गेमिंग लगभग छोड़ दी लेकिन फेसबुक पर एक लड़कियों का गेमिंग ग्रुप मिला।
mt: Brittany had almost given up gaming but found a girls gaming group on Facebook.
ref: Brittany almost quit gaming but found a girl gaming group on facebook.

src: वहां देखने और करने के लिए बहुत कुछ था!
mt: There was a lot to see and do there!
ref: There was so much to see and do!

src: उन्होंने इसका नाम कभी नहीं बताया।
mt: They never told its name.
ref: They never said the name of it.

src: एक दिन, वैल को टर्मिनल कैंसर का पता चला।
mt: 1 day, Vale learned she had terminal cancer.
ref: One day, Val was diagnosed with terminal cancer.

src: मुझे आश्चर्य है कि मैंने अपना लाइसेंस नहीं खोया।
mt: I am surprised that I did not lose my license.
ref: I'm surprised I didn't loose my license.

src: आखिरकार, डेविड ने इतना पैसा जमा कर लिया कि वह ऑरेगोन की अपनी बड़ी ट्रिप पर जा सके.
mt: Finally, David had saved enough money to take his big trip to Oregon.
ref: Finally David has enough money for his big trip to Oregon.

src: वह खुश नहीं थी.
mt: She was not happy.
ref: She was not happy.

src: उसने जानवरों की देखभाल में मदद की.
mt: She helped care for the animals.
ref: She helped care for the animals.

src: सेथ के सुपरवाइजर ने घोषणा की कि फैक्ट्री को बंद करना पड़ेगा.
mt: Seth's supervisor announced that the factory would have to close.
ref: Seth's supervisor announces that the factory has to shut down.

src: वह आए और उन्होंने उसे बताया कि फ्यूल पंप खराब हो गया है.
mt: He came and told him that the fuel pump was broken.
ref: He came and informed her the fuel pump was out.

src: उसकी सिगरेट अभी भी जल रही थी और फ़र्श पर गिर गई.
mt: Her cigarette was still burning and she fell to the floor.
ref: His cigarette was still lit and fell on the floor.

src: बिल्डिंग में जाते समय उसने सभी प्रचार अभियान देखे.
mt: He saw all the campaign material on the way to the building.
ref: While walking into the building he noticed all of the campaign signs.

src: उसने करीब से देखा तो पाया कि उसने एक कील पर गाड़ी चढ़ा दी थी.
mt: He looked closer and found he had driven over a nail.
ref: He inspected it closer and saw he had run over a nail.

src: एमी को एक नया और किफायती अपार्टमेंट, उसके ऑफिस के पास ही मिल गया.
mt: Amy got a new and affordable apartment, right near her office.
ref: Amy found a new apartment for the right price near her job.

src: हम सभी को वह चाहिए था.
mt: We all wanted that.
ref: We all wanted it.

src: कैथी ने जैसे ही मे को देखा, उसे प्यार हो गया.
mt: As soon as Cathy saw me, she fell in love.
ref: Cathy fell in love with May as soon as she saw her.

src: मोनिका के पास अपने दोस्त को तोहफा देने के लिए पैसे नहीं थे.
mt: Monica didn't have money to give her friend a present.
ref: Monica did not have any money to buy her friend a gift.

src: कोई उसे देख नहीं रहा था, इसलिए वह भागने में सफल हो गया.
mt: No one was watching him, so he was able to escape.
ref: No one was watching him so he made an escape.

src: लड़का-लड़की एक दूसरे से बहुत प्यार करते थे.
mt: The boy and girl loved each other very much.
ref: The boy and the girl love each other so much.

src: मैं पोडियम के सामने खड़ा था, जब उन्होंने एक उत्तेजक भाषण दिया.
mt: I was standing in front of the podium when they gave an exciting speech.
ref: I stood in front of the podium while he gave a stirring speech.

src: उन्होंने हॉट डॉग खाया और सोडा भी पीया!
mt: He ate a hot dog and drank a soda!
ref: They ate hot dogs and drank soda as well!

src: मैंने तय किया कि मैं तैराकी करने जाऊंगा.
mt: I decided to go swimming.
ref: I decided I would go swimming.

src: पेपर फिर से लिखने के लिए, वह कॉफ़ी की दुकान पर चली गई.
mt: To rewrite the paper, she went to the coffee shop.
ref: She went to a coffee shop to rewrite.

src: उसकी पत्नी को एक नया डेस्क चाहिए था, इसलिए उसने तय किया था कि वह एक डेस्क बनाएगा.
mt: His wife wanted a new desk, so he decided to build one.
ref: She had been wanting a new desk, so that's what he decided to make.

src: अभी पांच मिनट भी नहीं हुए थे कि उनका हाथ कार के दरवाज़े में दब गया.
mt: 5 minutes after the car was parked, their hand was on the door.
ref: Not even five second later he slammed his hand in the car door.

src: वीकेंड पर, वह थका हुआ और गुस्से में रहता था.
mt: On weekends, he was tired and angry.
ref: On the weekends, he was tired and grumpy.

src: धागा बढ़ता रहा लेकिन दूसरा सिरा नहीं मिला.
mt: 1. The thread is growing but the other end is not found.
ref: More string came but not the end.

src: वह बेसमेंट में रोज़ाना अभ्यास करता था.
mt: He practiced daily in the basement.
ref: He practiced every day in the basement.

src: टोरी का पति भी उतना ही उत्साहित था.
mt: Her husband was just as excited.
ref: Tori's husband was just as excited.

src: एक दिन उसने ध्यान दिया कि वह बेकरी बंद हो गई है.
mt: 1 day he noticed the bakery was closed.
ref: One day she notices the bakery has closed down.

src: हालांकि, एक दिन एक अच्छे लड़के राल्फ ने रूफ़स को अपना परिचय दिया.
mt: However, one day a good boy Ralph introduced Rufus to his identity.
ref: However, a nice guy named Ralph introduces himself to Rufus one day.

src: टॉम ने उसके बदले एक कुत्ते का पिल्ला मांग लिया, और अचानक उसकी माँ ने अपना ख्याल बदल लिया.
mt: Tom asked for a puppy in exchange, and suddenly his mother changed her mind.
ref: Tom asked for a puppy instead, and his mom suddenly changed her mind.

src: एक ख़ास चिड़िया जगह को लेकर बहुत दादागिरी दिखा रही थी.
mt: A bird was showing off at a special bird place.
ref: One particular bird was acting very territorial.

src: लोला को हूप कहीं नहीं मिला!
mt: Lula couldn't find a hoop anywhere!
ref: Io couldn't find hoops anywhere!

src: हमने इस पर बात की कि हम दोनों बीटल्स को कितना प्यार करते हैं.
mt: We talked about how much we both love the Beatles.
ref: We both talked about our love for the Beatles.

src: उसकी टीम ने मेहनत से खेला.
mt: His team worked hard at the game.
ref: His team played hard.

src: दर्द काफ़ी हद तक और बढ़ गया.
mt: The pain has increased significantly.
ref: The pain got worse and worse.

src: उसे पढ़ने के लिए और चाहिए थीं लेकिन उसके पास पैसे नहीं थे.
mt: He needed to read more, but he had no money.
ref: He needed more to read but didn't have money.

src: यह पता चला कि वे सब भी कंगाल थे.
mt: It turned out they were all broke.
ref: It turns out that they were all broke as well.

src: मैं उसके पास गया और थोड़ी बातें करना शुरू किया.
mt: I went to him and started talking.
ref: I went up and started making small talk.

src: कॉल किए अभी एक घंटा भी नहीं हुआ था कि उसे एक टेक्स्ट मिलता है.
mt: 1 hour after the call, a text message came in.
ref: Not even an hour after calling in he gets a text.

src: ग्रेग बाइक से गिर गया जैसे ही उसे ज़मीन पर धकेला गया.
mt: Greg Bikes fell as he was pushed to the ground.
ref: Greg fell from the bike as he was pushed to the ground.

src: जॉनसन ने उसे ग़लत साबित करने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: Johnson decided to prove him wrong.
ref: Johnson decides to prove her wrong.

src: इसी बीच, पीट को बैंक की पार्किंग में एक वॉलेट पड़ा मिला.
mt: Meanwhile, Pete found a wallet in the bank's parking lot.
ref: Meanwhile, Pete found a wallet lying in the bank parking lot.

src: मेरी ने उसकी हंसी उड़ाई और उससे कहा कि उसमें भी कई ख़ूबियां हैं.
mt: My friend laughed and said that I also have many qualities.
ref: Mary laughed her off and told her that she had many strengths too.

src: उसने अपनी भौहें फाड़ ली थीं और हमें चिंता थी कि उसने चेहरा फ़्रैक्चर कर लिया है.
mt: She had plucked her eyebrows and we were concerned that she had fractured her face.
ref: He split his eyebrow open and we worried he had fractured his face.

src: उसने ठंडी टीथिंग रिंग, दवाएं, और हल्की सुखदायक चाय आज़माया है.
mt: She has tried cold tea, drugs, and light soothing tea.
ref: She has tried cool teething rings, medicines, and gentle soothing tea.

src: मैंने उन्हें कुछ ब्रेड फेंकने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: I decided to throw some bread at them.
ref: I decided to throw them some bread.

src: उसने आख़िरकार हिम्मत किया और एक ख़रीद लिया.
mt: He finally mustered the courage to buy one.
ref: He finally took the plunge and bought one.

src: अचानक, कुछ चमगादड़ ऊपर के अंधेरे में से नीचे उड़के आ गए.
mt: Suddenly, some bats flew down from the darkness above.
ref: Suddenly, a few bats flew down from the darkness above.

src: अंदर, उन्होंने कई अलग-अलग गिटार को बजा कर जांचा.
mt: Inside, they tested several different guitars.
ref: Inside, they played with several different guitars.

src: गुरुवार को जब वह सोने गया तो वह चिंतित था.
mt: He was worried when he went to bed on Thursday.
ref: When he went to bed on Thursday he was worried.

src: वह शो में सीखी गई चीज़ों की कोशिश करती थी.
mt: She was trying out what she had learned in the show.
ref: She would practice things she learned on the shows.

src: मैं आख़िरकार उसे अंदर ले गया और उसे अंदर जाने दिया, और उसका नाम टोक्यो रखा.
mt: I finally brought him inside and let him in, and named him Tokyo.
ref: I eventually took him in and let him inside, and named him Tokyo.

src: लेकिन उनका कोई भी वैक्यूम इसे ठीक से साफ़ नहीं कर सका.
mt: But none of their vacuums could clean it up properly.
ref: But none of their vacuums could properly clean it.

src: इसलिए उसने ज़रा भी चीनी नहीं डालने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: So he decided not to put any Chinese in it.
ref: So she decided not to add any sugar.

src: वहां, उसे एक असली विंग रेस्तरां मिला.
mt: There, he found a real wing restaurant.
ref: There, she found an authentic wing restaurant.

src: हम में से हर एक को यह एक दिन मिला करेगा.
mt: 1 day will come for all of us.
ref: We would each get to have it one day.

src: विमान में रडर की समस्या थी और वह नीचे जा रहा था!
mt: The plane had a problem with its rudder and was going down!
ref: The plane had a rudder problem and was going down!

src: उसके माता-पिता को लगता था कि जोई अपने अजीब रंगों के वजह से एक कलाकार था.
mt: Her parents thought she was an artist because of her strange colors.
ref: His parents thought that Joey was an artist because of his odd colors.

src: भीड़ के सामने जॉन हमेशा सहज महसूस करता था.
mt: John always felt at ease in front of a crowd.
ref: John had always felt comfortable in front of crowds.

src: कल उसने दो टिकट ख़रीदे,
mt: Yesterday he bought two tickets,
ref: Yesterday he bought two tickets,

src: उसने कैबिनेट में सिंक के नीचे कुछ पाने की उम्मीद में देखा.
mt: He looked for something under the sink in the cabinet.
ref: She looked in the cabinet under the sink hoping to find some.

src: उन्होंने अपने यार्ड के काम को ध्यान से छोड़ दिया, और अपने हाथ धोए.
mt: He left his yard work to wash his hands carefully.
ref: They dropped their yard work, carefully, and washed their hands.

src: वह उन्हें जुदा नहीं कर सकी!
mt: She could not separate them!
ref: She couldn't split them up!

src: जिल ने अपनी सभी परीक्षा पास की।
mt: Jill did pass all her exams.
ref: Jill passed all her tests.

src: फिर भी, उन्होंने साप्ताहिक गिटार कक्षाओं में दाखिला लेने का फैसला किया।
mt: However, they decided to enroll in weekly guitar classes.
ref: However, he decided to enroll in weekly guitar classes.

src: हर दिन, वह अपने संग्रह के लिए नए अकीर्तियों की तलाश में जाता था।
mt: Every day, he searched for new acquisitions for his collection.
ref: Every day, he went looking for new figures for his collection.

src: एक दिन उसने अपने दोस्तों से मिलने के लिए एक जोड़ी फ्लैट पहनने का फैसला किया।
mt: 1 day ago he decided to wear a pair of flats to meet his friends.
ref: One day she decided to wear a pair of flats to meet her friends.

src: मैं बस छिप जाऊंगा और लोगों के सामने कूद जाऊंगा।
mt: I'll just hide and jump out in front of people.
ref: I would just hide and jump out at people.

src: रेचल ने अपने दोस्तों को पत्र दिखाया।
mt: Rachel showed her friends a letter.
ref: Rachel showed the letter to her friends.

src: उसके पति ने उससे कहा कि सब ठीक हो जाएगा, पर डेब को यकीन नहीं था।
mt: Her husband told her everything would be all right, but Deb didn't believe it.
ref: Her husband told her everything would be alright, but Deb wasn't sure.

src: यह कुछ ही हफ्तों में वापस बढ़ गया।
mt: It was back up in just a few weeks.
ref: It grew back within a few weeks.

src: व्यस्त समय मामले को और बदतर बना रहा था।
mt: The busy time was making the situation worse.
ref: To make matters worse it was rush hour.

src: कुछ लोग वहां से गुजरे और उससे भी कम रुके।
mt: Some people passed by and even fewer stopped.
ref: Few people walked by and even fewer stopped.

src: पहले दिन वह काम से घर जाने की कोशिश में रास्ता भूल गया।
mt: He got lost on the way home from work the first day.
ref: The first day he got lost trying to get home from work.

src: वह उनके आकार और ताकत से प्रभावित थी।
mt: He was impressed by their size and strength.
ref: She was impressed by their size and strength.

src: उसे लगा कि घर काफी छोटा है।
mt: He thought the house was too small.
ref: She thought the home was quite small.

src: सुबह उसकी चाबियां रसोई की मेज पर पड़ी थीं।
mt: In the morning, her keys were found on the kitchen table.
ref: Her keys were left on the kitchen table that morning.

src: उन सभी के नीचे मेरी गर्लफ्रेंड का एक पुराना पत्र था।
mt: Under all of those was an old letter from my girlfriend.
ref: Underneath all of them was an older letter from my girlfriend.

src: बेन को एक दिन एहसास हुआ कि वह अपनी शादी से खुश नहीं है।
mt: Ben realized one day that he was not happy in his marriage.
ref: Ben realized one day that he was unhappy in his marriage.

src: हालाँकि बत्तख इस बात से अनजान थी कि क्या हो रहा है, लेकिन उसने पलक नहीं झपकाई।
mt: However, the duck was unaware of what was going on, but did not blink an eye.
ref: Although the duck was unaware of what was happening, it did not blink.

src: शै ने उत्सुकता से उसे $40 सौंप दिया और पोशाक पहन लिया
mt: She eagerly handed him $40 and put on the outfit
ref: Shay eagerly handed over her $40 and suited up.

src: यात्रा स्टोनहेंज में रुकी।
mt: The journey is halted at Stonehenge.
ref: The tour stopped at Stonehenge.

src: मैंने गिरे हुए को साफ करने के लिए कुछ खोजा।
mt: I searched for some to clean up the fallen.
ref: I looked for something to clean the spill.

src: अचानक बीयर खत्म हो गई।
mt: The beer ran out suddenly.
ref: All of a sudden the beer ran out.

src: वह इस कार्यक्रम के लिए अपने बालों को सीधा करने का इरादा करती है।
mt: She intends to straighten her hair for the occasion.
ref: She decides to straighten her hair for the event.

src: सेल्समैन ने जिल की पुरानी कार बेच कर नई कार दी
mt: A salesman sold an old car and gave a new car to the district
ref: The salesman traded Jill's old car for a new car.

src: हड़बड़ी में वह बाहर गया और कुछ फूल और चॉकलेट ले आया।
mt: In a hurry, he went out and brought some flowers and chocolate.
ref: Feeling rushed, he went out and got some flowers and chocolate.

src: उसने पूरे सप्ताह अभ्यास किया।
mt: He practiced all week.
ref: He practiced all week long.

src: जब वे वहां थे, क्वेंटिन और उसका दोस्त नौकायन करने गए।
mt: When they were there, Quentin and his friend went boating.
ref: When they were there, Quentin and his friend went sailing.

src: उस आदमी ने शिकायत की कि पेनकेक्स बहुत मोटे थे।
mt: The man complained that the pancakes were too thick.
ref: The man complained that the pancakes were too thick.

src: हम अपने नए रोमदार दोस्त की तलाश में अपने स्थानीय पशु आश्रय में गए।
mt: We went to our local animal shelter in search of our new Romdar friend.
ref: We went to our local animal shelter to find our new furry friend.

src: मेरे पौधों के साथ क्या गलत है इसका मूल्यांकन करने में सहायता के लिए मेरे मित्र आए थे।
mt: My friends came to help me evaluate what is wrong with my plants.
ref: My friend came by to help evaluate what is wrong with my plants.

src: जिल ने अपना गेम कंट्रोलर लिया और टीवी पर फेंक दिया।
mt: Jill took her game controller and threw it at the TV.
ref: Jill took her game controller and threw it at the TV.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, बाहर अंधेरा था।
mt: Unfortunately, it was dark outside.
ref: Unfortunately, it was dark outside.

src: उसने अपनी ताकत बढ़ाने के लिए कोठरी के दरवाजों में लात मारने का अभ्यास किया।
mt: He practiced kicking the doors of the cell to strengthen himself.
ref: He practiced kicking in the doors of closets to build his strength.

src: एक वेबसाइट ने सुझाव दिया कि मैं अपने अंडों को उबालने के बजाय बेक कर लूं।
mt: 1. A website suggested I bake my eggs instead of boiling them.
ref: A website suggested I bake my eggs instead of boil them.

src: जैसे ही उसने ऐसा किया, एक स्पिटबॉल उड़ गया जहां उसका सिर था।
mt: As soon as he did so, a spitball flew where his head had been.
ref: As he did so, a spitball flew where his head had been.

src: अंत में उसे हेडफोन की एक अच्छी जोड़ी मिल जाती है जिसे वह खरीद सकता है।
mt: In the end, he finds a good pair of headphones that he can buy.
ref: Finally he finds a good pair of headphones that he can afford.

src: अंत में, उसे ऐसे टिकट मिले जो उसकी मूल्य सीमा में थे।
mt: In the end, he got tickets that were within his price range.
ref: Finally, he found tickets that were in his price range.

src: उसकी माँ हमेशा उससे कहती थी कि वह बीज निगलने पर एक पेड़ उगाएगा।
mt: His mother always told him that he would grow a tree by swallowing seeds.
ref: His mom always told him he would grow a tree swallowing seeds.

src: एंजी को बहुत आश्चर्य हुआ और उसने उन्हें ईमेल किया।
mt: Angie was surprised and emailed them.
ref: Angie was very surprised and emailed them.

src: स्कूल के बाद वह अपने पिताजी से मदद माँगने के लिए घर भागी।
mt: After school, he ran home to ask his father for help.
ref: After school she ran home to ask her Dad for help.

src: वह बाइक चलाना नहीं जानता था।
mt: He didn't know how to ride a bike.
ref: He did not know how to ride a bike.

src: जब उसने अपने मिल्कशेक के लिए उस आदमी को भुगतान करने की कोशिश की, तो वह उसे देखकर मुस्कुराया।
mt: When she tried to pay the man for her milkshake, he smiled at her.
ref: When she tried to pay the man for her milkshake, he smiled at her.

src: जैसे ही वह जाने लगा, उसने देखा कि एक छोटा लड़का रो रहा है।
mt: As he was leaving, he saw a small boy crying.
ref: As he was walking away, he saw a little boy crying.

src: उसे अपने काम करने का मन नहीं करता था।
mt: He did not want to work.
ref: He didn't feel like doing his chores.

src: राशिद ने अपने भाई को ड्राइव करने की पेशकश की।
mt: Rashid offered to drive his brother.
ref: Rashid offered to drive his brother.

src: कुछ दिनों बाद, अली को उसके कार्ड पर असामान्य लेन-देन का पता चला।
mt: A few days later, Ali noticed unusual transactions on his card.
ref: A few days later, Ali found unusual transactions on her card.

src: मुझे आखिरकार एक खूबसूरत मिल गई जिसे मैं पसंद करता था।
mt: I finally found a beautiful girl that I like.
ref: I finally found a beautiful one I loved.

src: पूरे साल मैंने बहुत मेहनत की।
mt: I worked hard all year.
ref: All year, I worked very hard.

src: जैसे ही वह वहां गयी, उसने आस पास के लोगों को अपना परिचय दिया।
mt: As soon as she got there, she introduced herself to the people around.
ref: As soon as she moved in, she went around introducing herself.

src: डैन ने बहुत ज्यादा चाहा कि वह इस ट्रेन सेट का मालिक बन सके।
mt: Dan wanted very much to be the owner of this train set.
ref: Dan wished so badly that he could own this train set.

src: वह अपनी मां का पर्स बाथरूम में ले गई।
mt: She took her mother's purse to the bathroom.
ref: She took her mom's purse to the bathroom.

src: उसने फैसला किया कि उसे आगे बढ़ने की जरूरत है।
mt: He decided that he needed to move forward.
ref: He decided he needed to move.

src: उसने कठिन अध्ययन किया और अतिरिक्त क्रेडिट के लिए उम्मीद की।
mt: He studied hard and hoped for extra credit.
ref: He studied hard and asked for extra credit.

src: जब वह देख रही थी, तो बिल्लियों में से एक ने उस पर म्याऊ किया।
mt: As she watched, one of the cats meowed at her.
ref: While she was looking, one of the cats meowed at her.

src: जैसे ही मैंने बीम से फ़्लिप करते हुए एक राउंड ऑफ किया, मैं गलत तरीके से उतरा।
mt: As I flipped the coin, I called a round of shots, I came out wrong.
ref: As I did a round off flipping off the beam, I landed wrong.

src: मेरी प्रत्येक बेटी ने एक अलग पिल्ला चुना।
mt: My daughters each chose a different puppy.
ref: Each of my daughters picked out a different pup.

src: अंत में वह दिन आ गया, जॉनी इडाहो चला गया।
mt: Finally, the day came, Johnny Idaho is gone.
ref: Finally the day had arrived, Johnny moved to Idaho.

src: इस साल घर जाते समय उसका एक कार एक्सीडेंट हो गया था।

src: जैसे ही हम क्लब में गए, वह सुंदर था।

src: कांच चकनाचूर हो गया।

mt: However, Allen did not know where she wanted to eat.

src: इसने उन्हें अपनी अकादमिक उपलब्धियों के बारे में अच्छा महसूस कराया।
mt: It made him feel good about his academic achievements.

src: वे 4 जगह और गए, सभी में 3 शॉट पिए।

src: बिंदु का एक मित्र समोसा और दूध ले आया।

src: टायलर चिंतित है कि वह बस को मिस कर देगा।

src: जब वह एक अच्छे कॉलेज में दाखिल हुआ, तो उन्होंने इसे वहन करने के लिए दो नौकरियां की।
mt: When he got into a good college, he had to support it with two jobs.

mt: He picked up his things and waited at the door for Tami.

src: उसने पूरी सुबह समुद्र तट को खंगाला।

src: शाम तक सब कुछ ठीक रहा।

mt: His hard work paid off and he won a popular competition.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, कोई उससे टकरा गया।
mt: Unfortunately, it collided with something.

src: उसने कड़ी मेहनत की और अपना सब कुछ दिया।
mt: He worked hard and gave all he had.

src: उन्हें डर था कि उनकी मां उन पर नाराज हो जाएंगी।
mt: He was afraid his mother would be angry with him.
ref: They were afraid their mom would get angry at them.

src: उसने उसे एक गीत लिखने का फैसला किया।

ref: Gloria decided to pick some of her own flowers from the garden.

src: एक दिन, किसी ने उन्हें एक प्रतियोगिता के लिए चुनौती दी।

mt: He decided to find a way to cool it down.

mt: He wanted to join a church choir but he thought his friends would laugh.
ref: He wanted to join a church choir but thought his friends would laugh.

src: वह वास्तव में ईमानदारी से दो नहीं चाहता था।

src: पानी ठंडा ही रहा।

mt: They decided to end things in a friendly manner.

src: वह वास्तव में एक छोटी बहन चाहती थी, लेकिन भाई नहीं!
mt: She really wanted a little sister, but not a brother!

src: दिन चढ़ने के साथ डेयर्स बढ़ते अधिक जटिल होते गए।
mt: As the day progressed, the darts became more complex.

src: इसे पूरा करने के बाद, उसने एक पुस्तक रिपोर्ट लिखी।
mt: After completing it, he wrote a book report.

mt: As he grew older, his love for comics grew.
ref: As he grew older his love for comics grew.

src: एक दिन उसने अपने बाथरूम में एक चमगादड़ देखा।
mt: 1 day ago he saw a bat in his bathroom.
ref: One day he saw a bat in his bathroom.

src: मैरी ने एनाबेले की बेहतरीन गायन वालीआवाज पर ध्यान दिया।
mt: Mary paid attention to Anne's excellent singing voice.
ref: Mary noticed Annabelle's great singing voice.

src: उकी दर्द से कराह उठा!
mt: ouch! It hurts!

src: एक हफ्ते तक किसी ने उसे पैसे नहीं दिए।
mt: 1 week and no one gave him money.
ref: For one week, no one gave him money.

src: पहला घिसे-पिटे बूट के साथ लौटा।
mt: 1st back with worn-out boots.

src: बिल टेबल सेट करता है और कुछ बैकग्राउंड म्यूजिक चलाता है।
mt: Bill sets the table and plays some background music.
ref: Bill sets the table and puts on some background music.

src: उसने उसके लिए खाना खरीदा और उसे संदेश भेजा।
mt: He bought him food and sent him a message.
ref: She bought him food and gave him messages.

mt: When they were 13 years old, Jack's family moved away.
ref: When they were 13 Year's old, Jakels family moved away.

src: इसलिए हमने बांटने और जीतने का फैसला किया।
mt: So we decided to share and win.

src: प्रशिक्षक धैर्यवान था जब एमी इसे समझ नहीं पाई।
mt: The patient was calm when Amy couldn't understand it.
ref: The instructor was patient when Amy couldn't get the hang of it.

src: उन्होंने पूरे वसंत में इस पर कड़ी मेहनत की।
mt: They have been working hard on this all spring.
ref: He worked hard on it all spring.

src: उसने कितनी भी कोशिश की, उसने खुद को दिवास्वप्न देखते हुए पाया।
mt: He tried as hard as he could, but he found himself dreaming of a better world.
ref: No matter how hard he tried, he found himself daydreaming.

src: कहानियाँ मज़ेदार और दिलचस्प थीं।
mt: Stories were fun and interesting.

mt: She asks her boss if she can take a day off.
ref: She asks her boss if she can go home for the day.

src: वह सबसे पास के स्टोर में गई, लेकिन उसे अपनी पसंद का बिस्तर नहीं मिला।
mt: She went to the nearest store, but couldn't find the bed of her choice.
ref: She went to the closest store but couldn't find a bed she liked.

src: उसने वापस स्कूल जाने पर विचार किया, लेकिन इसके खिलाफ फैसला किया।
mt: He considered returning to school, but decided against it.
ref: He considered going back to school, but decided against it.

src: आज लिजी अपने केले खुद चुनना चाहती थी।
mt: Today Lizy wanted to pick her own bananas.
ref: Today Lizzy wanted to pick her own bananas.

src: मैं बस में सवार हो गया और यह पूरे उपनगरीय बोस्टन में गई।
mt: I got on the bus and it went all over the suburban Boston area.
ref: I rode on the bus as it went all over suburban Boston.

src: अंत में वह डॉक्टर के पास गया और उसे पता चला कि वह जहर आइवील था ।
mt: In the end, he went to the doctor and found out that he was poisoned with ivy.
ref: He finally went to the doctor and he found out he had poison ivy.

src: वे हमेशा वन-ऑन-वन खेलते थे.
mt: They always played one-on-one.
ref: They would always play one on one.

src: लड़कियों को खूब मज़ा आया.
mt: The girls had a lot of fun.
ref: The girls had a ton of fun.

src: जबकि जिम में वह हथियार और एब्स करती थी ।
mt: While she was doing weapons and abs at the gym.
ref: While at the gym she did arms and abs.

src: लेकिन, उसकी जॉब छूट गई और बाद में, घर भी.
mt: But his job was lost and then his home.
ref: Unfortunately, she lost her job and eventually, her home.

src: साथ मिलकर, उन्होंने सेब छीले और साफ़ किए.
mt: Together, they peeled and cleaned apples.
ref: Together, they peeled and cleaned the apples.

src: वह अपने सारे चिल्लर लाया और उसने दूध पीने की बॉटल खरीद ली.
mt: He brought all his chillers and bought a bottle of milk to drink.
ref: He brought all his chance and bought the sucker.

src: जब वह वहाँ पहुँचा, तो उसने भव्य प्राचीन महल देखे.
mt: When he arrived, he saw a magnificent ancient palace.
ref: When he got there, he saw gorgeous old castles.

src: उसने कड़ी मेहनत की और अपने सारे पैसे बचा लिए.
mt: He worked hard and saved all his money.
ref: He worked very hard and saved up all his money.

src: किसी गलती की वजह से, कोई एक सेफ़्टी बेल्ट टूट गया.
mt: 1 safety belt broke due to a mistake.
ref: Something went wrong and one of the safety harnesses snapped.

src: वह शायद ही कभी समय से पहुँचता हो.
mt: He rarely arrives on time.
ref: He rarely showed up on time.

src: वह बहुत मेहनत से पढ़ाई करती थी ।
mt: She studied very hard.
ref: She studied very hard.

src: अपने अपार्टमेंट में सारा सामान लाने में, मुझे 8 घंटे से ज़्यादा समय लगा.
mt: 8 hours to move all my stuff into my apartment.
ref: It took me over 8 hours to get all of the stuff into my apartment.

src: एक दिन, हेली की माँ की किसी दूसरी माँ से बहस हो गई.
mt: 1 day, Helly's mom got into an argument with another mom.
ref: One day Hailey's mom got in an argument with one of the other moms.

src: आज भी, वह अपनी अलमारी में पेपरमिंट रखता है.
mt: Today, he still keeps peppermint in his medicine cabinet.
ref: To this day he keeps peppermints in his cupboards.

src: एक दिन, वे सभी एक मुश्किल ढाल से नीचे जा रहे है.
mt: 1 day, they all are going down a difficult shield.
ref: One day, they were all going down a challenging slope.

src: जब वह क्लास में न होती, तो बहुत पढ़ाई करती.
mt: When she is not in class, she studies a lot.
ref: When she wasn't in class, she studied very hard.

src: उन्होंने मॉल में खाना खाया.
mt: They ate at the mall.
ref: They had lunch at the mall.

src: उसने सोचा अपने फ़ोन की सुरक्षा के लिए उसे एक केस चाहिए.
mt: He thought he needed a case to protect his phone.
ref: He decided he needed a case to protect his phone.

src: स्टॉप पर एक गैस स्टेशन और एक बर्गर किंग था.
mt: A gas station and a Burger King were on the stop.
ref: At the stop there was a gas station and a Burger King.

src: लाइन के दूसरी तरफ़ जो महिला था, उसे मैं नहीं जानता था.
mt: I don't know the woman on the other side of the line.
ref: The woman who was on the other line was unfamiliar to me.

src: यहाँ तक उसका आखिरी ग्राहक भी गुस्सा था, जबकि उसकी गलती भी नहीं थी.
mt: Here was his last customer, too, and he was angry, while his mistake was not.
ref: Even her last customer was mad and it wasn't even her fault.

src: ऐलेक ने ऐसे ब्लॉकखरीदे जिन पर अक्षर लिखे हुए थे.
mt: Alek bought blocks with letters written on them.
ref: Alec bought blocks with letters on them.

src: वह सो रहा था और मैंने उसे मार दिया.
mt: He was sleeping and I killed him.
ref: I killed him while he slept.

src: उसने अपने माता-पिता से पूछा कि शायद उनके पास हों.
mt: He asked his parents if they had any.
ref: He asked his parents if they had any.

src: उसने फलों और सब्ज़ियों के स्वादिष्य पेय बनाए.
mt: She made delicious drinks from fruits and vegetables.
ref: She made delicious fruit and vegetable smoothies.

src: उसने कहा कि टीम में शामिल होने के लिए उसका उसके पास ज़रूरी कौशल नहीं है.
mt: He said he did not have the necessary skills to join the team.
ref: He said that her skills aren't good enough to make the team.

src: उसे एहसास हुआ कि वह अपना पर्स घर भूल आई है.
mt: She realized she had left her purse at home.
ref: She realized she had forgotten her wallet at home.

src: उसके बॉस ने बताया कि यह उसके अगले चेक से मिलने लगेगी.
mt: His boss said it would be ready for his next checkup.
ref: Her boss informed her it would be on her next check.

src: वह आगे बढ़ रही थी, पर बहुत तेज़ नहीं.
mt: She was moving forward, but not very fast.
ref: She made progress, but not quickly.

src: सूरज ढलने के बाद, उसके दोस्तों ने बीच में पार्टी की.
mt: After the sun set, his friends had a party in the middle.
ref: His friends threw a party on the beach after the sun went down.

src: उसे चोट नहीं लगी थी, पर उसके कपड़े खराब हो गए थे.
mt: He was not injured, but his clothes were damaged.
ref: He wasn't hurt but his outfit was ruined.

src: एक दिन, किसी अजनबी व्यक्ति ने उससे कहा कि उसे थोड़ा और मुस्कुराना चाहिए.
mt: 1 day, a stranger told her to smile more.
ref: One day, a stranger tells him that he should smile more.

src: उसने टक्कर मारी और रोड पार कर रहे, किसी जॉगर को चोट लग गई.
mt: He hit a jogger crossing the road and injured him.
ref: He struck and injured a jogger who crossed the road.

src: अपना व्यक्तित्व सामने रखने के लिए, उसने स्टेज पर स्कर्ट पहनी.
mt: To show off her personality, she wore a skirt on stage.
ref: To express his individuality he wore a skirt on stage.

src: मैं स्टोर में गया और सजावट का सामान ले आया.
mt: I went to the store and brought home some decorations.
ref: I went to the store and bought decorations.

src: मैंने इस प्रमोशन को पाने के लिए कड़ी मेहनत की है.
mt: I have worked hard to get this promotion.
ref: I have worked very hard to earn this promotion.

src: उसने अपनी रसोई के स्टोव पर, बड़े बर्तन में ग्लिसरीन वाली साबुन बनाई.
mt: She made soap with glycerin in a large pot on her stove.
ref: She made glycerin soap in a big pot on her kitchen stove.

src: उन्हें लाइब्रेरी के पीछे चेक करने का अंदेशा हुआ.
mt: They suspected they were being checked up on from behind the library.
ref: They got a tip to check behind the library.

src: पैट ने बस में पढ़ने के लिए फ़्लेशकार्ड बनाए.
mt: Pat made flashcards to read in the bus.
ref: Pat makes flashcards to read on the bus.

src: उसने कल्पना की थी कि वह बहुत ही स्वादिष्ट खाना बनाएगी.
mt: She had imagined that she would make very delicious food.
ref: She had envisioned herself cooking a fantastic meal.

src: जॉब के किसी इंटरव्यू में, इंटरव्यूअर ने उसके नाम की तारीफ़ की.
mt: In an interview for a job, the interviewer praised his name.
ref: At a job interview, the interviewer praised his name.

src: फिर भी, आज जब वह शॉपिंग करने गई, उसने उसे खो दिया.
mt: However, today when she went shopping, she lost it.
ref: Yet today when she went shopping, she ended up losing it.

src: मैंने तय किया कि मैं उसके लिए स्टार वार्स के टिकट खरीदूँगी.
mt: I decided to buy her Star Wars tickets.
ref: I decided to buy him tickets to Star Wars.

src: बेन, बर्तन धुलने के मामले में इतना आलसी था कि वह गंदे बर्तन में ही खाना खा सकता था.
mt: Ben was so lazy at washing dishes that he could eat his food out of dirty dishes.
ref: Ben was too lazy to wash a dish and but the food on a dirty one.

src: अच्छा हुआ कि वह ठीक थी.
mt: It's a good thing she was okay.
ref: Luckily she was alright.

src: उन्होंने कॉर्नेल में आवेदन किया और साथ में रूम लेने का तय किया.
mt: He applied to Cornell and rented a room there.
ref: They both applied to Cornell and planned to room together.

src: जब सुबह हम उठे, तो वह हमें जमीन पर पड़ी मिली.
mt: When we woke up in the morning, we found her lying on the ground.
ref: We found her on the floor when we woke up in the morning.

src: गाय को खाना खिलाने से पहले, उसने एक छोटी बकरी को खाना खिलाया.
mt: Before feeding the cow, it fed a small goat.
ref: She had fed a small goat before feeding the cow.

src: वह शादी करने के लिए भाग गई थी और उसने संपर्क तोड़ दिया था.
mt: She ran away to get married and cut off contact.
ref: She ran away to get married and did not keep in contact.

src: वह किसी सेलिब्रिटी स्टाइलिस्ट से अपने बाल कटवाना चाहती थी.
mt: She wanted to get her hair cut by a celebrity stylist.
ref: She wanted her hair cut by a celebrity stylist.

src: वह व्यस्त राजधारी शहर को देखकर चकित था.
mt: He was amazed at the bustling capital city.
ref: He was amazed at the busy capital city.

src: गेट इतना छोटा दिख रहा था कि उसके ऊपर से कूद जा सकता था.
mt: The gate was so small that it could be jumped over.
ref: The gate looked low enough to jump.

src: जब मैं थियेटर में पहुँचा, मैं इतना उत्साहित था कि मैं हिल भी नहीं सकता था.
mt: When I reached the theater, I was so excited that I couldn't even stand.
ref: When I got into the theater, I was so excited I almost couldn't move.

src: कुछ समीक्षाएँ पढ़ने के बाद, मैं उस स्टोर पर गया.
mt: After reading some reviews, I went to that store.
ref: I went to the store after reading some reviews.

src: वह अपने स्टैम कलेक्शन के बारे में सोचता है.
mt: He is thinking about his stem cell collection.
ref: He thinks of his stamp collection.

src: वे दोनों एक ही यूनिट में थे और दोनों को एक ही जगह पर तैनात किया गया था.
mt: They were both in the same unit and both were deployed to the same location.
ref: They were in the same unit and were deployed together.

src: उसने मुझे बैठने की जगह दिखाई.
mt: He showed me a place to sit.
ref: He showed me where to sit.

src: वह उसे हमेशा बजाता रहता था.
mt: He always played it for her.
ref: He would play them all the time.

src: वहाँ पूरी दुनिया से हर तरह का खाना था.
mt: There was food from all over the world.
ref: It had all kinds of food from all over the world.

src: वह बहुत ऊपर उठा और गिर गया
mt: It went very high and fell
ref: He got up too high and fell.

src: फिर उसने चाइनीज खाना ऑर्डर किया
mt: 1. He then ordered Chinese food.
ref: Then she ordered Chinese takeout.

src: वह सारा रात्रि भोज बहुत ही अच्छा चल रहा था जब तक उसने अपने खाने का एक भी टुकड़ा नहीं लिया था
mt: The dinner party was going very well until he ate a single bite of his food.
ref: The meal was going well until she took a bite of what she had made.

src: हमने कुकीज बनाए, घर को सजाया और शॉपिंग करने के लिए एक साथ गए
mt: We made cookies, decorated the house, and went shopping together
ref: We baked cookies, decorated the house and went shopping together.

src: जब उस कूड़े को फेंकने के लिए ले जाया गया उसी के साथ गिलहरी भी गायब हो गई
mt: When the trash was taken away, the squirrel went with it
ref: When the trash was taken to the landfill, the squirrel was gone!

src: टॉम राब को उपहार देने के लिए उत्साहित था
mt: Tom Rob was excited to give a gift
ref: Tom was excited to give the gift to Rob.

src: अन्य दूसरे तैराकों से मुकाबला करने के लिए उसने अपने जीवन का सर्वश्रेष्ठ प्रयत्न किया
mt: He gave his best effort to compete against other swimmers
ref: She pushed harder than she ever had to catch the other swimmers.

src: फिर उसे कुछ अजीब लगा
mt: 1. He felt a bit strange.
ref: Then he noticed something odd.

src: वह इसके बारे में कई दिनों तक सोचता रहा
mt: He thought about it for several days
ref: He fretted over it for days.

src: अचानक ही उसे रोक दिया गया
mt: It was suddenly stopped
ref: He eventually got pulled over again.

src: उसने चिड़ियों को गाते सुना, हवा को बहते सुना, और कीट पतंगों की आवाजें भी सुनी।
mt: He heard the birds singing, the wind blowing, and the sounds of insects and bugs.
ref: He heard the birds sing, the wind blow and the crickets creak.

src: टेड ने अलग-अलग खेलों के विषय में समीक्षाएं एवं लेख लिखने शुरू कर दिए।
mt: Ted began writing reviews and articles on different sports.
ref: Ted started to write reviews and articles about different games.

src: उसके बाद टैमी अपनी फेवरेट एरोबिक क्लासेज के लिए जिम की तरफ बढ़ चली।
mt: After that, Tami headed to her favorite aerobics classes at the gym.
ref: Tammy then headed for the gym to her favorite aerobics class.

src: वह अपने पास पड़ोस में 30 मिनट के करीब टहलती है
mt: 30 minutes or so she walks around the neighborhood
ref: She walks for about 30 minutes at a time around the neighborhood.

src: उसने एक आवाज सुनी जो उससे कह रही थी कि किस तल पर जाना है।
mt: She heard a voice telling her which floor to go to.
ref: He heard a voice telling him what floor to go to.

src: किसी ने उसकी गाड़ी में ठोक दिया था और भाग गया था।
mt: Someone had smashed his car window and fled.
ref: Someone had hit his car and just driven away.

src: एक दिन वह सब अपना काम करने बाहर गए और पूरे घर में गैस भर गई।
mt: 1 day he went out to work and all the gas filled the whole house.
ref: They left for work one day, and the gas filled up the house.

src: कारमेन को ऐसी रेसिपी मिली जिसमें पत्ता गोभी का क्रस्ट था।
mt: Carmen was given a recipe with a crust of cabbage.
