ref: Carmen found a recipe that had a cauliflower crust.

src: रुफुस अपने नाखूनों को काटने का निर्णय लेता है।
mt: Rufus decides to cut his nails.
ref: Rufus decides to cut his fingernails one night.

src: उसे अपने सोफे के नीचे एक चवन्नी मिली और अपने ड्रेसर में $1 रुपए मिला।
mt: He found a quarter under his sofa and a dollar in his dresser.
ref: He found a quarter under the couch and a dollar in his dresser.

src: जब वह सिक्योरिटी से होकर गुजरी तब उसने समय वापस चेक किया।
mt: When she passed through security, she checked her watch.
ref: By the time she left securit she checked the time.

src: इस बच्चे को बस यही काम दिया गया था कि वह पाई बनाने के लिए जाकर आडू इकट्ठा करे।
mt: This child was given the task of going to pick apples to make pies.
ref: The kids job was to go and pick the peaches for the pies.

src: कैंडिस में निर्णय किया कि उसे एक अच्छे टैको की रेसिपी चाहिए होगी।
mt: Candice decided that she needed a good taco recipe.
ref: Candice decides she wants to better her taco recipe.

src: उसने 4 साल कॉलेज में कला की पढ़ाई की।
mt: 4 years of college studying art.
ref: He took 4 years worth of art classes in college.

src: उनके पास कोई स्टोव नहीं था इसीलिए उन्होंने चिकन नगेट्स टोस्टर ओवन में बनाए।
mt: They didn't have a stove so they made chicken nuggets in a toaster oven.
ref: There was no stove, so they cooked chicken nuggets in a toaster oven.

src: उसने खुद के ऊपर बहुत ज्यादा जोर देना छोड़ दिया
mt: He stopped pushing himself too hard
ref: He finally stopped being so hard on himself.

src: वह छोटी बच्ची तैर नहीं पा रही थी और अब डूबने लगी थी।
mt: She couldn't swim and was now drowning.
ref: The little girl couldn't swim well and started to sink.

src: वह साथ बैठ गई और हमने घंटों देर तक बात की।
mt: She sat next to me and we talked for hours.
ref: She sat down and we talked for hours.

src: उसे बरसात वाले दिन गाड़ी चला कर अपने स्कूल जाना था।
mt: He was supposed to drive his car to school on a rainy day.
ref: She had to drive to school on a rainy day.

src: मैंने उन सब को प्रिंट कराया।
mt: I have printed all of them.
ref: I got a bunch of them printed.

src: घर पहुंचने पर उसने मूल्य देखा।
mt: He looked up the value when he got home.
ref: He looked up the value when he got home.

src: यह सड़क के पार उछल गयी।
mt: It rolled over the road.
ref: It bounced across the street.

src: हालाँकि, यह एक गलत संकेत था क्योंकि एक ट्रेन पास से निकल रही थी।
mt: However, this was a false alarm as a train was passing by.
ref: However, it was a false alarm since a train was moving close-by.

src: वह सुरक्षा बूथ पर गई और उन्हें 20 डॉलर दे दिए।
mt: 20 dollars were given to them at the security booth.
ref: She ran to the security booth and gave them the $20.

src: यह आश्चर्यजनक रूप से तेज़ था।
mt: It was surprisingly fast.
ref: It was surprisingly fast.

src: उसने भूरे रंग को छिपाने के लिए इसे रंगने के बारे में सोचा।
mt: He thought to color it to hide the brown.
ref: She thought about dyeing it to hide the gray.

src: उसने चारों ओर देखा, और हर कोई अजीब तरह से नाच रहा था।
mt: He looked around, and everyone was dancing strangely.
ref: She looked around, and everyone was dancing weirdly.

src: मैंने कुछ बदलाव किए और दोस्तों ने अन्य में मदद की।
mt: I made some changes and friends helped with others.
ref: I did a few changes and had friends help with others.

src: बहत्तर घंटे में वे लास वेगस पहुंचेंगे।
mt: 72 hours later, they will reach Las Vegas.
ref: In seventy two hours they would arrive in Las Vegas.

src: उनके घर के पास एक गोदी बनायी गयी थी।
mt: A ditch was dug near their home.
ref: A pier was built near his house.

src: रैंडी ने क्लर्क से पूछा कि क्या वह अंगूठी को करीब से देख सकता है।
mt: Randy asked the clerk if he could take a look at the ring up close.
ref: Randy asked the clerk if he could have a closer look at the ring.

src: क्योंकि वे शहर में प्रदर्शन कर रहे थे इसलिए मैंने उससे कह दिया कि मैं जाऊंगा।
mt: Because they were protesting in the city, I told him I would go.
ref: They were in town performing though so I told her I would go.

src: शाय अपने सप्ताहांत की छुट्टी चाहती थी, लेकिन वह शामिल होने के लिए तैयार हो गई।
mt: Shay wanted her weekend off, but she was ready to join in.
ref: Shay wanted her weekend off, but she agreed to come in.

src: वह बूढ़ी और कमजोर होने लगी थी।
mt: She was getting old and weak.
ref: She was starting to get old and frail.

src: मैं एक ऐसे बिंदु पर पहुँच गया जहाँ मैं पॉइंट बैले शूज़ में उत्कृष्टता प्राप्त करना चाहता था।
mt: I have reached a point where I want to excel at pointe ballet shoes.
ref: I got to a point where I wanted to excel to pointe ballet shoes.

src: हर मई हैरी भी अपनी दोस्त मैरी से मिलने के लिए गांव जाता था।
mt: हर मई हैरी भी अपनी दोस्त मैरी से मिलने के लिए गांव जाता था।
ref: Every May Harry would also go to the country to see his friend Mary.

src: जीना को जिम और उससे जुड़ी हर चीज से नफरत थी।
mt: Gene hated gym and everything related to it.
ref: Gina hated gym, and all things related.

src: घास काटने की मशीन में गैस नहीं थी।
mt: The grass cutter had no gas.
ref: The mower was out of gas.

src: इससे वह असहज महसूस कर रही थी इसलिए वह जल्दी से चली गई।
mt: She was feeling uncomfortable so she left quickly.
ref: This made her feel uneasy so she quickly left.

src: एक लोमड़ी सड़क छलाँग लगाकर पार कर गई।
mt: 1 fox jumped over the road.
ref: A fox darted across the road.

src: वे इस साल नदी तक नहीं जा सकते।
mt: They can't go to the river this year.
ref: They can not go to the river this year.

src: उसने इतनी तेजी से गाड़ी चलाई कि उसे सड़क पर एक गड्ढा नहीं दिखाई दिया।
mt: He drove so fast that he didn't see the pothole on the road.
ref: He drove so fast he didn't see a pothole in the road.

src: उसने उसे बड़ा हो जाने के लिए कहा।
mt: He told her to grow up.
ref: She told him to grow up.

src: उसने अपनी पहली वनीला आइसक्रीम के लिए सामग्री इकट्ठी की।
mt: She collected the ingredients for her first vanilla ice cream.
ref: She gathered the ingredients for her first vanilla ice cream.

src: मरियम ने पंडिताऊ होना कभी बंद नहीं किया।
mt: Mariah has never stopped being a panditawee.
ref: Miriam never stopped being pedantic.

src: एक शिक्षक ने हॉल में बैठी लड़कियों को देखा।
mt: A teacher saw girls sitting in the hall.
ref: A teacher spotted the girls sitting in the hall.

src: हम सभी एक घंटे तक हमें लेने के लिए दूसरी बस का इंतजार कर रहे थे।
mt: We were all waiting for another bus for an hour.
ref: We all waited for another bus to show up to pick us up for an hour.

src: सब अपना मन बदलते रहे।
mt: 1. All change their minds.
ref: Everyone kept changing their mind.

src: सोमवार को वह उठी तो उसे पता चला कि 8:45 बज चुके हैं।
mt: 8:45 am, she woke up to find out that it was 8:45 am.
ref: On Monday she awoke to realized it was 8:45.

src: जीना ने मना कर दिया और अपनी आइसक्रीम खाना जारी रखा।
mt: Gene refused and continued eating his ice cream.
ref: Gina refused and continued to eat his ice cream.

src: उसकी हिटिंग स्किल बहुत अच्छी नहीं थी।
mt: His hitting skill was not very good.
ref: He hitting skills were not very good.

src: उसके दादाजी को दिल का दौरा पड़ा और उनकी मृत्यु हो गई थी।
mt: His grandfather had a heart attack and died.
ref: Her grandpa had a heart attack and died.

src: उपहार सुंदर लग रहे थे, सभी पेड़ के नीचे, लिपटे हुए थे।
mt: The gifts looked nice, all under the trees, wrapped up.
ref: The presents looked beautiful, all wrapped up, underneath the tree.

src: पूरे ऑफ सीजन के दौरान जिम ने अपने खेल पर काम किया।
mt: He worked on his game throughout the entire off-season.
ref: During the entire off season, Jim worked on his game.

src: उसने बाहर जाने जैसे अपने अनावश्यक खर्चों में कटौती की।
mt: He cut back on his unnecessary expenses to go out.
ref: She cut off her unnecessary expenses such as going out.

src: उसका कुत्ता, बेट्टी, मुंह में एक कागज़ का स्क्रैप लेकर पास में बैठा था।
mt: His dog, Betty, sat nearby with a piece of paper in its mouth.
ref: His dog, Betty, was sitting nearby with a paper scrap in her mouth.

src: उन्होंने लोगों को एक दिन में सोलह गिलास बेचे।
mt: 16 glasses of beer per day.
ref: They sold sixteen glasses in one day to people.

src: वह कैंडी को जितनी तेजी से मिली, उतनी ही तेजी से खाने लगी।
mt: She ate the candy as fast as she got it.
ref: She began to eat the candy as fast as she got it.

src: उसे लगा कि टेक्सास में सब कुछ बड़ा है और वह बस खो जाएगी।
mt: He thought everything in Texas was big and he would just get lost.
ref: She figured everything is big in Texas and she would just get lost.

src: उसने कार्यस्थल पर कॉल किया और अपने मालिक को बताया कि वह बीमार है।
mt: He called his boss at work and told him he was sick.
ref: He called into work and told his boss he was ill.

src: सैली को चीज़ पसंद नहीं था।
mt: Sally didn't like cheese.
ref: Sally didn't like cheese.

src: आग भी लगी और सभी को स्कूल खाली करना पड़ा।
mt: The fire also broke out and everyone had to evacuate the school.
ref: There was also a fire and everyone had to evacuate the school.

src: ओरेगॉन में, फेलिप ने बड़े पहाड़ों पर चढ़ाई की और स्वादिष्ट भोजन खाया।
mt: In Oregon, Felipe climbed big mountains and ate delicious food.
ref: In Oregon, Felipe hiked great mountains and ate delicious food.

src: स्कोर लगभग बराबर हो गया था।
mt: The score was almost even.
ref: The score was almost tied.

src: लैरी एक दिन खनन कर रहा था और उसने दूर से एक चमक देखी!
mt: Larry was one day mining and he saw a glint in the distance!
ref: Lary was mining one day and saw a sparkle in the distance!

src: उन्होंने खरीदने के लिए सबसे किफायती कारों पर काफी शोध किया।
mt: They did a lot of research on the most affordable cars to buy.
ref: He did a lot of research on the most economical cars to buy.

src: वह अच्छी तरह से सामाजिक नहीं था, इसलिए वह उन पर भौंकने लगा।
mt: 1. He was not well socialized, so he started barking at them.
ref: He was not well-socialized, so he started barking at them.

src: अर्ल चुपके से अपनी नई पोती के लिए पैसे बचा रहा है।
mt: Earl is secretly saving money for his new granddaughter.
ref: Earl has secretly been saving money for his new granddaughter.

src: तीन मर गए और दो जीवित रहे।
mt: 3 died and 2 survived.
ref: Three died and two lived.

src: उसके पास अनेकों आकर्षक हैं।
mt: She has many attractive features.
ref: She has different cute ones.

src: उसे लगा कि वह एक PB&J सैंडविच बना सकता है।
mt: He thought he could make a PB&J sandwich.
ref: He realized he could make a PB&J sandwich.

src: उसने आलू के टुकड़े किए और उन्हें उबलते हुए तेल में डाल दिया।
mt: He cut up the potatoes and put them in boiling oil.
ref: She sliced up potatoes and dropped them in bubbling oil.

src: मैट दौड़ से चूक गए और उन्हें एक व्यापक स्वास्थ्यलाभ की आवश्यकता थी।
mt: Matt missed the race and needed a wide-ranging health benefit.
ref: Matt missed the race and required an extensive rehab.

src: दादी बहुत दूर रहती थीं।
mt: Grandma lived very far away.
ref: Grandma lived very far away.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, बच्चे में जटिलताएं थीं।
mt: Unfortunately, the child had complications.
ref: Unfortunately, the baby had complications.

src: वह जाकर बैठ गया और गिर पड़ा।
mt: 1. He sat down and fell over.
ref: He went to sit down and fell.

src: उसने सब कुछ बाहर निकालने के लिए अपने पति के साथ काम किया।
mt: She worked with her husband to get everything out.
ref: She worked with her husband to move everything out.

src: घर अपने आप में डरावना था।
mt: The house itself was scary.
ref: The house was scary in itself.

src: अंत में उसने अपनी बिस्किट रेसिपी में पारंगत हो गयी।
mt: In the end, she perfected her biscuit recipe.
ref: Finally she has perfected her biscuit recipe.

src: अपनी माँ को दुखी देखने से लूसी को नफरत थी।
mt: Lucy hated seeing her mother unhappy.
ref: Lucy hated seeing her mom unhappy.

src: वह अपने परिवार वालों के आने का इंतज़ार कर रहा था.
mt: He was waiting for his family to arrive.
ref: He waited for his family to arrive.

src: लोगों ने उन पर ज़्यादा ध्यान नहीं दिया.
mt: People didn't pay much attention to them.
ref: They did not get much attention.

src: जैसे ही ट्रक ने रफ़्तार पकड़ी, पिंजड़ा खुल गया और घोड़ा बाहर आ गया.
mt: As the truck picked up speed, the pin popped open and the horse came out.
ref: As the truck accelerated, the cage open and the horse came out.

src: यह एक बुफ़े था, इसलिए उन्हें जो चाहिए था वह मिल गया.
mt: It was a buffet, so they got what they wanted.
ref: It was a buffet so they got what they wanted.

src: आज मोमबत्तियाँ बनाने का दिन था.
mt: Today was the day to make candles.
ref: Today was the day to make the candles.

src: जैसे ही मैंने उसे बॉक्स से बाहर निकाला, मैंने देखा कि वह टूटा हुआ था.
mt: As soon as I pulled it out of the box, I saw that it was broken.
ref: I noticed it was broken as soon as I got it out of the box.

src: जब कॉम्प्टिशन खत्म होने को आया, तो उसने पहले से काफ़ी ज़्यादा अच्छा किया.
mt: When the competition was coming to an end, he had already done much better than before.
ref: Later he did much better as the competition winded down.

src: पतझड़ में, बेन ने अपने मर चुके पौधों से खाद का एक ढेर बनाना शुरू किया.
mt: In the fall, Ben started a pile of compost from his dead plants.
ref: Ben started a compost pile in the fall with his failed plants.

src: खाना माँगवाने का ऑर्डर देने के लिए, उसे उसका फ़ोने नहीं मिल रहा था.
mt: He was unable to call for food orders.
ref: He couldn't find his phone to order carry-out.

src: जेसन को एहसास हुआ कि वह कुछ भी लाना भूल गया है.
mt: Jason realized he forgot to bring something.
ref: Jason realized he had forgotten to bring something.

src: उसने अपने सभी दोस्तों को बुलाया.
mt: He called all his friends.
ref: She invited all her friends.

src: उसने झुंड पर गोली चलाई.
mt: He fired at the flock.
ref: He shot into the flock.

src: उसने तय किया कि उसे थोड़ा और औपचारिक तरह के कपड़े पहनने चाहिए.
mt: He decided that he should wear a little more formal clothing.
ref: She decides she needs to dress a little more formally.

src: आज सुबह वह झील के ऊपर एक सारस को उड़ता हुआ देखकर चकित रह गई.
mt: She was amazed this morning to see a crane flying over the lake.
ref: This morning she was shocked to see a stork flying across the lake.

src: जोडी के बॉस ने उसकी मेहनत को देखा और उसे प्रमोशन देने का तय किया.
mt: Jodie's boss saw her hard work and decided to promote her.
ref: Jody's boss noticed her efforts and decided to give her a promotion.

src: उसकी सबसे बड़ी जीत उस दिन हुई जब उसने एक बड़ा पिज़्ज़ा चुराया.
mt: Her biggest win was when she stole a big pizza.
ref: His crowning triumph was when he stole a large pizza.

src: सु ने कहा कि उस दिन का शेड्यूल उसने नहीं बनाया था.
mt: Su said he had not made the schedule for that day.
ref: Sue said she did not make the schedule the day in question.

src: जंगलों के बीच, नदी के किनारे बना केबिन सुंदर था.
mt: In the middle of the jungle, the cabin by the river was beautiful.
ref: The cabin was beautiful, set in the woods, beside a stream.

src: उसके दोस्तों ने उससे अपनी बात कहने के लिए पेन और पेपर साथ रखने के लिए कहा.
mt: His friends asked him to carry a pen and paper to write down his thoughts.
ref: Her friend told her to take pen and paper so she could communicate.

src: श्नौज़र आमतौर पर इतना नहीं जीते.
mt: Shnajur usually don't win.
ref: Schnauzers usually don't live that long.

src: अगले दिन, उसने खाना काटते समय अपना हाथ काट लिया.
mt: The next day, he cut his hand while cutting food.
ref: The next day, he cut his hand while cutting food.

src: फिर, वह बाइक से किसी फ़ील्ड की तरफ़ चला गया.
mt: Then he walked to a field on a bike.
ref: Then, he rode his bike off to a field.

src: दो साल बाद, उन्हें उनका दूसरा बच्चा हुआ. यह एक लड़का था.
mt: 2 years later, they had their second child. It was a boy.
ref: About two Year's later they had their second child, a boy.

src: स्टोर के मालिक ने क्रिस को गोंद चुराते हुए पकड़ लिया और वह मुश्किल में फँस गया.
mt: The store owner caught Chris stealing glue and he was in trouble.
ref: The store owner caught Chris stealing the gum, and he got in trouble.

src: उसने दोस्त जैक इस बात को समझ गया और उसे पैसे उधार देने के लिए कहा.
mt: He told his friend Jack that he understood this and asked him to lend him money.
ref: His friend Jack noticed this and offered to let him borrow money.

src: वहाँ कई तरह का स्थानीय स्वादिष्ट खाना था!
mt: There was a lot of local delicious food!
ref: There were so many delicious local foods!

src: उसने नहाया और अगले 2 घंटों तक अपने बाल सीधे किया.
mt: She bathed and straightened her hair for the next two hours.
ref: She washed and then spent 2 hours straightening her hair.

src: मुझे उनके पास्ता का चुनाव पसंद है और उनकी कीमतें भी बहुत अच्छी हैं.
mt: I like their pasta choices and their prices are very good.
ref: I love their pasta selection and the prices are amazing!

src: उसे नहीं पता था कि अब वह काम पर जाएगा या नहीं.
mt: He did not know if he would be going to work or not.
ref: He didn't know if he would go back to work.

src: डग और ट्रेसी ने एक दूसरे से एक वादा किया.
mt: Doug and Tracy made a promise to each other.
ref: Doug and Tracy made a commitment to each other.

src: इतने सारे विकल्पों के साथ, वह व्यग्र महसूस कर रहा था।
mt: With so many options, he was feeling overwhelmed.
ref: With so many choices, he felt overwhelmed.

src: लेकिन उनकी पसंदीदा जगह ट्रिनिटी कॉलेज थी।
mt: But her favourite place was Trinity College.
ref: But his favorite place was Trinity College.

src: रे को किताब पढ़ना और अपने MP3 प्लेयर पर संगीत सुनना पसंद था।
mt: Ray liked to read books and listen to music on his MP3 player.
ref: Ray liked to read a book and listen to music on his MP3 player.

src: मुझे आधी रात को मदद के लिए बाहर जाना पड़ा।
mt: I had to go out for help at midnight.
ref: I had to go out in the middle of the night to help.

src: लेकिन फिर उसे कुछ अजीब लगा।
mt: But then it seemed a little strange to him.
ref: But then she found something awful.

src: हालांकि एमिली ने विरोधी टीम के लिए भी गोल किया।
mt: However, Emily also scored for the opposing team.
ref: However emily, on the opposing team also scored.

src: सैली ने उन्हें कुछ दिनों बाद मेल में प्राप्त किया।
mt: Sally received it in the mail a few days later.
ref: Sally got them in the mail a few days later.

src: उस दिन से, फ्रेड अपनी डायरी में जो कुछ भी करता है उसे रिकॉर्ड करता है।
mt: From that day on, Fred records in his diary whatever he does.
ref: From that day forward, Fred records everything he does in his diary.

src: सभी छात्रों को वास्तुकला पसंद आयी।
mt: All the students liked architecture.
ref: All the students loved the architecture.

src: लेकिन जब लड़की आई तो उन्होंने एक-दूसरे को पसंद किया!
mt: But when the girl came, they liked each other!
ref: But when the girl arrived, they liked each other!

src: जैसे ही पिज्जा पक रहा था, जोड़ों को बोर्ड गेम मिल गया।
mt: As the pizza was cooking, the couple got a board game.
ref: As the pizza cooked, the couples got board games.

src: मेरे पिताजी इसे देखना पसंद करते हैं और मैं कभी-कभी उनके साथ बैठकर देखता हूं।
mt: My father likes to watch this and I sometimes sit with him and watch it.
ref: My dad loves to watch it and I sometimes sit with him and watch.

src: वे लगभग हमेशा घर पर होते हैं।
mt: They are usually at home.
ref: They're almost always home.

src: अंत में जब वह वहां पहुंचा तो उसे आखिरी मिली।
mt: In the end, when he got there, he met the last one.
ref: Finally when he got there he got the last one.

src: नील ने दर्जनों पब देखे और दर्जनों पाइंट पिए।
mt: Neil saw dozens of pubs and drank dozens of pints.
ref: Neil saw dozens of pubs and had dozens of pints.

src: फ़्रांसिस्को स्की करना सीखने के लिए एक प्रशिक्षक के साथ काम करता है।
mt: Francisco learns to ski with a trainer.
ref: Francisco works with an instructor to learn how to ski.

src: साईं को बेहतर महसूस कराने में मदद करने के लिए, उनकी माँ ने उनके लिए एक नया स्वेटर खरीदा।
mt: To help Sai feel better, his mother bought him a new sweater.
ref: To try and help Sai feel better, his mom bought him a new sweater.

src: देर हो चुकी थी, और एलिसिया की कार वहां नहीं थी जहां उसने उसे छोड़ा था।
mt: It was late, and Alice's car was not where she had left it.
ref: It got late, and Alycia's car seemed to not be where she left it.

src: एक दिन उन्होंने महसूस किया कि बकरी गायब है।
mt: 1 day they noticed the goat was missing.
ref: One day, she realized the goat was missing.

src: उन्हें जल्द ही पता चला कि उनकी शैलियाँ बेमेल थीं।
mt: They soon discovered that their styles were mismatched.
ref: They soon discovered that their styles were incompatible.

src: एरिक ने बिल को टेनिस बॉल सर्व की।
mt: Eric served Bill a tennis ball serve.
ref: Eric served the tennis ball to Bill.

src: वह उन्हें उनके घर के पास Marshall's ले गई।
mt: She took them to Marshall's near their home.
ref: She took them to the Marshall's near their home.

src: एक दिन उसने देखा कि उसके पेड़ में अब बहुत सारी गिलहरियाँ हैं।
mt: 1 day he saw that his tree had many squirrels.
ref: One day, she noticed there were now lots of squirrels in her tree.

src: मैंने अपनी भतीजी को चलाना सीखने में मदद करने का फैसला किया।
mt: I decided to help my niece learn to drive.
ref: I decided to help my niece learn to ride.

src: उसने कूल होने का नाटक करते हुए कमरे के बाहर दोस्तों से बात की।
mt: He pretended to cool off by talking to friends outside the room.
ref: She talked with friends outside the room while pretending to be cool.

src: वह बहुत दुखी थी।
mt: She was very sad.
ref: She was very sad.

src: वह वहां जाने के समय के साथ इसे अपडेट करेगा।
mt: He will update it as he goes.
ref: He would update it with the times he went there.

src: मुझे घबराहट हुई जब मुझे कुछ जली हुई गंध आने लगी।
mt: I felt a little queasy when I started to smell something burning.
ref: To my dismay I smelled something burnt.

src: नाश्ते के बाद लौरा घर से निकली और बस में चढ़ गई।
mt: After breakfast, Laura left the house and got on the bus.
ref: After breakfast, Laura left her house and got on the bus.

src: तभी रे ने एक जोरदार, वीभत्स दरार और एक तेज़ क्रैश सुना।
mt: Then Ray heard a loud, violent crack and a crash.
ref: Then Ray heard a loud, sickening crack, and a loud crash.

src: उन्होंने कुछ ड्रिंक पिए।
mt: They drank some drinks.
ref: They had a few drinks.

src: मुझे लगा कि मैं अभी अंदर जाऊंगा और उल्लू बना दूंगा।
mt: I thought I would go in and make a fool of myself.
ref: I figured i would just go in and fake it.

src: नैट के माता-पिता घर गए और लंबी बात की।
mt: The parents of Natt went home and had a long talk.
ref: Nate's parents went home and had a long talk.

src: वह वहां परोसे जाने वाले पास्ता को पसंद करती है।
mt: She likes the pasta served there.
ref: She loves the pastas that they serve there.

src: मैंने अपने पसंदीदा ब्रांड का नूडल्स खरीदा।
mt: I bought my favorite brand of noodles.
ref: I purchased my favorite brand of noodles.

src: पीट को उसके रियल्टर द्वारा दिया गया अनुबंध नहीं मिल रहा था।
mt: The lease was not being honored by the landlord.
ref: Pete could not find the contract given to him by his realtor.

src: एक दिन मनोरंजन पार्क में उसने अपने डर का सामना करने का फैसला किया।
mt: 1 day ago, he decided to face his fear at an amusement park.
ref: One day at the amusement park he decided to face his fears.

src: डरावने रूप से, उसकी त्वचा गुलाबी हो गई थी।
mt: Scary, her skin turned pink.
ref: To her horror, her skin had turned pink.

src: हालांकि, एक दिन जैक्सन के बॉस ने उन्हें बीयर के लिए एक बार में आमंत्रित किया।
mt: However, one day Jackson's boss invited him to a bar for a beer.
ref: However, one day Jackson's boss invited him to a bar for a beer.

src: मेंढक चुपचाप मक्खी तक तैर कर गया।
mt: A frog silently swam to a fly.
ref: The frog swam up to the fly quietly.

src: अंत में उसने अपना बिस्तर बनाना शुरू करने का फैसला किया।
mt: In the end, he decided to start making his bed.
ref: Finally he decided to start making his bed.

src: मैं तुरंत ठहर गया।
mt: I stopped immediately.
ref: I froze immediately.

src: उनकी हार उनकी जीत की तुलना में बहुत तेजी से बढ़ रही थी।
mt: Their loss was growing much faster than their victory.
ref: His losses were piling up a lot faster than his wins.

src: तस्वीरों ने उन पलों को दिखाया जहां मैं अस्पताल में था।
mt: The pictures show the moments I was in the hospital.
ref: The pictures showed the moments where I was in the hospital.

src: मैथ्यू जाने लगा।
mt: Matthew went to bed.
ref: Matthew stomped.

src: ट्रायआउट से एक महीने पहले तक, वह अपने दम पर दौड़ी।
mt: 1 month before the trial, he ran on his own.
ref: For a month before tryouts, she ran on her own.

src: मैं बहुत देर तक शांत रहा।
mt: I was very quiet for a long time.
ref: I was quiet for a long time.

src: जैक गलती से कैक्टस पर बैठ गया।
mt: Jack fell down and out of a cactus.
ref: Jack accidentally sat on a cactus.

src: वह स्टोर पर बैग बॉय था।
mt: He was a bag boy at the store.
ref: He was a bag boy at the store.

src: एक दिन, उसकी सहेली ने सुझाव दिया कि वे मेकओवर करे।
mt: One day, her friend suggested they get a makeover.
ref: One day, her friend suggested they do makeovers.

src: कुछ महीने बाद, उसका गर्भपात हो गया।
mt: 3 months later, she had a miscarriage.
ref: A couple months in, she had a miscarriage.

src: इसलिए उसने अपने शहर की वार्षिक मॉडलिंग प्रतियोगिता में प्रवेश किया।
mt: So he entered his city's annual modeling competition.
ref: So she entered her town's annual modeling contest.

src: उसके माता-पिता ने उससे कहा कि उसे साफ़ सफाई के लिए दिन की छुट्टी मिलेगी।
mt: His parents told him that he would get a day off for cleaning.
ref: His parents told him he would get days off for dusting.

src: एक कार अचानक आयी और उसे टक्कर मार दी।
mt: A car suddenly came and hit him.
ref: A car suddenly flew into it and struck her.

src: जब वह बाहर गया तो पता चला कि अभी काफी अंधेरा है।
mt: When he went outside, he found it was still quite dark.
ref: When he went outside he discovered it was much to dark.

src: कुछ वर्षों में उसने अपना सारा ओवरटाइम वेतन बचा लिया था और उसके पास बहुत सारी नकदी थी।
mt: He had saved all his overtime pay for a few years and had a lot of cash.
ref: In a few Years he had saved all his overtime pay and had lots of cash.

src: मैंने अपनी रचनाओं को कई लोगों के साथ शेयर किया।
mt: I have shared my creations with many people.
ref: I shared my creations with several people.

src: हमारी बिल्ली बहुत चुस्त है।
mt: Our cat is very active.
ref: Our cat is very picky.

src: वेबसाइट ने धीरे-धीरे बढ़ी और ध्यान आकर्षित किया।
mt: The website grew slowly and attracted attention.
ref: The website slowly built and gained attention.

src: जेफ़ ने उसे नजरअंदाज किया और घेरे की ओर भागा।
mt: Jeff ignored him and ran towards the circle.
ref: Jeff ignored him and ran towards the hoop.

src: उन्होंने हमें यह सीखने में मदद की कि हम अपने तंबू कैसे बनाते हैं।
mt: They taught us how to make our tents.
ref: He helped us learn how to make our own tents.

src: कुछ सब्जियां और जूस के कंटेनर 50% की छूट पर थे।
mt: 50% off on some vegetables and juice containers.
ref: Some were vegetables and juice containers for a 50% discount.

src: जॉय ने तुरंत दूसरी नौकरी की तलाश शुरू कर दी।
mt: Joy immediately began looking for another job.
ref: Joey began looking for another job right away.

src: एक दिन उन्होंने craigslist पर लोगों से मिलने का फैसला किया।
mt: 1 day later, they decided to meet people on craigslist.
ref: One day he decided to meet people on craigslist.

src: एमी को संदेह था, लेकिन वह इसे एक मौका देने के लिए तैयार हो गई।
mt: Amy was skeptical, but she was willing to give it a chance.
ref: Amy was skeptical, but she agreed to give it a shot.

src: उसने कुछ फ्राइड चिकन और मैश्ड पोटैटो ऑर्डर करने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to order some fried chicken and mashed potatoes.
ref: She decided to order some fried chicken and mashed potatoes.

src: वह दिन भर सोती रही।
mt: She slept all day.
ref: She slept all day long.

src: दो घंटे के बाद वे थक गए और विश्राम किया।
mt: 2 hours later they got tired and rested.
ref: After two hours, they got tired and took a break.

src: ताड़ के पेड़ के पत्ते इतनी जोर से उड़ रहे थे कि उन्होंने खिड़कियां तोड़ दीं।
mt: The leaves of the palm tree were flying so hard that they broke the windows.
ref: The palm tree fronds were blowing so hard they scraped the windows.

src: पुस्तक में आवश्यक ड्राइंग आपूर्ति की खरीदारी की सूची है।
mt: The book contains a list of supplies needed to purchase for essential drawings.
ref: The book has a shopping list of necessary drawing supplies.

src: अंत में, एक दिन उसने स्कूल छोड़ने का साहस किया।
mt: In the end, one day he had the courage to skip school.
ref: Finally, one day she had the courage to drop out of school.

src: उसने तब तक इंतजार किया जब तक कि सभी सो नहीं गए और चुपके से बाहर निकल गयी।
mt: He waited until everyone was asleep and snuck out quietly.
ref: She waited until everyone fell asleep and sneaked out.

src: आइवी राज़ी हो गयी।
mt: Ivory Razie has been released.
ref: Ivy agreed.

src: वो निर्माण के लिए एक डेवलपर के पास योजनाएँ ले गए।
mt: He took the plans to a developer.
ref: He took the plans to a developer to build.

src: लॉरेन और उनकी बहनें एक क्यूट कैफे के सामने पोज दिया।
mt: Lauren and her sisters posed in front of a cute cafe.
ref: Lauren and her sisters pose in front of a cute cafe.

src: उसने उसे कई बार ढूंढ लिया लेकिन फिर वह गायब हो गया।
mt: He searched for him several times, but then he disappeared.
ref: She found him a few times but then he disappeared.

src: ट्रैफिक पुलिस वाले ने उसे रोक लिया।
mt: Traffic police stopped him.
ref: A traffic cop pulled him over.

src: वह एक सप्ताह तक प्रतिदिन अपनी बांसुरी पर अभ्यास करती रही।
mt: She practiced on her flute every day for a week.
ref: She practiced on her flute everyday for a week.

src: उसकी पत्नी को अंगूर से नफरत थी, उसकी बेटी को सेब से नफरत थी।
mt: His wife hated grapes, his daughter hated apples.
ref: His wife hated grapes, his daughter hated apples.

src: उसका बच्चा शेरों से बहुत डरता था।
mt: His child was very afraid of lions.
ref: Her child was very afraid of the lions.

src: उन्होंने अपनी टीम के साथ स्कूल के बाद जिम में अभ्यास किया।
mt: They practiced after school with their team at the gym.
ref: She practiced in the gym after school with her team.

src: उसके कोच ने उन्हें बहुत ही प्रेरक भाषण दिया।
mt: His coach gave him a very inspiring speech.
ref: Her coach gave them a very inspiring speech.

src: वह जितना समय बिना बातचीत के रही, उतनी ही मुश्किल होती गई।
mt: The longer she remained silent, the more difficult it became.
ref: The longer she went without interacting, the more difficult it became.

src: उसने सोचा कि वह पाइजन आइवी लता के एक पैच में गिर गया है।
mt: He thought he had fallen into a patch of poison ivy.
ref: He thought he had fallen into a patch of poison ivy.

src: मेरा बेटा क्रोगर में काम करता है, उन्होंने हाल ही में ब्लू बेले के बारे में एक बैठक की थी।
mt: My son works at Kroger, he recently attended a meeting about Blue Bell.
ref: My son works at Kroger, they recently had a meeting about Blue Belle.

src: उसने सोचा कि वह इसमें अपना सर्वश्रेष्ठ प्रयास देगा।
mt: He thought he would give his best effort in it.
ref: He thought he would just give it his best try.

src: वे लंबे समय से वहां हैं।
mt: They have been there for a long time.
ref: They are there for a long time.

src: कायला ने गलती से अपना कुछ वैनिला लेटे किताब पर गिरा दिया।
mt: Kayla accidentally dropped her vanilla latte on her copy of Let's Pretend This Never Happened.
ref: Kayla accidentally spilled some of her vanilla latte on the book.

src: लेनी ने तीन हॉरर फिल्में किराए पर लीं।
mt: Leni rented three horror movies.
ref: Lenny rented three horror movies.

src: लौरा ने भीड़ को आश्वस्त किया जो बहुत पहले थी।
mt: Laura reassured the crowd who were very early.
ref: Laura assured the crowd that was long ago.

src: चार्ली को समुदाय के साथ मेलजोल करना अच्छा लगता था.
mt: Charlie liked to socialize with the community.
ref: Charlie liked interacting with the community.

src: छोटी उम्र वाला कुत्ता बहुत अकेला हो गया था.
mt: The young dog was very lonely.
ref: The younger dog was very lonely.

src: शॉन पहले तो विरोध करता है, लेकिन आख़िरकार वह अपने कपड़े धोता है.
mt: 1st he resists, but eventually he takes off his clothes.
ref: Sean protests at first, but finally he cleans his laundry.

src: उसने बहुत मेहनत से पढ़ाई की और फिर से परीक्षा दिया.
mt: She worked hard and retake the exam.
ref: She studied very hard and took it again.

src: हालांकि जैसे ही उसने अपने पैर अंदर डाले, लहर ने उस पर कब्ज़ा कर लिया.
mt: As soon as he put his feet in, the wave took over.
ref: As she put her feet in however, the wave captured her.

src: उसने गलती से एक हुक से अपनी उंगली भी, चुभो ली.
mt: He also accidentally poked his finger with a hook.
ref: He accidentally pricked his finger with one of the hooks, too.

src: वह रेस्तरां पर जल्दी पहुंच गई और अपनी डेट का इंतज़ार करने लगी.
mt: She quickly arrived at the restaurant and waited for her date.
ref: She got to the restaurant early and waited for her date.

src: मां ने लड़के को बताया कि सांता ही उपहार लाता था.
mt: The mother told the boy that Santa was the one who brought the gifts.
ref: The mom told the boy that Santa was responsible for bringing presents.

src: कांपते हुए, उसने अपने आस-पास रखी कंबलों का एक समूह खींच लिया.
mt: He pulled a group of blankets from around him.
ref: Shivering, he pulled a bunch of blankets around himself.

src: एंथनी ने मेहनत से पढ़ाई किया, और आख़िरकार उसने भाषा को सीख लिया.
mt: Anthony worked hard at his studies, and eventually he learned the language.
ref: Anthony studied hard, and eventually he learned the language.

src: आधे आइटम तो दुकान में ख़त्म हो गए थे.
mt: 50% of the items were sold out.
ref: The store was out of half the items.

src: तब, जोनी ने बाहर से एक जानी-पहचानी आवाज़ आती सुनी.
mt: Then, Johnny heard a familiar voice calling from outside.
ref: Then, Joanie heard a familiar sound coming from outside.

src: कॉर्नेलिया खिड़की के बगल में बैठने के लिए अपना बिस्तर ले जाती है.
mt: Cornelia window sits on her bed to watch the sunset.
ref: Cornelia moves her bed to sit next to the window.

src: पिछले हफ़्ते तक जब उसने टक्कर मारी थी.
mt: He had been driving the wrong way for the past week.
ref: Up until last week when he wrecked.

src: उसे ख़ास तौर से एक छोटी बूढ़ी औरत से बात करने में सही में बहुत मज़ा आता था.
mt: He especially enjoyed talking to an old woman in particular.
ref: She really enjoyed talking to a little old lady in particular.

src: वे सामान्य प्रवेश क्षेत्र में गए.
mt: They went to the general entry area.
ref: They went into the general admission area.

src: हालांकि, एक दिन उसकी कार का फ़्लैट टायर था और वह चाहता था कि उसके पास फ़ोन होता.
mt: However, one day his car had a flat tire and he wanted a phone.
ref: However, one day his car had a flat tire and he wished he had a phone.

src: तभी उसने अख़बार में एक कूपन देखा.
mt: He then saw an ad in the newspaper for a coupon.
ref: Then he saw a coupon in the paper.

src: पानी का इस्तेमाल करने के बारे में सोचने के बाद मैंने स्टोर पर जाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: After thinking about using water, I decided to go to the store.
ref: After contemplating using water I decided to go to the store.

src: फिर उसने फ़ैसला किया कि उसे कुछ मछली भी, चाहिए.
mt: So he decided he needed some fish too.
ref: Then she decided she wanted some fish, too.

src: ली हर रोज़ हॉली को याद करके बहुत उदास था.
mt: Holly was sad every day remembering Lee.
ref: Lee was very sad missing Holly everyday.

src: स्टोर में एक बड़ी सेल लगी थी.
mt: A large screen was in the store.
ref: The store was having a big sale.

src: वह अपने परिवार के साथ साल्ट लेक एयरपोर्ट पर था और उसने अपने हीरो को देखा.
mt: He was at Salt Lake Airport with his family and saw his hero.
ref: He was at the Salt Lake Airport with his family and saw his hero.

src: उसने उसे सावधानी से लपेटा और उसे एक सुरक्षित घर बना दिया.
mt: He wrapped him carefully and made him a safe home.
ref: She wrapped it carefully and made it a safe home.

src: मैं चुपचाप ऑफ़िस गया और इसे दे दिया.
mt: I went to the office quietly and handed it over.
ref: I quietly went to the office and turned it in.

src: दस लोगों ने मुझसे इसके बारे में पूछा.
mt: 10 people asked me about it.
ref: Ten people asked me about it.

src: बाद में, बैंक ने उसे यह कहते हुए बुलाया कि उसने ओवर-ड्राफ़्ट किया है.
mt: Later, the bank called him to say he had overdrawn.
ref: Later, the bank called him saying he over-drafted.

src: अपने फ़ोन में एक ऐप इंस्टॉल करके, उसने अपनी फ़्रेंच की कोशिश शुरू कर दी.
mt: He installed an app on his phone and started his French lesson.
ref: Installing an app on his phone, he began practicing his french.

src: उन्होंने मुझे दिखाया कि मैं जो कुछ भी चाहता था उसे कैसे टाइप और सर्च करना था.
mt: He showed me how to type and search for whatever I wanted.
ref: He showed me how to type and search anything I wanted.

src: उसने कई दिनों तक तैयारी की जब तक इंटरव्यू के लिए ख़ुद को तैयार महसूस नहीं कर रहा था.
mt: He prepared for several days until he felt ready for the interview.
ref: He prepped for many days until he felt prepared for the interview.

src: उन्होंने उसे अच्छी तरह से पाला और उसने बहुत खुशहाल जीवन व्यतीत किया।
mt: He raised her well and she led a very happy life.
ref: They raised him well and he led a very happy life.

src: वह एक साथ पहाड़ों पर चढ़ने वाले लोगों के एक क्लब में शामिल हो गई।
mt: She joined a club of people who climb mountains together.
ref: She joined a club of people who climbed mountains together.

src: इस बात से फ्रेड बहुत नाराज हो गया।
mt: Fred was very upset about this.
ref: Fred became very angry about this.

src: उसने हाल ही में तीन में से दो केबल बॉक्स लौटा दिए।
mt: He recently returned two of three cable boxes.
ref: She recently returned two of three cable boxes.

src: एक दिन वह घर में खाने के लिए पिस्ते का जार खरीदता है।
mt: 1 day he buys a jar of pistachios at home.
ref: One day he buys a jar of pistachios to eat at home.

src: शेरोन ने उन्हें प्लांटर्स में डाल दिया, यह विश्वास करते हुए कि वे छोटे पौधे हो जायेंगे।
mt: Sharon planted them in the planters, believing they would be small plants.
ref: Sharon put them in planters, believing they would be small plants.

src: उसने पार्क में जाने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to go to the park.
ref: She decided to go to the park.

src: उसका पहला हफ्ता ठीक था, लेकिन जल्द ही उसका पानी खत्म हो गया।
mt: His first week was fine, but soon his water ran out.
ref: His first week was ok, but soon he ran out of water.

src: हालाँकि वह एक अंतरिक्ष यात्री बनने के लिए बहुत छोटा था।
mt: However, he was too young to become an astronaut.
ref: However he was to young to be an astronaut.

src: उसने हमें केंद्र द्वारा जारी कैलेंडर दिया।
mt: He gave us the calendar issued by the center.
ref: She gave us a calendar issued by the center.

src: सौभाग्य से कल उनकी अच्छी कमाई हुई।
mt: 1. They are lucky to have a good income.
ref: Luckily they had great earnings yesterday.

src: जब बी शुरू हुई, तो जेन बच गई और दूसरे बाहर निकल गए।
mt: When B started, Jen escaped and the others came out.
ref: When the Bee started, Jen survived as others got knocked out.

src: मैं कह सकता था कि वह मुझे अंदर ले जाने के लिए अनिच्छुक थी।
mt: I could have said that he was reluctant to take me inside.
ref: I could tell she was reluctant to let me in.

src: अचानक तेज हवा चलने लगी।
mt: Suddenly, the wind picked up.
ref: Suddenly the wind began to pick up severely.

src: एंड्रयू के दोस्त आए और ड्रिंक करना चाहते थे।
mt: Andrew's friends came and wanted to drink.
ref: Andrew's friends came over and wanted to drink.

src: एक दिन एक बर्फीले तूफान के कारण उसके शहर के घर में बिजली चली गई।
mt: 1 day ago, a snowstorm caused power to go out at her home in the city.
ref: One day an ice storm caused the power to go out in her city home.

src: वह उसे सीधे स्केटपार्क ले गया।
mt: He took her straight to the skate park.
ref: He took it straight to the skatepark.

src: उसे लगा कि उसके पैरों में भी खुजली हो रही है।
mt: He felt like he had itching in his feet too.
ref: He felt his legs become itchy too.

src: आधे रास्ते में ही उनकी कार खराब हो गई।
mt: Their car broke down halfway.
ref: Halfway through, her car broke down.

src: वह चाहती थी कि डैन उसे स्कूल डांस के लिए कहे।
mt: She wanted Dan to ask her to school dance.
ref: She wanted Dan to ask her to the school dance.

src: जैसे ही मैं अंदर गया, उनके पास आज़माने के लिए अद्भुत सलाद और जूस थे।
mt: As soon as I went in, they had amazing salads and juices to try.
ref: As I walked in, they had amazing salads and juices to try.

src: इसलिए उसने अपनी दीवारों को नीले रंग से रंगने का फैसला किया।
mt: So he decided to paint his walls blue.
ref: So she decided to have her walls painted blue.

src: मैंने अपने जीवन में पहले कभी नहीं खेला है।
mt: I have never played in my life.
ref: I've never played before in my life.

src: बर्फ साफ करने में उसे एक घंटे का समय लगा।
mt: It took him an hour to clean the ice.
ref: It took her an hour to clear the snow.

src: पत्रकार ने उसे बताया कि यह एक लाइव शो था।
mt: A reporter told him it was a live show.
ref: The journalist informed him it was a live show.

src: उसने अपने प्रबंधक और सहकर्मियों से कुछ स्पष्टवादी बातें कीं।
mt: He had some frank conversations with his manager and colleagues.
ref: He spoke some unflattering things to his manager and co-workers.

src: एक दिन हालांकि सारसों ने आना बंद कर दिया।
mt: 1 day later, the sarus stopped coming.
ref: One day though the cranes stopped coming around.

src: हम मैदान पर उतरे और खेल से पहले अभ्यास किया।
mt: We came out onto the field and practiced before the game.
ref: We got on the field and practiced before the game.

src: उसने बहुत मेहनत की और उसे अच्छे ग्रेड मिले।
mt: 1. He worked hard and got good grades. 2. He worked hard and got good grades.
ref: She worked very hard and it paid off with good grades.

src: उसकी नाना ने सोफी को उनका बेशकीमती सोने का लॉकेट दिया।
mt: Her grandmother gave Sophie her precious gold locket.
ref: Her nana gave Sophie her prized gold locket.

src: जब वह वहां पहुंची और महिला से मिली , उसने सवालों के जवाब दिए.
mt: When she arrived and met the woman, she answered questions.
ref: When she got there and met with the woman, she answered questions.

src: उसने आधे घंटे तक कोशिश की लेकिन वह बचती रही।
mt: She tried for half an hour but she was saved.
ref: He tried for half an hour but it kept evading him.

src: जैक और उसके दोस्त हर कमरे के अंदर गए।
mt: Jack and his friends went into every room.
ref: Zack and his friends went inside every room.

src: काफी रकम गंवाने के बाद, उसने स्लॉट खेले।
mt: After losing a lot of money, he played the slots.
ref: After losing a considerable amount of money, she played slots.

src: वह हाईकिंग के जूते की एक जोड़ी खरीदने का फैसला करती है।
mt: She decides to buy a pair of hiking boots.
ref: She decides to buy a pair of hiking boots.

src: उसने अपने घर में हर जगह देखा।
mt: He looked everywhere in his house.
ref: He looked everywhere in his house.

src: अगले दिन वह पैसे लेकर काम पर गया और उसे वापस कर दिया।
mt: The next day he went to work with the money and returned it.
ref: The next day he took the money to work and turned it in.

src: दुर्भाग्य से वे बेकार हैं।
mt: Unfortunately, they are useless.
ref: Unfortunately they're wasteful.

src: बैरी स्टेडियम गया, और एक टिकट खरीदा।
mt: 1. He went to Barry Stadium, and bought a ticket.
ref: Barry went to the stadium, and purchased a ticket.

src: हमने कटोरे में रेड वाइन आज़मायी।
mt: We tasted red wine in a bowl.
ref: We tried red wine in bowls.

src: और उसने स्पिल को ठीक से साफ करने की जहमत नहीं उठाई।
mt: And he did not even bother to clean the spill properly.
ref: And she didn't think bother to clean the spill properly.

src: हालांकि बच्चों के लिए बिल्कुल तैयार नहीं थे, फिर भी वे अकेलापन महसूस करते थे।
mt: Though not ready for children, they still felt lonely.
ref: Although not quite ready for kids, they still felt lonely.

src: लोग एक दूसरे को रास्ते से हटाने लगे।
mt: People started pushing each other out of the way.
ref: People started pushing others out of the way.

src: मुझे अग्रिम पंक्ति में था।
mt: I was in the front line.
ref: I got to be in the front row.

src: वह जनवरी में जिम गया और स्वस्थ भोजन किया।
mt: He went to the gym in January and ate healthy.
ref: He went to the gym in January and ate healthier.

src: उन्होंने कहा कि अगर उसने अपना अंतिम सेमेस्टर अच्छा किया, तो वह छुट्टी चुनेगी।
mt: He said if he did well in his final semester, he would take a break.
ref: They said if she did well her last semester, she picks the vacation.

src: हमने अपने घर के बाहर लगाने का फैसला किया।
mt: We have decided to put it outside our house.
ref: We decided to set up outside our house.

src: मैं उन्हें आपात स्थिति में उपयोग करने के लिए अपने बैग पर रखता हूं।
mt: I keep them in my bag for emergencies.
ref: I put them on my bag to use in case of emergencies.

src: उसने अपनी मां से कहा कि वह अपना नाम बदलना चाहता है।
mt: He told his mother that he wanted to change his name.
ref: He told his mother he wanted to change his name.

src: अंत में उन्हें एक सुंदर घर मिला जिस उन्होंने पसंद किया।
mt: In the end they found a beautiful house that they liked.
ref: Finally they found a beautiful home they loved.

src: जब वह घर के सामने आया तो उसने दरवाजे की घंटी बजाई।
mt: When he came home, he rang the doorbell.
ref: When he got into the front of the house, he rang the doorbell.

src: आखिरकार वह उसे ऑटो स्टोर पर ले गई।
mt: Finally, she took him to the auto store.
ref: Eventually she took it to the auto store.

src: ट्रिक करने के दौरान जो गिर गया और उसका हाथ टूट गया।
mt: 1. He fell while trying to trick and broke his hand.
ref: While doing a trick, Joe fell and broke his arm.

src: उसने अपनी पाठ्यक्रम की ज़रूरतों और खरीदारी सूचियों को देखा।
mt: She looked at her course requirements and shopping lists.
ref: She looked up her course requirements and shopping lists.

src: कौतुहलवश उसने वहां ट्रेन पकड़ ली।
mt: He curiously boarded the train.
ref: Intrigued, he took a train there.

src: मैंने जागते रहने और कुछ असाइनमेंट पर काम करने की कोशिश की।
mt: I tried to stay awake and work on some assignments.
ref: I tried to remain awake and work on a few assignments.

src: अमांडा ने गिलहरी को देखा जब वह एकोर्न को अपने घोंसले में ले गयी।
mt: Amanda saw the squirrel when it was carrying an acorn to its nest.
ref: Amanda watched the squirrel as he carried the acorns to his nest.

src: इस गर्मी में टेरी ने फैसला किया कि वह पानी में गोता लगाना सीखना चाहता है।
mt: This summer, Terry decided that he wanted to learn to swim.
ref: This summer Terry decides he wants to learn how to dive in the water.

src: इस जगह में कई शानदार एक्ज़िबिट और इंटरैक्टिव डिस्प्ले थे।
mt: There were many great exhibits and interactive displays here.
ref: The place had many cool exhibits and interactive displays.

src: कायली और जेम्स एक दूसरे को पसंद करने लगे और जल्द ही डेटिंग करने लगे।
mt: Kelly and James started liking each other and soon started dating.
ref: Kaylee and James started to like each other and soon started dating.

src: वह वास्तव में आइसक्रीम की दुकान में जगह पाना चाहती थी।
mt: She was actually looking for a place to sell ice cream.
ref: She really wanted to get the position at the ice cream shop.

src: उसने अपने पूरे शरीर की मालिश करवाई।
mt: He massaged his whole body.
ref: She had her whole body massaged.

src: बॉब खुश था क्योंकि यह उसे मिला सबसे बड़ा बोनस था।
mt: Bob was happy because it was the biggest bonus he had ever received.
ref: Bob was happy because it was the biggest bonus he had gotten.

src: उसने हमें खुद के लिए जुगाड़ करने के लिए कहा।
mt: He told us to make our own arrangements.
ref: She told us to fend for ourselves.

src: मैरी दुखी थी कि पूरा परिवार एक साथ नहीं होगा।
mt: Mary was sad that the whole family would not be together.
ref: Mary was sad that the whole family would not be together.

src: उसने उन्हें कुछ डॉलर दिए।
mt: He gave them some dollars.
ref: She handed them a couple of dollars.

src: हम एक हवाई जहाज के टिकट के लिए ऑनलाइन तलाश करने के लिए आगे बढ़े।
mt: We are going to look online for a plane ticket.
ref: We proceeded to look online for an airplane ticket.

src: उसने पाया कि उसके खरगोश के छोटे बच्चे थे।
mt: He found that his rabbit had small children.
ref: She found that her rabbit had bunnies.

src: इससे पहले कि मैं यह जान पाता, वास्तव में देर हो चुकी थी।
mt: I was about to say that, but it was too late.
ref: Before I knew it it was really late.

src: पूरे दिन, काम पर रहते हुए, उन्होंने अपने सहकर्मियों की तारीफ की।
mt: All day, while working, they praised their colleagues.
ref: All day, while at work, he complimented his coworkers.

src: जब वह जा रहा था तभी एक बड़ी ईंट गिरी और उसके सिर पर जा लगी।
mt: As he was walking, a large brick fell and hit him on the head.
ref: While he was walking, a large brick fell and hit him on the head.

src: हर गर्मियों में उसके माता-पिता उसे कैंपिंग ट्रिप पर ले जाते थे।
mt: Every summer, her parents took her camping trips.
ref: Every summer his parents made him go on a camping trip.

src: कुछ दिनों बाद, जॉर्ज आश्चर्य से जागा।
mt: A few days later, George awoke in astonishment.
ref: A few days later, George awoke to a surprise.

src: उसके कुछ दोस्त राजी थे।
mt: Some of his friends were willing.
ref: Some of his friends agreed.

src: कैमरन ने पोस्ट को देखा, और रोबी और उसकी कार के लिए सहानुभूति महसूस की।
mt: Cameron saw the post, and felt sympathy for Robbie and his car.
ref: Cameron saw the post, and felt sympathy for Robbie and her car.

src: लेकिन वह फीते नहीं बाँध सका क्योंकि फीते गायब थे!
mt: But he couldn't tie the ribbon because the ribbons were missing!
ref: But he couldn't lace them up because the strings were missing!

src: एक दिन उसका वाटर ब्रेक हुआ और उसे अस्पताल ले जाया गया।
mt: 1 day later his water broke and he was taken to the hospital.
ref: One day her water broke and she was taken to the hospital.

src: कुछ महीने पहले उन्हें एक रोलेक्स मिली।
mt: They got a Rolex a few months ago.
ref: A few months ago he found a Rolex.

src: मैं अपने भतीजे के साथ शहर भर में बाइक चलाने से डरता था।
mt: I was afraid to ride my nephew around town on a bike.
ref: I was afraid to bike across the city with my nephew in tow.

src: उसके दोस्त एक मेज पर इंतजार कर रहे थे लेकिन पहले ही ऑर्डर कर चुके थे।
mt: His friends were waiting at a table but had already ordered.
ref: Her friends were waiting at a table but had already ordered.

src: मेरी बेटियों ने एक दोस्ताना पिल्ले को चुना।
mt: My daughters chose a friendly puppy.
ref: My daughters picked out a friendly puppy.

src: उसने खुशी से शेव और स्नान किया।
mt: He shaved and bathed happily.
ref: He shaved and showered happily.

src: वह कोज़ूमेल ​​समुद्र तट पर गया और कुछ जमीन खरीदी।
mt: He went to the beach at Kozumel and bought some land.
ref: He went to the Cozumel beach and bought some land.

src: उसने उसे एक आवेदन भरने की सलाह दी।
mt: He advised her to fill out an application.
ref: He advised her to complete an application.

src: दोनों में से कोई भी इस लंच रूम में नहीं था।
mt: Neither of them was in this lunch room.
ref: Neither of them was in this lunch room.

src: जब हम विमान में चढ़े तो मॉम ने मुझसे कहा कि ये मज़ेदार होगा।
mt: When we boarded the plane, Mom told me this would be fun.
ref: When we got on the plane Mom told me it will be fun.

src: उसने सब से बढ़िया टोपी चुनी और उसे ऑर्डर किया।
mt: He chose the best hat and ordered it.
ref: He selected the perfect hat and ordered it.

src: टेड ने अपने माता-पिता से भुगतान करने में मदद करने के लिए कहा और वे सहमत हो गए।
mt: Ted asked his parents to help pay for his tuition, and they agreed.
ref: Ted asked his parents to help pay and they agreed.

src: नाश्ता बनाने के बजाय सारा दिन उनकी तलाश में बिता दिया।
mt: Instead of making breakfast, she spent the whole day looking for them.
ref: Instead of making breakfast, spent all day looking for them.

src: उन्होंने अपना पहला दिन आर्टवर्क देखने में बिताया।
mt: They spent their first day viewing art.
ref: He spend his first day seeing art work.

src: उसके पापा को पता था कि जेसिका को छुट्टियों में जाने की ज़रूरत है.
mt: Her father knew she needed a break.
ref: Her father knew that Jessica wanted a vacation.

src: हर चीज़ में उसके पैर बहुत लंबे और अजीब दिख रहे थे.
mt: His feet were very long and strange looking in everything.
ref: Everything made his legs look too long, and silly.

src: उसे अपने पुराने पलंग से भी छुटकारा पाना था.
mt: He wanted to get rid of his old bed.
ref: She also needed to get rid of her old bed.

src: इसलिए, मैंने खुद को पढ़ाना सीख लिया.
mt: So, I taught myself to read.
ref: So, I learned to teach myself on my own.

src: वह किसी कोने में जाकर रुक गई क्योंकि वह उसका पीछा कर रहा था.
mt: She stopped at a corner because he was following her.
ref: She stopped at a corner as he was following her.

src: वह उनकी तरफ़ आश्चर्य के साथ एकटक देखता रहा.
mt: He stared at her in astonishment.
ref: He stared up at them in awe.

src: जब उसने उन्हें धोया, तो उसके बाल हल्के नीले रंग के साथ सफ़ेद हो गए थे.
mt: When he washed them, his hair was light blue with white.
ref: When she rinsed it out her hair was white with a blue tinge.

src: उसने भगवान से बर्फ़ के लिए प्रार्थना की और सोने चला गया.
mt: He prayed to God for snow and went to sleep.
ref: He prayed to God for snow and went to sleep.

src: उसने उन्हें बताने की कोशिश की कि वह जीवित प्राणियों के इतिहास पर काम करती है.
mt: She tried to tell them that she worked on the history of living things.
ref: She tried to tell them that she got to work with living history.

src: वह घबरा कर पलंग से नीचे कूद गया.
mt: She jumped off the bed in fright.
ref: He jumped out of bed, panicked.

src: उसने कहा कि यह उसके जीवन की सबसे अजीब चीज़ थी.
mt: He said it was the strangest thing that ever happened to him.
ref: She swore it was the weirdest thing she'd ever seen.

src: उसका पति काम से आ गया, ताकि वह उसे आराम दे सके.
mt: Her husband came home from work so she could rest.
ref: Her husband came from work to comfort her.

src: हमने बहुत सारे कुत्ते और बिल्लियाँ देखीं.
mt: We saw many dogs and cats.
ref: We saw lots of dogs and kittens.

src: जो को कभी ए नहीं मिलते थे.
mt: 1. Those who never get A's.
ref: Joe didn't ever get As.

src: उन्हें कुछ अपार्टमेंट मिले, जो उन्हें काफ़ी अच्छे लगे.
mt: They found some apartments that they liked well enough.
ref: They found a few apartments they liked quite a bit.

src: ग्रेटा ने पार्टी के इंविटेशन स्कूल में बाँटे.
mt: Greta gave out party invitations at school.
ref: Greta handed out invitations for the party at school.

src: पर बारिश का पूर्वानुमान था!
mt: There was a forecast for rain!
ref: But rain was forecast!

src: उसने अपने पसंदीदा खिलौनों की लिस्ट मॉल में सैंटा को दी.
mt: He gave his list of favorite toys to Santa at the mall.
ref: She gave the list of her favorite toys to Santa at the mall.

src: उसके सारे फल और सब्ज़ियाँ तैयार थे!
mt: All his fruits and vegetables were ready!
ref: All her fruits and veggies were ready!

src: उसने दराज़ से कैंची निकाली.
mt: He pulled out a knife from his pocket.
ref: She grabbed a pair of scissors out of the drawer.

src: उसने जितनी ज़्यादा हो सकी उतनी प्रैक्टिस करने की कोशिश की.
mt: She tried to practice as much as she could.
ref: She tried to practice as hard as she could.

src: कुछ महीने डेट पर जाने के बाद, कीरा ने अपनी शादी की ड्रेस प्लान करना शुरू कर दी.
mt: 3 months before the wedding, Kira started planning her wedding dress.
ref: A few months into dating, Keira started planning her wedding dress.

src: कुत्ता, भेड़ों को दरवाज़े की तरफ़ ले आया.
mt: A dog led sheep to the door.
ref: The dog herded the sheep towards the gate.

src: हालाँकि, उसे यह ग्लानी भी होती थी कि उसकी गुज़र चुकी पत्नी क्या सोचेगी.
mt: However, she was also worried about what her late wife would think.
ref: He felt guilty though about what his late wife might think.

src: अचनाक से कांटों की एक झाड़ी बहुत जोर से उसके पैरों में आ लगी.
mt: Suddenly, a prickly bush grabbed his feet with a loud noise.
ref: All of a sudden a tumbleweed hit Marina's legs really hard.

src: मैंने अपनी टिकट एक प्रतिष्ठित ऑनलाइन लॉटरी एजेंट से खरीदे.
mt: I bought my ticket from a reputable online lottery agent.
ref: I purchased my tickets from a reputable online lottery agent.

src: जानकारी जटिल और गहरी है.
mt: Information is complex and deep.
ref: The information is complex and in depth.

src: काम वाले दिन, मैं बेचैन और उलटी जैसा महसूस कर रहा था.
mt: On my day off, I felt restless and upside down.
ref: The day of, I was nauseous and jittery.

src: पहले, वे बहुत देर तक माइक के क्वाडकॉप्टर के साथ खेलते रहे.
mt: 1st, they played for a long time with the microphone's quadcopter.
ref: First, they played with Mike's quadcopters for a long time.

src: मेहमान ने थोड़ी देर बाद बिल देखा और उससे संकेत लिया.
mt: The guest then looked at the bill and took the hint.
ref: The guests noticed the bill after a while and took a hint.

src: उसकी माँ ने उसकी कार से सामान निकालने में उसकी मदद की.
mt: His mother helped him unload his car.
ref: Her mother helped her unpack her car.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, उनका आपस में झगड़ा हो गया.
mt: Unfortunately, they got into a fight with each other.
ref: Unfortunately they got into a fight.

src: फिर भी, उसने उम्मीद नहीं छोड़ी.
mt: However, he did not give up hope.
ref: However, he did not give up hope.

src: दुर्घटनावश, मैं पूल के गहरे हिस्से में फिसल गया.
mt: I slipped and fell into the deep end of the pool by accident.
ref: By accident, I slipped into the deep part of the pool.

src: सब लोग जब क्रिसमस ट्री के समाने बैठे, तो वे उदास थे.
mt: All sat before the Christmas tree, sad.
ref: Everyone was sad when they sat down in front of the Christmas tree.

src: जब उसके घर जाने का समय हुआ, तो उसने स्पेन में रुकने का तय किया.
mt: When the time came to go home, he decided to stay in Spain.
ref: When she was supposed to go home, she decided to stay in Spain.

src: वह इसे कुछ दिनों बाद भूल गई.
mt: She forgot about it a few days later.
ref: She forgot about it after a few days.

src: टेड को तैरना नहीं आता था.
mt: Ted couldn't swim.
ref: Ted didn't know how to swim.

src: मैं, हमारी डेट के लिए बहुत उत्साहित था.
mt: I was very excited for our date.
ref: I was so excited for our date together.

src: हम लगभग हर पिंजरे पर गए, पर हमें कोई स्लॉथ नहीं दिखा.
mt: We went to almost every cage, but we didn't see any sloths.
ref: We visited almost all of the exhibits, but did not see any sloths.

src: दूसरे वैज्ञानिक भी उसके काम में मदद करने के लिए इकट्ठे हो जाते हैं.
mt: Other scientists also gather to help him.
ref: Other scientists gather to help him with his work.

src: वे फ़िंगर पेंट के साथ भी खेले और अपनी अंगलियाँ में रंग भी लगाया.
mt: They also played with finger paint and colored their fingernails.
ref: They also colored and played with finger paints.

src: उसने रोज़ जॉगिंग करना शुरू किया.
mt: She started jogging every day.
ref: She began jogging everyday.

src: इंडिया ने बीवरेज वाली मशीन पर कॉफ़ी तैयार की.
mt: India made coffee using a Beaverage machine.
ref: India prepared the coffee in the machine for the beverage.

src: एक दिन जब वह अपने कमरे में गई, तो उसे पिंजरे में एक हैम्सटर मिला.
mt: One day when she went to her room, she found a hamster in a cage.
ref: One day she went into her room and found a hamster in a cage.

src: उसके दोस्त उससे कहते हैं कि जीव विज्ञान उसके लिए बहुत मुश्किल है.
mt: His friends tell him that biology is very difficult for him.
ref: Her friends tell her that Biology is too tough for her.

src: उसे बनाने के लिए, वह लड़की काम सीखाने वाले एक कोर्स में दाखिला हो गई.
mt: To make it, she enrolled in a course to learn how to do the job.
ref: She took a woodworking course to learn how to build it.

src: कुछ सांकलें टूटी थीं.
mt: Some bolts were sheared.
ref: Some of the chains had been broken.

src: बो अपनी मुसतैंग बैठा और जिम अपनी कोरवेट में बैठा
mt: Bo sat on his mustang and Jim sat on his corvette
ref: Bo hopped in his Mustang and Jim hopped in his Corvette.

src: उसने किसी सुंदर रॉबिन को उसके घोंसले में देखा.
mt: He saw a beautiful robin in its nest.
ref: She saw a beautiful robin in her nest.

src: वह उनके गेम के दौरान एक शॉट में तीन होल लेती थी.
mt: She was making a hole-in-one in her game.
ref: She had three holes in one during their game.

src: अपनी पीठ के पीछे प्याज़ काटते हुए, हमने उसका वीडियो बनाया.
mt: While cutting onions behind her, we filmed her.
ref: We videoed as he sliced an onion behind his back.

src: फिर उसने हरकतें करनी शुरू कर दीं.
mt: Then she started acting up.
ref: Then she started acting out.

src: मैं खो गया क्योंकि मेरे पास कोई भी उपकरण नहीं था.
mt: I lost because I had no tools.
ref: I got lost because I did not have any equipment on me.

src: हेली फिर भी अपनी बात पर टिकी हुई थी.
mt: Helie was still sticking to her story.
ref: Hailey was still determined.

src: वह धातु के उस टुकड़े को कीमत बताने वाले के पास ले गया.
mt: He took it to the person who could tell him its value.
ref: He took the piece of metal to an appraiser.

src: कॉन्टेस्ट शुरू हो गया और उन्होंने खाना शुरू कर दिया.
mt: Contest started and they started eating.
ref: When the contest started, they dug in.

src: उसके दोस्त फ़ौरन उसकी मदद के लिए दौड़े.
mt: His friends immediately ran to help him.
ref: His friends quickly rushed to his aid.

src: स्टोर में उन्होंने बुरा बर्ताव किया और खूब चिल्लाए.
mt: They were acting badly and screaming in the store.
ref: They were bad in the store and screamed a lot.

src: इससे उभरने के लिए, गर्मियों में उसने स्पीच क्लास ली.
mt: To rise above it, she took a speech class in the summer.
ref: He took a speech class over the summer to help.

src: जल्द ही बहुत प्यास लगी।
mt: I will be very thirsty soon.
ref: I soon got really thirsty.

src: उसने एक दिन अपना स्वयं का चित्र बनाया।
mt: 1 day ago, he made his own picture.
ref: She painted a self portrait of herself one day.

src: वह जैब्स का अभ्यास करता था और प्रतिदिन घंटों रस्सी कूदता था।
mt: He practiced Jabs and jumped rope for hours every day.
ref: He practiced jabs and jumped rope for hours each day.

src: वाटर पार्क में बच्चों ने तैराकी का लुत्फ उठाया।
mt: Children at the water park enjoyed swimming.
ref: The kids enjoyed swimming at the water park.

src: वह अचानक चिल्लाने लगा।
mt: She suddenly started screaming.
ref: He started yelling all of a sudden.

src: अगर उसने 10 और कम कर दिए तो वह त्वचा को हटाने का काम करेगा।
mt: 10 or less would remove skin.
ref: If she lost 10 more he would do skin removal.

src: जब जेनी एक टेक्स्ट का जवाब दे रही थी, उसने अपनी आँखें सड़क से हटा लीं।
mt: When Jenny was texting, she took her eyes off the road.
ref: While Jenny was replying to a text she took her eyes off the road.

src: डीलर ने उसके लिए भुगतान योजना सेट करने में मदद की।
mt: The dealer helped him set up a payment plan for it.
ref: The dealer helped set up a payment plan for her.

src: उसे डर था कि मरम्मत महंगी साबित होगी।
mt: He feared the repairs would be expensive.
ref: He was afraid the repair would prove costly.

src: नेड करीब गया और देखा कि यह पोसम के छोटे बच्चों का एक झुंड था।
mt: Ned went near and saw that it was a flock of young possums.
ref: Ned moved closer and saw that it was a bunch of tiny baby possums.

src: डॉन ने फैसला किया कि यह दोस्त अब उसका दोस्त नहीं रहेगा।
mt: Don decided that this friend would no longer be his friend.
ref: Don decided that this friend would no longer be his friend.

src: मुझे नहीं पता था कि वह कहाँ थी।
mt: I didn't know where he was.
ref: I had no idea where she was.

src: मुझे नहीं पता कि मैंने डेट के लिए हां क्यों कहा, लेकिन मैंने किया।
mt: I don't know why I said yes to the date, but I did.
ref: I don't know why I said yes to a date, but I did.

src: लेकिन वेट्रेस उसे बताना भूल गई कि कटोरा गर्म है।
mt: But the waitress forgot to tell him the bowl was hot.
ref: But the waitress forgot to tell her that the bowl was hot.

src: एक दिन वह एक विशेषज्ञ तैराक से बैकस्ट्रोक सीखने का फैसला करती है।
mt: 1 day she decides to learn backstroke from an expert swimmer.
ref: One day she decides to take backstroke lessons from an expert swimmer.

src: एक बार जब मैं शहर पहुंचा तो मैंने कॉफी के लिए रुकने का फैसला किया।
mt: Once I arrived in the city, I decided to stop for coffee.
ref: Once I arrived in town I decided to stop for coffee.

src: जैसे ही वह खाने वाली थी, परिवार का कुत्ता उसके पास से निकला।
mt: As she was about to eat, her family dog ran away from her.
ref: Just as she was about to take a bite the family dog walked by.

src: टेबल पाने के लिए हम दोनों को फॉर्मल कपड़े पहनने पड़े।
mt: We both had to wear formal clothes to get a table.
ref: We both had to dress formally in order to get a table.

src: उसे जंगल में एक खुली जगह मिली और कैंप स्थापित किया।
mt: He found an open area in the jungle and set up camp.
ref: He found a clearing in the woods and set up camp.

src: उसने अपने पड़ोसी को जम्प स्टार्ट के लिए बुलाया।
mt: He called his neighbor to jump start his car.
ref: He called his neighbor for a jump start.

src: तब एजेंट ने उसे कुछ अद्भुत बताया।
mt: Then the agent told him it was amazing.
ref: Then the agent told her something wonderful.

src: हालाँकि उसके पास अच्छी पेंशन है, फिर भी वह घबराई हुई थी।
mt: Although she had a good pension, she was still worried.
ref: Although she has a good pension, she was still nervous.

src: उन्होंने एक आखिरी गेम पर अपने पॉइंट दांव पर लगा दिए।
mt: They bet their points on the last game.
ref: They wagered their points on one last game.

src: उसे डर था कि कहीं कुछ गलत न हो जाए।
mt: He was afraid that something might go wrong.
ref: She was afraid something would go wrong.

src: फिर उन्होंने इसके पीछे की दुखद कहानी सुनी।
mt: Then they heard the sad story behind it.
ref: Then he heard the sad story behind it.

src: मार्क और फ्रैंक ने गेंद को आगे-पीछे उछालने में मजा लिया।
mt: Mark and Frank enjoyed tossing the ball back and forth.
ref: Mark and Frank had fun tossing the ball back and forth.

src: उस रात, वह कैम्प फायर में ब्रेंडा से मिला।
mt: That night, he met Brenda at the campfire.
ref: That night, he met Brenda at the campfire.

src: विंस अपनी कार से योगर्टलैंड गया।
mt: Vince went to Yogurtland in his car.
ref: Vince drove his car to Yogurtland.

src: जल्द ही उसे कुछ हुप्स खुद शूट करने के लिए पर्याप्त आत्मविश्वास महसूस हुआ।
mt: Soon he felt confident enough to shoot some hops himself.
ref: Soon he felt confident enough to shoot a few hoops himself.

src: तभी एक महिला उसके पास आई और उसे पास के एक आश्रय के बारे में बताया।
mt: A woman then approached him and told him about a nearby shelter.
ref: Then a woman approached him and told him about a shelter nearby.

src: एक दिन, जोश को एक मधुमक्खी ने काट लिया |
mt: 1 day, Josh got stung by a bee
ref: One day, Josh got stung by a bee.

src: हम पैसे के लिए बहुत ज्यादा बेचैन थे|
mt: We were very anxious for money.
ref: We were desperate for money.

src: उस पर उसका दिल फ़िदा हो गया |
mt: He fell in love with her.
ref: He developed a crush on her.

src: जब वह कुकी वाले सेक्शन के पास आई तो वह निर्णय ले चुकी थी कि उसे क्या खाना है |
mt: When she got to the cookie section, she had already decided what she was going to eat.
ref: When she came upon the cookie aisle she knew exactly what she wanted.

src: जेनी और बॉब मूवी देखने चले |
mt: 2 people go to the movies
ref: Jenny and Bob drove to the movies.

src: मैंने ढेर सारे कीचड़ से भरे तालाब के बीच से गाड़ी चलाई |
mt: I drove through a lot of mud in between ponds.
ref: I drove through lots of mud puddles.

src: पीटर ने जब बर्नी को देखा तो उसने अपनी पूरी ताकत लगाकर चिल्लाते हुए उसका स्वागत किया |
mt: Peter greeted Bernie with a loud shout when he saw him.
ref: When Peter saw Bernie he cheered as loudly as possible.

src: उस शोध छात्र ने जोश को बोनस देने का निर्णय लिया |
mt: That student researcher decided to give Josh a bonus for enthusiasm
ref: The researcher decided to give Josh a bonus.

src: एक दिन उसने एक वीडियो अपलोड करने का साहस जुटाया
mt: 1 day later he had the courage to upload a video
ref: One day he gained the courage to upload one.

src: मैंने उस आदमी को बताया कि मेरे पास कोई पैसा नहीं है
mt: I told that man I had no money
ref: I told the man I didn't have any money.

src: परंतु लाइब्रेरियन लाइब्रेरी में उपस्थित नहीं थी
mt: But the librarian was not present in the library
ref: But the librarian was not in in the library.

src: वह तैरकर वापस आने के लिए तैयार थी लेकिन फिर वह रुकी
mt: She was ready to swim back but then stopped
ref: She prepared to swim back, but then she stopped.

src: उसकी बाइक तब तक सही थी जब तक वह बड़ा नहीं हो गया
mt: His bike was fine until he got big
ref: His bike had lasted until he outgrew it.

src: जब जैक बाहर निकल रहा था तब वह किसी दूसरी लड़की के साथ हाथों में हाथ डालकर चल रहा था
mt: When Jack was leaving he was holding hands with another girl
ref: When jack was exiting he was walking hand in hand with another girl.

src: उसने वहां जाने का निर्णय लिया और यहां तक कि वह रात भर वहीं रहा
mt: He decided to go there and even stayed there overnight
ref: He decided to go in and even stay the night there.

src: वह अपनी बच्ची को स्टूडियो ले गई और उसके कान छिदवा दिए
mt: She took her daughter to the studio and had her ears pierced
ref: She took her baby to the studio and had her ears pierced.

src: उसकी मां को यह पसंद आया और उसने उसे टेबल पर पड़े फूलदान में रख दिया
mt: His mother liked it and put it on the table in a vase
ref: Her mom loved them putting them in vase on the table.

src: इससे पहले कि मैं स्टोर से बाहर निकल पाता वहां आकर सुरक्षा गार्ड ने मुझे पकड़ लिया
mt: Before I could get out of the store, a security guard grabbed me
ref: Before I could leave the store the security had already grabbed me.

src: आज ना ही उसका सिर्फ आखिरी गेम था बल्कि यह उसकी एक चैंपियनशिप भी थी
mt: Today was not just his last game, but also his championship.
ref: Today was not only his last game, it was also the championship.

src: जब उसकी पार्टी समाप्त हो गई उसके माता पिता ने उसे बाहर जाने को कहा
mt: When his party ended his parents told him to go outside
ref: When the party was done, her parents told her to go outside.

src: वहीं डारलिन की बातचीत एक ग्राहक और एक कैशियर से हुई
mt: Meanwhile, the conversation between a customer and a cashier at a Darlin' store
ref: A customer and cashier struck up a conversation with Darlene.

src: क्योंकि डायनिंग हॉल का खाना खाने योग्य नहीं था इसलिए हमने खुद का भोजन बनाने का सोचा
mt: Because the dining hall food was inedible, we decided to cook our own food
ref: Since the dining hall food was subpar we decided to cook.

src: मुझे टोबी नाम के कुत्ते से प्यार हो गया
mt: I love a dog named Toby
ref: I fell in love with a dog named Toby.

src: टोनी ने उन सभी वस्तुओं को इकट्ठा किया जिसकी उसे आवश्यकता थी
mt: Tony collected all the things he needed
ref: Tony gathered the ingredients that he needed.

src: सार्वजनिक रूप से अपने स्थानों का पालन कर रखा है और उसे खौफनाक संदेश भेज ।
mt: He has publicly followed his locations and sent scary messages.
ref: He kept following her places in public and sending her creepy messages.

src: प्रत्येक सुबह उठकर व चार वेफल्स बनाया करता था
mt: He made four waffles every morning.
ref: He would make four of them every morning when he woke up.

src: लड़का बहुत जोर-जोर से रोने लगा।
mt: The boy started crying loudly.
ref: The boy started crying very loudly.

src: उसकी आवाज से वह बहुत ज्यादा परेशान हो रहा था
mt: He was very upset by his voice
ref: The noise of it was so irritating.

src: जैसे ही हम शराब पीते रहे, चीजें जल्दी खराब हो गईं ।
mt: As we drank the wine, things went bad quickly.
ref: Things quickly deteriorated as we kept drinking.

src: जेन इस बार और जोर लगाकर ढिठाई से चिल्लाई
mt: Jen is yelling louder and louder and more stupidly this time
ref: Jen screamed even louder and now with profanities.

src: ढेर सारी मेहनत के बाद, अंततः फ़िल्म पूरी हो गई
mt: After a lot of hard work, the film is finally complete
ref: After a lot of work, finally the film was done.

src: सैम बहुत ज्यादा नर्वस महसूस कर रहा था
mt: Sam was feeling very nervous
ref: Sam felt extremely nervous.

src: उसने रोना शुरु कर दिया
mt: He started crying
ref: She started to cry.

src: धीरे-धीरे उसने उन्हें अनपैक करना शुरू कर दिया और उनकी सामग्री का आयोजन किया।
mt: He began unpacking them slowly and organizing their contents.
ref: Slowly she started unpacking them and organizing their contents.

src: हालाँकि उसके दोस्तों ने उसे हाल फिलहाल में नहीं देखा था
mt: However, his friends had not seen him recently
ref: Her friends hadn't seen her in a while.

src: उसे छोटे बच्चों के स्टेटिस्टिक्स की प्रतियोगिता में आमंत्रित किया गया था
mt: He was invited to a competition of statistics for small children
ref: He was invited to a statistics contest for young children.

src: उसने गाड़ी रोकी और अपने टायर की जाँच की
mt: He stopped the car and checked his tires
ref: He pulled over and checked his tire.

src: सामंथा वहां घूमकर रंग बिरंगी पत्तियों का आनंद लेती है
mt: Samantha enjoys the colorful leaves there
ref: Samantha walks the trails to enjoy the colorful leaves.

src: वह यह सोचकर सोने चले गए कि इस बर्फ़ीले दिन से बच जाएगा
mt: He went to sleep thinking he would escape this snowy day
ref: He went to bed hoping he would be saved by a snow day.

src: पुलिस उन्हें ढूँढने का लगातार प्रयास कर रही थी
mt: Police are still searching for them
ref: The sheriff was hot on their trail.

src: जोसी ने देखा कि मकड़ी दीवार पर चढ़ गई
mt: Josie saw the spider climb the wall
ref: Josie saw the spider crawl up the wall.

src: उसने उसे उठाया और उसमें पैसे भरे पड़े थे
mt: He picked him up and there were bills stuffed in his pockets
ref: He picked it up and it was filled with cash.

src: उसने अपना सर्टिफिकेशन कोर्स पास किया और फ़िर हर दिन तैरा
mt: He passed his certification course and then swam every day
ref: He passed his certification course and then dived every day.

src: मैं द्वख ही रह था तभी यह सुन ने को मिला कि बंधकों को गोली मार दी गई
mt: I was just sitting there when I heard that the hostages were shot dead
ref: I watched for a while and they said the hostages were shot.

src: एक बार गर्मी में उसने रेक निकली और उसे खिंचने का प्रयास किया
mt: Once the heat was on, he tried to pull the stick back and pitch up
ref: One summer she took a rake and attempted to pull one in.

src: उसने दिशानिर्देशों का पालन किया और सावधानी से चीज़े तैयार की
mt: She followed instructions and prepared things carefully
ref: He followed the instructions and carefully prepared the ingredients.

src: वह और कपड़े लाना भूल गया था
mt: He forgot to bring clothes and underwear
ref: He forgot to bring spare clothes to change into.

src: उसने अपनी मुस्कान रोकने की बहुत कोशिश की
mt: She tried very hard to suppress her smile
ref: She fought the smile that tried to creep across her face.

src: उसके बाद महीनों तक कोल ने बहुत अच्छा व्यवहार किया
mt: He behaved very well for months afterwards
ref: Cole was well-behaved for months after that.

src: उसने सोचा कि वह ग्लोब घुमाएगा और वहीं जाएगा जहाँ उसकी उंगली पड़ेगी
mt: He thought he would spin the globe and go where his finger landed
ref: He then decided to spin a globe and go where his finger landed.

src: उसने बैग को माइक्रोवेव में रखा और पॉपकॉर्न का बटन दबा दिया
mt: He put the bag in the microwave and pressed the popcorn button
ref: She put the bag in the microwave and pushed the popcorn button.

src: हमें पता चला कि वह पत्नी का जन्मदिन मना रहे थे
mt: We learned that he was celebrating his wife's birthday
ref: We found out that they were celebrating the wife's birthday.

src: उठाए यह एहसास हुआ कि उसके बग़ल में रहने वाला लड़का हर दिन स्कूल से 3:00 बजे आ जाता था
mt: He noticed that the boy who lived next door came home every day at 3:00 pm from school
ref: She realized the boy next door got home from school at 3:00 every day.

src: बेस्वाद लगने पर हमने पिज़्ज़ा प्लेस में शिकायत की
mt: When we were unsatisfied, we complained to Pizza Place
ref: Disgusted, we called the pizza place to complain.

src: उसने उसमें से एक टुकड़ा खाया
mt: He ate a piece from it
ref: He took a bite out of it.

src: वह उसे पेंट की दुकान पर दुबारा पेंट कराने ले गया
mt: He took him to a paint store to have it repainted again.
ref: He took it to the paint shop to get it repainted.

src: पिछला सप्ताह तो और बुरा था
mt: Last week was worse
ref: Last week was especially bad.

src: जोए बुरी तरह जख्मी हो गया था
mt: Joé was badly injured
ref: Joe was badly injured!

src: उस रात वहां बारिश के सकत तेज़ तूफ़ान भी आया था
mt: It was raining heavily and there was a storm that night
ref: That night there was a bad rainy storm.

src: एक खुशी से भरी चीख़ के साथ , उसने एक स्नोमैन बनाना शुरू कर दिया
mt: With a happy shriek, she began making a snowman
ref: With a gleeful yelp, he began constructing a snowman.

src: जॉन ने इस बारे में कुछ करने का निर्णय किया।
mt: John decided to do something about it this time.
ref: John decided to do something about this.

src: हेरोल्ड ने पूरे शहर में तलाश किया, लेकिन घर नहीं मिला।
mt: Harold searched the whole city, but he didn't find his house.
ref: Harold looked all over town, but could not find the house.

src: महिला ने समाप्त किया और पूछा कि क्या उसे भी नेल पॉलिश चाहिए।
mt: The woman finished and asked if she also needed nail polish.
ref: The lady finished and asked if she wanted fingernail polish as well.

src: यह डेविड का पहली बार किसी नाव की सवारी थी, इसलिए वह घबरा रहा था।
mt: This was David's first time on a boat, so he was nervous.
ref: It was David's first time ever being on a boat, so he was nervous.

src: हालाँकि, जब यह तैयार किया जा रहा था तब उसने नहीं देखा।
mt: However, when it was being prepared, he did not see it.
ref: However, she looked away when it was being prepared.

src: मुझे अपनी माँ का मुझे लेने के लिए कई घंटे इंतजार किया।
mt: I waited for my mother to take me for many hours.
ref: I had to wait several hours for my mom to pick me up.

src: वह बरामदा के झूले पर बैठ गई और गिलहरियों को इधर-उधर भागते हुए देख रही थी।
mt: She sat on the swing and watched the squirrels running around.
ref: She sat on the porch swing watching the squirrels run around.

src: मैंने निर्देशों को ठीक से नहीं पढ़ा।
mt: I didn't read the instructions properly.
ref: I did not read the instructions well.

src: जेन पेशेवर बाजीगर के साथ तीन कक्षाओं में गई।
mt: 3 classes with a professional gambler.
ref: Jane went to three classes with the professional juggler.

src: एक रात उसके पास नूडल्स के लिए सॉस नहीं था।
mt: 1 night he had no sauce for his noodles.
ref: One night he didn't have the sauce for the noodles.

src: दादाजी को नहीं पता था कि उन्हें चॉकलेट चाहिए या स्ट्रॉबेरी।
mt: Dadaji didn't know whether he wanted chocolate or strawberries.
ref: Grandpa didn't know if she wanted chocolate or strawberry.

src: उनमें से प्रत्येक ने बारी-बारी से एक डरावनी कहानी सुनाई।
mt: Each in turn told a scary story.
ref: Each one of them took turns telling a scary story.

src: जैस्पर एक विशेष एंटी-डैंड्रफ शैम्पू खरीदने का फैसला करता है।
mt: Jasper decides to buy a special anti-dandruff shampoo.
ref: Jasper decides to buy a special anti-dandruff shampoo.

src: बॉब जेन को नहीं जानता था, लेकिन इससे कोई फर्क नहीं पड़ता।
mt: I didn't know Bob Jen, but it doesn't matter.
ref: Bob didn't know Jane, but that didn't matter.

src: लेकिन इंतजार करने के बाद भी अपना सामान न देखकर घबरा गई।
mt: But after waiting, she panicked when she didn't see her luggage.
ref: But as she waited, she grew nervous, not seeing her luggage.

src: उसने धीरे-धीरे धूम्रपान कम करना शुरू किया।
mt: He started to slowly cut down on smoking.
ref: She slowly cut down how much she was smoking.

src: उसके पिता ने जोर देकर कहा कि वह खाना के लिए रुकने के बजाय गाड़ी चलाते रहें।
mt: His father insisted that he did not stop to eat, but kept driving.
ref: Her dad insisted they keep driving instead of making a food stop.

src: जब रे और उसके दोस्त समुद्र तट पर गए, तो उन्होंने रे के शरीर को देखा।
mt: When Ray and his friends went to the beach, they saw Ray's body.
ref: When Ray and his friends went to the beach, they noticed Ray's body.

src: उसे पता चला कि उसके पसंदीदा बैंड का प्रदर्शन रद्द कर दिया गया था।
mt: He learned that his favorite band's performance had been canceled.
ref: She found out that her favorite band's performance was cancelled.

src: लोगों ने सुझाव दिया कि उन्हें रेडियो में काम करना चाहिए।
mt: People suggested they should be working on the radio.
ref: People suggested he should work in radio.

src: लैरी ने अपना बैग पैक किया और इडाहो चला गया।
mt: Larry packed his bag and went to Idaho.
ref: Larry packed his bags and drove to Idaho.

src: हालांकि एक सोडा वेंडिंग मशीन था।
mt: However, a soda vending machine was also involved.
ref: There was however a soda vending machine.

src: रेबा ने अपना पूरा जीवन अच्छे काम करते हुए बिताया
mt: Reba spent her entire life doing good works
ref: Reba spent her entire life doing good deeds.

src: सिंडी ने कहा कि वह तब तक खाना नहीं बनाने वाली जब तक उसे सफाई में मदद नहीं मिलती।
mt: Cindy said she would not cook until she got help with the cleaning.
ref: Cindy said she was not going to cook until she got help cleaning.

src: एक दिन, उसने दुकान में एक सुंदर लड़की को पुदीना खरीदते हुए देखा।
mt: One day, he saw a beautiful girl buying mint at the store.
