ref: One day, he saw a pretty girl buying peppermints in the store.

src: उनकी किताब मेंढकों के बारे में थी।
mt: His book was about frogs.
ref: His book was about frogs.

src: इसलिए मैं अपने स्थानीय मॉल में कलम की दुकान पर गया।
mt: So I went to the pen store at my local mall yesterday.
ref: So I went to the pen shop at my local mall.

src: उन्होंने शराब पी और वहां मौजूद जोड़ों से बात की।
mt: He drank alcohol and talked to the couples present.
ref: They drank wine and talked with the couples that were there.

src: उन्होंने अमेरिकन आइडल के लिए ऑडिशन दिया और चयनित हो गए।
mt: He auditioned for American Idol and was selected.
ref: He auditioned for american idol and got in.

src: उसने विंग्स के सभी अलग-अलग स्वाद खाए।
mt: He ate all the different flavors of wings.
ref: He ate all different flavors of wings.

src: बदकिस्मती से, वे इसे रात में भी बजाते हैं.
mt: Unfortunately, they play it at night too.
ref: They also play it at night, unfortunately.

src: उसे सोने की बजाय, कई छोटे-छोटे नीले और हरे रंग के पत्थर मिले.
mt: Instead of gold, he found many small blue and green stones.
ref: Instead of gold, he found many small blue and green stones.

src: वह सुझाव देती है कि वे एक नए कुत्ते को ख़रीदने के लिए जाएं.
mt: She suggests they go buy a new dog.
ref: She suggests they go shopping for a new dog.

src: शुक्र है कि वह सबसे पहले आने वालों में से थी.
mt: She was one of the first to arrive.
ref: Thankfully she was the first one to arrive.

src: हालांकि, जब बच्ची आई, तो उसे कुछ और ही महसूस हुआ.
mt: However, when the girl arrived, she felt something else.
ref: However, when the baby came, she felt otherwise.

src: लंच के समय पर, एक दूसरा छात्र उसके पास आया.
mt: 12:00 pm, another student approached him.
ref: At lunch time, another student approached him.

src: मुझे एक पुराना वाला मिला जिसमें फफूंद थी.
mt: I found an old one with mold.
ref: I found an old one with mold in it.

src: जेसन इससे ज़्यादा परिचित होने के लिए घर पर एक PC ख़रीदता है.
mt: Jason buys a PC to get more familiar with it.
ref: Jason buys a PC at home to become more familiar with it.

src: हमने आराम से ब्रेकफ़ास्ट किया.
mt: We had a leisurely breakfast.
ref: We had a leisurely breakfast.

src: आख़िरकार मुझे पैनकेक मिक्स का एक डिब्बा मिला.
mt: Finally I got a can of pancake mix.
ref: I found a box of pancake mix eventually.

src: बदकिस्मती से भतीजी बहुत ज़्यादा चंचल थी.
mt: Unluckily, the niece was very playful.
ref: Unfortunately the niece had too much energy.

src: बाद में, उसे जूतों से मेल खाने वाला एक पर्स मिलता है.
mt: Later, he finds a pair of shoes that match the one he is wearing.
ref: Later, she finds a purse to match the shoes.

src: एरिका ने अपने प्रोफ़ेसर को अपना हाल बताया.
mt: Erica told her professor her news.
ref: Erica told her professor her situation.

src: एक साल, उसने जेसन बनने और अपने गैरेज के दरवाज़े के नीचे छिपने का फ़ैसला किया था.
mt: 1 year ago, he decided to become Jason and hide under the garage door.
ref: One year, he decided to be Jason and hide under his garage door.

src: बेन ने जो अंधेरे से आने वाली अजीब आवाज़ें सुनी उनसे डर गया था.
mt: Ben heard strange noises coming from the darkness and was frightened.
ref: Ben was frightened by odd noises he heard coming from the darkness.

src: बैरी ने नज़दीकी बोलिंग ऐली के लिए येल्लो पेजेज़ में देखा.
mt: Barry looked at the Yellow Pages for a nearby bowling alley.
ref: Barry looked through the yellow pages for a nearby bowling alley.

src: उन्होंने एक कंबल बिछाया और अपना खाना लगाने लगे.
mt: They spread a blanket and started eating their food.
ref: They laid out a blanket and began to set out their food.

src: उसने एलीसन को अपने साथ कॉन्सर्ट में जाने के लिए बुलाया.
mt: He invited Allison to go to a concert with him.
ref: He invited Allison to go to the concert with him.

src: उसका जुनून स्कूल भर उसका पीछा करता रहा.
mt: His passion followed him through school.
ref: Her obsession followed her all through school.

src: वहां से वे एक सुपरहीरो फ़िल्म देखने के लिए, सिनेमाघर गए.
mt: They went to a superhero movie at the cinema from there.
ref: From there they went to the movie theater, to see a superhero movie.

src: उन्होंने एक लंबा स्नोमैन और एक बर्फ़ का किला बनाया.
mt: They made a long snowman and a snow castle.
ref: They built a tall snowman and a snow fort.

src: जेब टाइट होने की वजह से मुझे इसे निकालने में मुश्किल हो रही थी.
mt: I was having trouble getting it out because my wallet was tight.
ref: I had a hard time getting it out since my pockets were tight.

src: कभी-कभी वह बाहर जाकर देखते-देखते खड़ा हो जाता.
mt: Sometimes he would stand there, watching, while he was outside.
ref: Sometimes he'll go out and stand while watching.

src: यह ज़रूरी है कि गैरी के पास फ़ुटबॉल टीम में होने के लिए अच्छे ग्रेड हों.
mt: It is important that Gary have good grades to be on the football team.
ref: It is required that Garry have good grades to be on the football team.

src: वह अपमानित महसूस कर रही थी!
mt: She felt humiliated!
ref: She was so offended!

src: एक दिन उसकी बहन उसे एक योगा क्लास में ले गई.
mt: 1 day later, her sister took her to a yoga class.
ref: One day his sister took him to a yoga class.

src: उसने फ़ैसला लिया कि उसके पास उसे नए जूते दिलवाने के अलावा कोई और विकल्प नहीं था.
mt: He decided that he had no other option but to buy her new shoes.
ref: She decided she had no choice but to buy him new shoes.

src: हैरी ने अपने दोस्तों को बुलाया और प्लैन बनाया.
mt: Harry called his friends and made a plan.
ref: Harry called his friends and set up the plans.

src: उसका दोस्त उसके घर गया और उसे पढ़ाया.
mt: His friend went to his house and taught him.
ref: His friend went to his house and taught him.

src: एक साल बाद, मेघन काम पर और ज़िम्मेदारी चाहती थी.
mt: 1 year later, Meghan wanted to be back at work and responsible.
ref: After a year, Meghan wanted more responsibility at work.

src: उसने कांच को कालीन के निचे से बुहारा।
mt: He swept the glass under the carpet.
ref: She swept the glass under the rug.

src: आखिरकार, वह इसका आधा हल करने में सक्षम था।
mt: Eventually, he was able to solve half of it.
ref: Eventually, he was able to solve half of it.

src: टिम ने उसके जन्मदिन से एक हफ्ते पहले उसे सरप्राइज दिया।
mt: Tim surprised her with a birthday party a week before her birthday.
ref: Tim surprised her a week before her birthday.

src: उसने मशरूम जोड़ा।
mt: He added mushrooms.
ref: She added mushrooms.

src: मैंने मॉल जाने का यह देखते हुए फैसला किया कि उनके पास काफी विविधता है।
mt: I decided to go to the mall, seeing that they had a lot of variety.
ref: I decided on the mall seeing as how they have a large variety.

src: उसने अपना बाकी पैसा एक लॉटरी टिकट पर खर्च किया।
mt: He spent the rest of his money on a lottery ticket.
ref: She spent the rest of her money on a lottery ticket.

src: जब ट्रांसप्लांट हुआ तो उसका पूरा परिवार डरा हुआ था।
mt: When the transplant happened, the whole family was scared.
ref: When the transplant happened, her whole family was scared.

src: मुझे अपना पहला दिन में अकेलापन महसूस हुआ।
mt: I felt lonely on my first day.
ref: I felt lonely on my first day.

src: दुर्भाग्य से लैरी के लिए, एक दिन उसे दूसरे मार्ग पर ले जाया गया।
mt: Unfortunately for Larry, one day he was taken to another path.
ref: Unfortunately for Larry, one day he was diverted onto another route.

src: उसे बस इतना करना है कि वह मौके पर ही जाने का बहाना बना ले।
mt: All he has to do is make up an excuse to go to the scene.
ref: All he has to do is come up with an excuse on the spot to leave.

src: फिर उसने बाथटब में पानी भर दिया।
mt: He then filled the bathtub with water.
ref: Then she filled the bathtub with water.

src: वे खाने में से बहुत खा रहे थे।
mt: They were eating too much.
ref: They were eating a lot out of the meal.

src: कल कूदते हुए उसने ऐसा ही किया।
mt: He did the same yesterday.
ref: While jumping yesterday, he did just that.

src: वे रोज फोन पर बात करते थे।
mt: They talked on the phone every day.
ref: They talked on the phone every day.

src: यह खिड़की पर रखे कैक्टस से टकराया।
mt: It hit a cactus on the window.
ref: It hit the cactus sitting in the window.

src: एक दिन जेनेट को पता चला कि उसकी माँ बीमार है।
mt: 1 day before Genet learns her mother is ill.
ref: One day Janet discovered that her mother was sick.

src: उसने अपने रूममेट से अपना काम करवाने के लिए पैसे देने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to pay his roommate to do his work.
ref: He decided to pay his roommate to do it for him.

src: एक दिन, वह एक बहुत ही अच्छे कद-काठी के आदमी से मिली।
mt: One day, he met a very well-built man.
ref: One day, she met a very nice full-sized man.

src: जय जानता था कि इसमें बहुत सारी जिम्मेदारी शामिल होगी।
mt: Jay knew that there would be a lot of responsibility involved.
ref: Jay knew that there would be a lot of responsibility involved.

src: जॉन ने दुकान से कुछ पानी खरीदने का फैसला किया।
mt: John decided to buy some water from the store.
ref: Jon decided to go buy some water at the store.

src: जब टेलीविजन आया, तो डारिया उत्साहित थी।
mt: When television came, Daria was excited.
ref: When the television arrived, Daria was excited.

src: एक दिन उसने अपनी उंगली एक कांटे पर चुभोई।
mt: 1 day he pricked his finger on a thorn.
ref: One day she pricked her finger on a thorn.

src: जिमी ने उसके लिए फूल और एक गेट वेल कार्ड लाया।
mt: Jimmy brought her flowers and a get well card.
ref: Jimmy brought her flowers and a get well card.

src: जैसे ही वह बस के पास पहुंची, उसने पीछे मुड़ने की सोची।
mt: As soon as she got close to the bus, she thought about turning around.
ref: As she approached the bus, she thought of turning back.

src: वह जल्दी से हवाई अड्डे की सुरक्षा से गुज़री।
mt: He quickly passed through airport security.
ref: She went through airport security quickly.

src: सैंडी ने यह सुनिश्चित करने का फैसला किया कि उसका घर तैयार है।
mt: Sandy decided to make sure her house was ready.
ref: Sandy decided to ensure that her home was prepared.

src: एक दिन वह एक कंपनी की पार्टी में शामिल होने का फैसला करता है।
mt: One day he decides to attend a company party.
ref: One day he decides to attend a company party.

src: मैंने कल कुछ बोतलें ऑनलाइन खरीदने की कोशिश की।
mt: I tried to buy some bottles online yesterday.
ref: I tried to buy some bottles online yesterday.

src: उसने इसके बजाय उसने अपनी दादी से पूछा।
mt: He asked his grandmother instead.
ref: He asked his grandmother instead.

src: फ्रांज और उसका कजिन संग्रहालयों में जाते हैं और साथ में कॉफी पीते हैं।
mt: Franz and his cousin go to museums and drink coffee together.
ref: Franz and his cousin visit museums and drink coffee together.

src: भेक बहुत तेज़ लगता था.
mt: It was very fast.
ref: The toad looked very fierce.

src: एक क्षण चलने के बाद, उसने लगातार मुझे मैसेज किए.
mt: 1 second later, he messaged me continuously.
ref: Despite walking for one moment, she constantly messaged me.

src: लेकिन आश्चर्य की बात है, उसे एक पुराना दोस्त मिल गया.
mt: But, to his surprise, he met an old friend.
ref: To her surprise however, she ran into an old friend.

src: एक बार तो उसने कोई भारी शिपमेंट गिरा दिया.
mt: 1. He once dropped a heavy shipment.
ref: At one point he dropped a heavy shipment.

src: जब फ़ेड ने गैंग पर छापेमारी की, वह उनके लेन-देन का रिकॉर्ड देख रहा था.
mt: When Feds raided the gang, they were looking at their records of transactions.
ref: When the feds raided the gang, he was going over their books.

src: वह उठी और उसने कपड़े पहन लिए. उसकी माँ ने उसके बाल बना दिए.
mt: She stood up and put on clothes. Her mother combed her hair.
ref: She got up and got dressed and her mom fixed her hair.

src: नीला ने तय किया कि वह मरने तक अपनी माँ को एक अच्छी जिंदगी देगी.
mt: Blue chose to give his mother a good life until he died.
ref: Nila made sure to provide her mom with a good life until her death.

src: उसका सपना उसे ऐसा बचपन देने का था जो उसे नहीं मिला था.
mt: His dream was to give him a childhood he never had.
ref: Her dream was to give him the childhood that she was not given.

src: वे उठे और क्रिसमस ट्री की तरफ़ दौड़े.
mt: They stood up and ran towards the Christmas tree.
ref: They woke up and ran to the Christmas tree.

src: जैन, किम के इस निर्णय की वजह से उदास था.
mt: Jain was sad about Kim's decision.
ref: Jan was upset that Kim made this decision.

src: जब हम स्कूल पहुँचे, तो हमने तीसरी कक्षा के बच्चों की लिस्ट देखी.
mt: When we arrived at the school, we saw a list of third grade students.
ref: When we got to school we checked the class list for third grade.

src: एक दिन, उसके पड़ोसी ने अपना कुत्ता किसी और को दे दिया.
mt: 1 day, his neighbor gave his dog to someone else.
ref: One day, his neighbor gave his dog away.

src: बाद में उस दिन, हॉली ने सोचा कि लोग क्यों हँस रहे हैं.
mt: Later that day, Holly thought people were laughing at her.
ref: Later that day, Holly wondered why people were laughing.

src: रात में जब मैं पानी पीने के लिए उठा, तो मैं फिसल गया.
mt: I slipped when I got up to drink water in the night.
ref: When I woke up in the middle of the night to get water I tripped.

src: जाने के दिन, उसने अपने दोस्तों को अलविदा कहा.
mt: On the day of his death, he said goodbye to his friends.
ref: On the day of the move she said goodbye to her friends.

mt: 300 dollar shoes.
ref: The shoes were $300.

src: उसकी माँ उसके लिए राजकुमारियों वाली पार्टी दे रही है.
mt: Her mother is throwing her a princess party.
ref: Her mom is throwing her a princess party.

src: पानी में खेलते समय, कुछ और लोग शामिल हो गए.
mt: Some people joined in playing in the water.
ref: While playing in the water some other people joined in.

src: एक घंटे तक सोचने के बाद, मैंने 'द डिपार्टेड' को चुना.
mt: 1 hour later, I chose "The Departed".
ref: After taking an hour to decide I finally picked The Departed.

src: उन्होंने उसे एक पार्टी में बुलाया.
mt: He invited him to a party.
ref: They invited her to a party.

src: ग्राहक सेवा प्रतिनिधि ने मेरा यह काम कर दिया.
mt: Customer service representative did my job for me.
ref: The customer service representative did it for me.

src: उसके सारे दोस्त वहाँ थे.
mt: All his friends were there.
ref: All of her friends were there.

src: एक दिन, वह अपने दोस्तों से नीली बिकनी में मिली और उन्हें चकित कर दिया.
mt: 1 day, she met her friends in blue bikini and amazed them.
ref: One day she met her friends in a blue bikini and surprised them.

src: एक दिन उसके पापा ने उसकी मदद करने का भरोसा देकर उसे चौंका दिया.
mt: 1 day after his dad surprised him by saying he would help him.
ref: One day his father surprised him by saying he would help Ted out.

src: उसने जो सीखा था उसके बारे में सुपरवाइज़र ने उससे सवाल पूछे.
mt: His supervisor asked him about what he had learned.
ref: Her supervisors quizzed her about what she had learned.

src: उन्होंने सामी और सारा को कॉल किया और एक डेट पक्की कर ली.
mt: They called Sami and Sara and made a date.
ref: They called Sami and Sara and arranged a date.

src: मार्को कोई नेकटाई पहनने का तय करता है.
mt: Marko Koivula decides to wear a necktie.
ref: Marco decides to put on a necktie.

src: उसने हवाईजहाज से चीन जाने के तय किया.
mt: He had planned to fly to China.
ref: He decided to travel to China by air.

src: अगली सुबह बर्फ़बारी की वजह से स्कूल की छुट्टी कर दी गई.
mt: The school was closed the next morning due to snow.
ref: The next morning school was concealed due to snow.

src: जब उसके दोस्तों को पता चला, तो सभी उसके जन्मदिन के लिए एक उपन्यास लेकर आए.
mt: When his friends found out, they all brought him a novel for his birthday.
ref: When his friends found out, they all bought him one for his birthday.

src: एक दिन, उसे यह महसूस हुआ कि एक उसके पास आटा खत्म हो गया है, जबकि एक बड़ा ऑर्डर भी हाथ में था।
mt: One day, he realized that he was out of flour, while a large order was in hand.
ref: One day, she realized she was out of flour despite having a big order.

src: वे सबसे बड़ी स्लाइड के लिए लाइन में लगकर इंतज़ार कर रहीं थीं।
mt: They were waiting in line for the biggest slide.
ref: They waited in line for the biggest slide.

src: सैम ने आकर उसको नीचे गिरा दिया।
mt: Sam came and pushed her down.
ref: Sam came and knocked it down.

src: जब जेफ़ वहां पहुंचा तो वह काफी निराश हुआ।
mt: When Jeff arrived, he was quite disappointed.
ref: When Jeff arrived he was very disappointed.

src: न चाहते हुए भी उसने अपने पिता का इलाज किया।
mt: He had to treat his father, whether he wanted to or not.
ref: Dani didn't want to, but she treated her father.

src: जेन का बर्ताव अशिष्ट, और घमंडी था।
mt: Jane's behavior was rude and arrogant.
ref: Jane was rude, and stuck up.

src: उनकी त्वचा धूप से बुरी तरह झुलस गई!
mt: Their skin was badly sunburned!
ref: She got a nasty burn!

src: उसने हर किस्म के अनोखे जानवरों को देखा।
mt: She saw all kinds of unique animals.
ref: They saw all kinds of exotic animals.

src: पाई को ओवन में डालने के बाद, वह बेसब्री से उसे चखने का इंतज़ार करने लगी।
mt: After putting the pie in the oven, she impatiently waited to taste it.
ref: After putting the pie in the oven, she eagerly waited to try it.

src: वह अपनी आलमारी में यह देखने गया कि वह क्या बेच सकता है।
mt: He went to his closet to see what he could sell.
ref: He went through his closet to see what he could sell.

src: तब एना को एहसास हुआ - उन्हें एक डिस्को बॉल चाहिए था!
mt: Then Anna realized - she needed a disco ball!
ref: Then Anna realized - they needed a disco ball!

src: देखने के लिए बहुत सारे पेड़ थे।
mt: There were many trees to see.
ref: There were a lot of trees to go through.

src: गेम तेज होता गया और आखिर में दोनों टीमें बराबरी पर आ गईं।
mt: The game got tense and both teams ended up tied.
ref: The game became intense and both teams were tied in the end.

src: अपने पिछले प्रदर्शन के दौरान, उसके कीबोर्ड की एक की टूट गई।
mt: In its previous performance, one of its keys broke.
ref: During his last performance, one of the keys broke off his keyboard.

src: जल्द ही उन्हें उसकी आदत हो गई।
mt: Soon they got used to it.
ref: Soon they grew used to her.

src: एंडी की माँ उसे समुद्र के तट पर ले गईं।
mt: Andy's mother took him to the beach.
ref: His mother took Andy to the beach.

src: केस बिना डोरी के आया।
mt: Case without a door.
ref: The case arrived without a lanyard.

src: नई वाली अच्छी दिखती हैं और बेहतर लगता है।
mt: New ones look good and feel better.
ref: The new ones look nicer and feel better.

src: उन्होंने सलाह दी कि वह अपने मिले हुए पैसों को बचाए।
mt: They advised him to save the money he had received.
ref: She advised he save his allowance.

src: उसने एक इलेक्ट्रिक गिटार और एक एम्पलीफ़ायर खरीदा।
mt: He bought an electric guitar and an amplifier.
ref: She bought an electric guitar and an amp.

src: उसके पड़ोसी गरीब थे और मछली के लिए बिल के शुक्रगुज़ार थे।
mt: His neighbors were poor and grateful for the fish bill.
ref: His neighbors were poor and were grateful to Bill for the fish.

src: हर दूसरा मौजूद विकल्प बोरिंग लग रहा था।
mt: 2 out of 3 options seemed boring.
ref: Every other option available seemed boring.

src: जब टिम के पास पर्याप्त गाने हो गए, तो उसने एक रिकॉर्ड स्टूडियो को बुलाया।
mt: When Tim had enough songs, he called a recording studio.
ref: When Tim had enough songs, he called a record studio.

src: एलेक्स टिगर को दिखाने के लिए पशु चिकित्सक के पास ले गया।
mt: Alex took the dog to the vet to show him.
ref: Alex took Tigger to the veterinarian to be diagnosed.

src: उसका एक सहकर्मी चोरी-छिपे उसकी खोज को चुरा रहा था।
mt: His colleague was secretly stealing his search.
ref: One of her colleagues was secretly stealing her research.

src: पार्टी कायदे से काफी बाहर हो गई।
mt: The party is way out of line.
ref: The party got extremely wild.

src: उसने खुद के लिए एक गिलास दूध लिया।
mt: He bought himself a glass of milk.
ref: She poured herself a glass of milk.

src: काम से घर आते हुए, रास्ते में काफी ट्रैफ़िक था।
mt: On the way back from work, there was a lot of traffic.
ref: On the way home from work, there was a lot of traffic.

src: उन्हें वाइकिंग का टिकाऊपन अच्छा लगा।
mt: They liked the Vikings' toughness.
ref: They liked the durability of the Viking.

src: जैस्मीन जल्द ही समझ गई कि परीक्षा बहुत मुश्किल थी।
mt: Jasmine soon realized that the exam was very difficult.
ref: Jasmine soon realized the test was very difficult.

src: 2 महीनों के बाद सैम अपनी कार में सो रहा था और उसके पास एक भी फूटी कौड़ी नहीं थी
mt: 2 months ago Sam was sleeping in his car and had no money
ref: After two months sam was sleeping in his car and broke.

src: वहां वह इतना व्यस्त था कि उसके पास खाने के लिए भी समय नहीं था
mt: He was so busy that he didn't have time to eat
ref: Work was too busy to take a break or eat lunch.

src: उसने अपनी पत्नी से भी उसके बारे में पूछा
mt: He asked his wife about him too
ref: He asked his wife were they were.

src: हम स्टोर में गए और हमने घंटे भर ढूंढा
mt: We went to the store and we spent an hour looking
ref: We went to the store and looked for hours.

src: हैरी ने टीम के लिए पूर्व परीक्षण में भाग लिया
mt: Harry played for the team in a pre-season trial
ref: Harry attended the tryouts for the team.

src: वह अपनी माँ को पुकारते हुए रोने लगी
mt: He started crying, calling for his mother
ref: She started to cry for her mom.

src: उसने एक कला प्रतियोगिता में भाग लेने का निर्णय लिया
mt: She decided to enter an art competition
ref: She decided to enter in an art competition.

src: जिम किनारे की पटरी परबहुत तेज़ी से गिरा
mt: A train on the Jim Crow line fell very fast
ref: Jim fell down hard onto the pavement.

src: जब भी मैं कपड़े धोता हूँ मेरे मोज़े गुम हो जाते हैं
mt: Whenever I do laundry, my socks go missing
ref: Everytime i do laundry socks get lost.

src: रात के खाने के लिए उसकी माँ चावल छाँटने में उसकी मदद करती थी
mt: Her mother helped her sort rice for dinner.
ref: His mother let him help fix rice for dinner.

src: वह क्रिसमस तक उन्हें खत्म करने के लिए जल्दी में थी।
mt: He was in a hurry to finish them by Christmas.
ref: She hurried to finish them by Christmas.

src: जेनिफर को पता चला कि उसका बॉस उसे परेशान करना चाहता था
mt: Jennifer learned that her boss wanted to harass her
ref: Jennifer found out that her boss was trying to sabotage her!

src: एक दिन ,खेल के दौरान उसका टखना बुरी तरह से मुड़ गया
mt: 1 day, his ankle was badly twisted during a game
ref: One day, during a game, she twisted her ankle badly.

src: उन्होंने एक साथ एक दूसरे के लिए फ़्रेंडशिप ब्रेसलेट बनाने का निर्णय लिया
mt: They decided to make friendship bracelets together
ref: They decided to make friendship bracelets together and give to others.

src: पूरे पड़ोस में कहीं भी बिजली नहीं थी
mt: There was no power anywhere in the neighborhood.
ref: The entire neighborhood didn't have electricity.

src: उसे ऊंचाइयों पर रहने से नफ़रत थी
mt: He hated heights
ref: He hated living that high.

src: जब वह टेस्ट दे रही थी उसे एहसास हुआ कि उसने पैंट ही नहीं पहनी!
mt: She realized she hadn't put on her pants when she was testing!
ref: As she was taking the test she realized she forgot to put on pants!

src: उसने अपने रियूजेबल कैनवास सैक को इकठ्ठा किया
mt: He collected his reusable canvas sacks
ref: She gathered her reusable canvas sacks.

src: उसने योलांडा को अपने साथ सवारी करने के लिए जिद की
mt: She insisted on riding with Yolanda
ref: She decided to force Yolanda to ride one with her.

src: खाने का स्वाद बहुत लाजवाब था
mt: The taste of the food was very delicious
ref: The food tasted amazing.

src: उसे यह विचार आया कि वह खाली पड़े धागे को लेकर कम्बल बनाएगी
mt: He thought he would make a blanket out of the empty thread.
ref: She got the idea to take the spare yarn she had to make a blanket.

src: मेलिंडा मूवी देखने गई और उसने एक टिकट खरीदा
mt: Melinda went to see a movie and bought a ticket
ref: Melinda went to the movies and bought a ticket.

src: वह उनके लिए चाय बनाने का निर्णय लेता है
mt: He decides to make tea for them
ref: He decides to brew a pot of tea for them instead.

src: उन्होंने उसे बताया कि उसके पास एक ड्राइवर लाइसेंस होना चाहिए जो उसके पास नहीं था
mt: He told her that she needed a driver's license, which she did not have
ref: They told her she needed a driver's license, which she did not have.

src: वह डॉक्टर के पास गई और हर दिन उसका ईलाज हुआ
mt: She went to the doctor and got treated every day
ref: She went to doctors and treatments almost every day.

src: कोई उसके साथ दोस्ती नहीं करना चाहता था
mt: No one wanted to be his friend
ref: Nobody seemed to want to be friends with him.

src: जॉयस को बड़ी बहन बनना पसंद था और वह अपनी माँ की बहुत सहायता किया करती थी
mt: Joy was fond of being the big sister and she helped her mother a lot
ref: Joyce loved being an older sister and she helped her mom a lot.

src: अंततः वह ताजा ओएस्टर खिलाने के लिए उसे छुट्टियों में कैप कोड ले गई
mt: Eventually she took him to the beach to feed him fresh oysters during the holidays
ref: Finally she took him on a vacation to cape cod to try a fresh oyster.

src: एक दिन एक गाय भाग गई
mt: 1 day 1 cow ran away
ref: One day a cow went free.

src: अचानक से उसे अपनी कार रोकनी पड़ी
mt: Suddenly he had to stop his car
ref: Suddenly, she had to quickly stop her car.

src: वह अपनी नई केमेरो चला रहा था.
mt: He was driving his new Camaro.
ref: He was driving his new Camaro.

src: अपनी पोशाक के साथ-साथ उसने बहुत सारा स्टेज मेकअप लगाया.
mt: She also wore a lot of stage makeup.
ref: To add to his costume he applied a lot of stage makeup.

src: अगले दिन, जब मैंने खाना ख़रीदने की कोशिश की तो मेरा क्रेडिट कार्ड अस्वीकार कर दिया गया.
mt: The next day, when I tried to buy food, my credit card was declined.
ref: The next day, my credit card was declined when I tried to buy food.

src: आख़िरकार वह डॉक्टर के पास गई.
mt: Finally she went to the doctor.
ref: Finally she went to the doctor.

src: पार्टी में, उसे चक्कर आए और घबराहट महसूस हुई.
mt: In the party, he felt dizzy and had a panic attack.
ref: At the party, she became dizzy and nervous.

src: वह असल में एक लड़के की उम्मीद कर रही थी!
mt: She was actually hoping for a boy!
ref: She was really hoping for a boy!

src: एक नया शो बनाया गया जिसमें ज़ोई नाम का एक मुख्य पात्र था.
mt: A new show was created with a main character named Zoe.
ref: A new show was made that had a main character named Zoey.

src: उसने काफ़ी देर तक गाड़ी चलाई.
mt: He drove for a long time.
ref: She drove for a long time.

src: बॉब ने महसूस किया कि उसे अपने शरीर को ठीक करना है.
mt: Bob realized he needed to fix his body.
ref: Bob realized that he had to get in shape.

src: उसने करियर काउंसलर से सलाह मांगी.
mt: She sought career counseling.
ref: He asked the career counselor for advice.

src: एक नाले के पास चलते हुए उसने कुछ चमकदार देखा.
mt: He saw something shiny as he walked along a canal.
ref: While walking along a creek she saw something shiny.

src: वह टहलने के दौरान कुछ दोस्तों से मिला.
mt: He met some friends while walking.
ref: He ran into a few friends along his walk.

src: उसने परिवार को बिल्ली के बच्चे रखने के लिए मना लिया.
mt: She convinced her family to let her keep the kittens.
ref: She convinced the family to keep the kittens.

src: उसे पास के राज्य में एक नई नौकरी के साथ एक अपार्टमेंट मिल गया.
mt: She got a new job in a nearby state with an apartment.
ref: He found an apartment in a nearby state with a new job.

src: उसने काम के बाद हर रात कैन और सिगरेट बट उठाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: He decided to pick up a can and a cigarette butt every night after work.
ref: He decides to pick up cans and cigarette butts every night after work.

src: मैं बाथरूम में गया और शॉवर को चालू कर दिया.
mt: I went to the bathroom and turned on the shower.
ref: I went into the bathroom and turned on the shower.

src: कई घंटे बाद, मैं बेसब्री से इंतज़ार कर रहा था.
mt: I was waiting impatiently for hours.
ref: Several hours later, I was impatiently waiting.

src: एक दिन वह अपना बारबेल लाना भूल गया!
mt: 1 day he forgot to bring his barbell!
ref: One day he forgot to bring his barbell!

src: वह आराम करने के लिए एक दिन की छुट्टी के लिए तरस रही थी.
mt: She was waiting for a day off to rest.
ref: She had been dying for a day off to relax.

src: उसका सबसे अच्छा दोस्त उसके सामने मारा गया था.
mt: His best friend was killed in front of him.
ref: His best friend was killed in front of him.

src: एक घंटे से ज़्यादा हो गया था और वह आदमी अभी तक कुछ भी नहीं खोज पाया था.
mt: 1 hour had passed and he still hadn't found anything.
ref: It had been over an hour and the man hadn't found anything yet.

src: मैंने उसे नट को तोड़ने के कई तरीके सिखाने का ऑफ़र दिया.
mt: I offered to teach him many ways to break a nut.
ref: I offered to teach her many methods to crack nuts.

src: एमी ज़ोर से यह कहते हुए एक हारे हुए व्यक्ति की तरह महसूस कर रही थी.
mt: Amy was feeling like a defeated person as she was shouting loudly.
ref: Amy felt like a loser just saying it out loud.

src: अगली बार जब वह नहा रही थी, तो उसने फिर से ज़ोर से दस्तक सुनी.
mt: The next time she was taking a shower, she heard a loud thump again.
ref: The next time she took a shower, she heard the loud knock again.

src: वह नौकरी नहीं ढूंढ सका.
mt: He could not find a job.
ref: He couldn't find a job.

src: उसे बोर्ड देखने के लिए उनकी ज़रूरत थी.
mt: She needed to see the board.
ref: He needed them to see the board.

src: जब हमें आख़िरकार डांस करने का मौका मिला तो मैंने उसके पैर पर कदम रख दिया.
mt: When we finally got the chance to dance, I put my foot on his leg.
ref: When we finally got the chance to dance I stepped on her foot.

src: अगली बात हमें पता चली कि वह एक समलैंगिक व्यक्ति के साथ छेड़खानी कर रहा था.
mt: Next, we learned that he was harassing a gay man.
ref: The next thing we knew he was flirting with a gay man.

src: इसके बाद, वह नीचे की ओर स्लाइड करते हुए स्लाइड से उतर गया.
mt: It then slid down the slide to the ground.
ref: After that, he went sliding down the slide.

src: हमने नीली गाड़ियों को गिनने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: We have decided to count blue cars.
ref: We decided to count the blue cars.

src: उसने अपने सभी दोस्तों को आमंत्रित किया।
mt: He invited all his friends.
ref: She invited all her friends.

src: उसने अपने स्थानीय पार्क में झील के चारों ओर एक लंबी सैर की थी।
mt: He had taken a long walk around the lake in his local park.
ref: He had a long jog around the lake in his local park.

src: बर्फ साफ होने तक लार्स दोपहर भर लंबे समय तक काम करता है।
mt: Lars works all afternoon until the snow clears.
ref: Lars works long all afternoon until the snow is cleared.

src: उसे कुछ ईमेल मिले जो किसी अन्य व्यक्ति के थे।
mt: He received some emails that were not his.
ref: He found some emails that were from another man.

src: लेकिन एक बार माइक ने पेरी को सिर के पिछले हिस्से में दुर्घटनावश मारा।
mt: But once Mike hit Perry in the back of the head by accident.
ref: But one time Mike hit Perry by accident in the back of the head.

src: उसने पहला लोड वॉशर में डाला।
mt: He put the first load in the washer.
ref: She dumped the first load into the washer.

src: हमने परिवार के साथ वहां तूफान का इंतजार किया।
mt: We waited for the storm with the family.
ref: We waited out the storm there with family.

src: वह दौड़कर डेंटिस्ट के पास गया।
mt: He ran to the dentist's office.
ref: He rushed to the dentist.

src: अंत में उसे एहसास हुआ कि उसने इसे कल रात बार में पहना था।
mt: In the end, he realized he had worn it to the bar last night.
ref: Finally he realizes he wore it to the bar last night.

src: अंत में उसके माता-पिता उसे लेने के लिए तैयार हो गए।
mt: In the end, his parents were willing to take him.
ref: Finally her parents agreed to get her one.

src: वह निराश और बिना उपहार के घर आया।
mt: She came home disappointed and without a gift.
ref: He came home disappointed and without a gift.

src: वह मुश्किल से अपने बिलों का भुगतान कर पाता था।
mt: He had difficulty paying his bills.
ref: He could barely pay his bills.

src: उसने उन्हें क्लब में नाचते हुए पहना।
mt: He dressed them in clubbing attire and danced.
ref: She wore them dancing to the club.

src: जोस अपने परिवार के अन्य सदस्यों से मेक्सिको में मिलने के लिए यात्रा करना चाहता है।
mt: Jose wants to travel to Mexico to meet his family.
ref: Jose wants to take a trip to visit his other family members Mexico.

src: वह योग में ख़राब थी और महीनों तक उसने सुधार नहीं किया।
mt: She was bad at yoga and hadn't improved for months.
ref: She was terrible at Yoga and for months she did not improve.

src: एक हफ्ते में यह दूसरा पॉप क्विज था।
mt: This was the second pop quiz in a week.
ref: This was the second pop quiz in a week.

src: यह सब तब सामने आया जब ऐन एक टेस्ट में D घर ले कर आयी।
mt: This came to light when D house came to test one.
ref: It all came to a head when Ann brought home a D on a test.

src: वह किचन में नाश्ता करने चली गई।
mt: She went to the kitchen to have breakfast.
ref: She went to the kitchen to have breakfast.

src: उसकी माँ ने बाहर जाकर उसके लिए एक खरीदा।
mt: His mother bought him one outside.
ref: His mother went out and bought him one.

src: दोनों स्टोर में घुसे और इधर-उधर देखने लगे।
mt: 2 men entered the store and started looking around.
ref: They both entered the store and looked around.

src: ज़ेके ने पिशाच या जादूगर बनने के बारे में सोचा।
mt: Zeke thought about becoming a vampire or wizard.
ref: Zeke thought about being a vampire or a wizard.

src: इसका पिछले हफ्ते देशभर में डेब्यू होने जा रहा था।
mt: It was due to debut across the country last week.
ref: It was going to debut nationwide last week.

src: जल्द ही, मार्ज साप्ताहिक पूल पार्टियों का आयोजन करने लगी।
mt: Soon, Marg started hosting weekly pool parties.
ref: Soon, Marge was throwing weekly pool parties.

src: शरारती महसूस करते हुए, वह सेब के बगीचे की ओर लपकी।
mt: Feeling mischievous, he dashed toward the apple orchard.
ref: Feeling naughty, she snuck toward the apple orchard.

src: बेशक ऐसा नहीं था, और रिक इसे किसी अजनबी के पास नहीं छोड़ना चाहता था।
mt: Of course, it wasn't, and Rick didn't want to leave it with a stranger.
ref: Of course it wasn't, and Rick didn't want to leave it with a stranger.

src: आज मैंने फ्रिज में पिज्जा देखा।
mt: I saw a pizza in the fridge today.
ref: Today I saw pizza in the fridge.

src: वह उसके साथ बहुत समय बिता पाने में समर्थ होने के लिए उत्साहित था।
mt: He was excited to be able to spend a lot of time with her.
ref: He was excited to be able to spend a lot of time with her.

src: स्टेन ने विनती और मिन्नत की, लेकिन कोई फायदा नहीं हुआ।
mt: Stan pleaded and begged, but it was to no avail.
ref: Stan begged and pleaded, but to no avail.

src: यह उसके पड़ोसी के घर की खिड़की को पार कर गया।
mt: It went through the window of his neighbor's house.
ref: It went through the window of his neighbors house.

src: वह समुद्र के पानी में कूद गया।
mt: He jumped into the sea.
ref: He jumped into the ocean waters.

src: एक बार घर के अंदर आने पर, हमने उसे बाथरूम में भेज दिया।
mt: Once inside the house, we sent him to the bathroom.
ref: Once inside the house, we sent him to the bathroom.

src: उसकी बाइक तुरंत रुकी और उसे पलट दिया।
mt: His bike stopped immediately and he was thrown off.
ref: His bike stopped immediately and flip him over it.

src: हवाई जहाज की उड़ान में कई घंटे लग गए।
mt: The flight was delayed for several hours.
ref: The airplane flight took several hours.

src: वे अपना अधिकांश समय अन्य लोगों की पोस्ट पढ़ने में व्यतीत करते थे।
mt: They spent most of their time reading other people's posts.
ref: They spent most of their time reading other people's posts.

src: कई लोग आए।
mt: Many people came.
ref: Many people came.

src: मैं बहुत सारे नए दोस्तों से मिला।
mt: I met a lot of new friends.
ref: I met a lot of new friends.

src: उसने कई बार ऑन बटन दबाया।
mt: He pressed the on button many times.
ref: He pressed the on button several times.

src: उसने उस अनजान व्यक्ति को एक मूर्खतापूर्ण पत्र लिखा।
mt: He wrote a foolish letter to that unknown person.
ref: She wrote a silly letter to that random person.

src: वह फ़्लर्ट करने के लिए उसके पास गया लेकिन उसने उसे पसंद नहीं किया।
mt: He went to her place to flirt but she didn't like him.
ref: He went up to her to flirt but she didn't like him.

src: दुर्भाग्य से वायलिन के लिए मेरा कॉन्सर्ट रद्द नहीं किया गया था।
mt: Unfortunately, my violin concert was not canceled.
ref: Unfortunately my concert for violin was not canceled.

src: जब वे सिनेमाघर पहुंचे, तो उन्होंने समझौता करने का फैसला किया।
mt: When they arrived at the cinema, they decided to compromise.
ref: When they got to the movie theater, they decided to make a compromise.

src: उसे जूतों पर अच्छी सेल मिली।
mt: He got a good sale on shoes.
ref: She found a great sale on shoes.

src: हमने अपना सारा सामान पैक कर लिया है।
mt: We have packed all our stuff.
ref: We've packed all of our things.

src: फिर शॉन ने कुछ पसीना बहाया और कोने की दुकान की ओर चल दिया।
mt: Then Shawn perspired a little and walked toward the corner store.
ref: Shawn then threw on some sweats and headed to the corner store.

src: एक दिन उसने अपनी गुड़िया खो दी।
mt: 1 day he lost his doll.
ref: One day she lost her doll.

src: पिछले हफ्ते उन्होंने उससे पूछने का फैसला किया।
mt: Last week, he decided to ask her.
ref: Last week they decided to ask her.

src: इसलिए उन्होंने वेजी बर्गर बनाने का फैसला किया।
mt: So they decided to make veggie burgers.
ref: So he decided to make a veggie burger.

src: वेटिंग रूम में बहुत सारे लोग थे!
mt: There were a lot of people in the waiting room!
ref: There were a lot of people in the waiting room!

src: वह अपनी माँ से उसके लिए पेंट खरीदने के लिए कहती है।
mt: She asks her mother to buy her some paint.
ref: She ask her mom to buy her paint.

src: केन और उसके डेट ने खाने का आर्डर दिया और थोड़ी बात की।
mt: Ken and his date ordered food and chatted a bit.
ref: Ken and his date ordered food and had small talk.

src: एक दिन उसने उसके सामने दिखावा करने की कोशिश की।
mt: 1 day he tried to show off in front of her.
ref: One day, he tried to show off in front of her.

src: उसने उद्यान केंद्र से अंकुर खरीदे।
mt: He bought seedlings from the garden center.
ref: She purchased seedlings from the garden center.

src: उसने सैंडविच के लिए सामग्री इकट्ठी की।
mt: He collected the ingredients for a sandwich.
ref: He gathered the materials for a sandwich.

src: एक दिन उसे वह नहीं मिली।
mt: 1 day later, he didn't find her.
ref: One day he couldn't find it.

src: मैं इसे घर ले आया और अपने सभी दोस्तों को बुलाया।
mt: I brought it home and invited all my friends.
ref: I brought it home and called all my friends.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, उसने एक पैन गिरा दिया और खुद को जला लिया।
mt: Unfortunately, he dropped a pan and burned himself.
ref: Unfortunately, he dropped a pan and burned himself.

src: उसने उस व्यक्ति से पूछताछ किया और उसने इससे इनकार किया।
mt: He questioned the person and he denied it.
ref: She confronted the person and they denied it.

src: एक अन्य व्यक्ति ने उसके दोस्त के घर पर पेंटिंग देखी।
mt: Another person saw his friend's house painting.
ref: Another person saw the painting at her friend's house.

src: टॉम ने सोचा कि यह एक अद्भुत उपहार था।
mt: Tom thought it was a wonderful gift.
ref: Tom thought it was a wonderful gift.

src: उसकी माँ उसे दिलासा देती है।
mt: His mother comforts him.
ref: His mom comforts him.

src: माइक स्वस्थ नाश्ते का आनंद लेना चाहता था।
mt: Mike wanted to enjoy a healthy breakfast.
ref: Mike wanted to enjoy a healthier breakfast.

src: मैंने किनारों को कील से जोड़ने की कोशिश की।
mt: I tried to nail the edges together.
ref: I tried connecting the borders with nails.

src: जोश को समझ में नहीं आया कि वे आलोचना को स्वीकार क्यों नहीं कर सके।
mt: Josh didn't understand why they couldn't accept criticism.
ref: Josh didn't understand why they couldn't accept criticism.

src: उसके अपार्टमेंट के ठीक पास, बड़ा बुफे था जहाँ वह जायेगा।
mt: He was going to a big buffet right next to his apartment.
ref: There was this great buffet right near his apartment he would go to.

src: इस हफ्ते उसे एक नया बॉस मिला है।
mt: He got a new boss this week.
ref: This week they got a new boss.

src: लेस्टर ने अपना सारा खाली समय क्रिस्टीना के साथ बिताया।
mt: Lester spent all his free time with Christina.
ref: Lester spent all his free time with Christina.

src: मैंने टीवी बंद कर दिया ताकि मेरा ध्यान भंग न हो।
mt: I turned off the TV so as not to be distracted.
ref: I turned off the TV so I wouldn't be distracted.

src: यह टोपी शानदार होने वाली है!
mt: This hat is going to be great!
ref: This hat is going to be amazing!

src: उसने इसे गुलाबी फ्रॉस्टिंग में ढक दिया।
mt: She covered it in pink frosting.
ref: She covered it in pink frosting.

src: यह सिर्फ एक सामान्य कुत्ते की तरह नहीं सोता है।
mt: It's not just a dog that sleeps like this.
ref: It doesn't just sleep like a normal dog.

src: उसने एमी से कहा कि उसे नहाने की जरूरत है क्योंकि उसे पसीना आ रहा है।
mt: She told Amy that she needs to take a shower because she is sweating.
ref: She told Amy she needed to shower since she was sweaty.

src: सभी ने स्टॉप के पास पिनव्हील लगाए।
mt: All have stopped at the pinwheel.
ref: Everyone planted pinwheels near the stop.

src: अचानक उसका वाटर ब्रेक हो गया।
mt: Suddenly his water brake failed.
ref: All of a sudden her water broke.

src: हालाँकि, उसके दोस्तों ने उससे कोशिश करने के लिए बात की।
mt: However, his friends had tried to talk him out of it.
ref: However, her friends talked her into trying it.

src: मुझे इस बात में बहुत दिलचस्पी हो गई कि क्यों कुछ बच्चों को सीखने में कठिनाई होती है।
mt: I have become very interested in why some children have difficulty learning.
ref: I became very interested in why some kids have a harder time learning.

src: उसने सोचा कि वह काम पर बस मशीन से कुछ खरीदेगा।
mt: He thought he would just buy something from the machine at work.
ref: He figured he would just buy something out of the machine at work.

src: वह रात भर अपने बिस्तर पर लुढ़कता रहा।
mt: He lay on his bed all night.
ref: He rolled around in his bed all night.

src: मैं उसके पास गया और पूछा कि वह कैसा है।
mt: I went to him and asked how he was.
ref: I walked up to him and asked how he was.

src: फिर, उन्होंने थ्योरी ऑफ़ रिलेटिविटी पर एक किताब पढ़ी।
mt: Then, they read a book on the theory of relativity.
ref: Then, he read a book on the Theory of Relativity.

src: उसे एक नैनी के रूप में नौकरी के लिए एक विज्ञापन मिला।
mt: She got a job ad for a nanny.
ref: She found a listing for a job as a nanny.

src: वह चीखी और भागी, लेकिन उससे सांप के हाथ पर काट लिया!
mt: She screamed and ran, but he bit her hand!
ref: She shrieked and ran, but not before the snake bit her hand!

src: उसने वास्तव में इसके लिए कभी तैयारी नहीं की।
mt: He never prepared for it in the first place.
ref: He never actually prepared for it.

src: जैसे ही वह रास्ते पर चल रहा था, उसने एक फुफकारने की आवाज सुनी।
mt: As he walked along the road, he heard a crackling sound.
ref: As he walking on the trail, he heard a hissing sound.

src: वह दर्द से रोया और घर भाग गया।
mt: He cried in pain and ran home.
ref: He cried in pain and raced home.

src: हालाँकि, उन्होंने देखा कि स्किप बहुत भेंगा देख रहा था।
mt: However, they saw Skip was looking very dazed.
ref: They noticed, however, that Skip was squinting a lot.

src: राय के सौतेले पिता चिल्लाए और अपनी थाली पूरे कमरे में फेंक दी।
mt: Ray's stepfather yelled and threw his plate across the room.
ref: Rae's stepfather yelled and threw his plate across the room.

src: उसने उन्हें कॉल किया, लेकिन किसी ने जवाब नहीं दिया।
mt: He called them, but no one answered.
ref: She called them, but no one answered.

src: उन्होंने सांता को एक पत्र भेजा।
mt: They sent a letter to Santa.
ref: They sent a letter to Santa.

src: मैं डॉक्टर के पास गया।
mt: I went to the doctor's.
ref: I went to see the doctor.

src: वह प्रतिदिन अभ्यास करता था।
mt: He practiced every day.
ref: He practiced every day.

src: पिछले हफ़्ते, जीना अपना हिस्सा नहीं कर पाई थी.
mt: Last week, Gina couldn't get her share.
ref: Last week Gina wasn't able to get to hers.

src: टिमी उदास था, पर वह अपनी माँ की बात समझ रहा था.
mt: Timmy was sad, but he understood his mother's words.
ref: Timmy was sad but he understood what his mother said.

src: डॉक्टर माइक, जेन को फ़्ली डिप इस्तेमाल करने के लिए कहा.
mt: Dr. Mike, Jen to use fly dip.
ref: Doctor Mike suggested a flea dip to Jen.

src: उसे देर हो रही थी, इसलिए उसने गाड़ी तेज़ चलाई.
mt: It was getting late, so he sped up the car.
ref: She knew she had limited time, so she drove fast.

src: पर सब जगह देखने के बाद भी उसे वह नहीं मिला.
mt: He looked everywhere, but he couldn't find it.
ref: But after checking everywhere she couldn't see it.

src: जैसे ही वह इंटरव्यू के लिए बैठी, उसने महसूस किया कि उसका मोज़ा फट गया है.
mt: As soon as she sat down for the interview, she noticed her mozzie had burst.
ref: As she sat at the interview, Sarah noticed a run in her stockings.

src: इसे मछली खानी थी.
mt: It was eating fish.
ref: He wanted to eat fish.

src: उसने देखा कि वह वहाँ मौजूद बाकी लोगों से काफ़ी बड़ा है.
mt: He noticed that he was much taller than the other people there.
ref: He notices that he is much older than the other people there.

src: रॉन ने तय किया कि पीना बंद कर देना ही उसके लिए सबसे अच्छा होगा.
mt: Ron decided that the best thing for him to do was to stop drinking.
ref: Ron decided it was best if he didn't drink anymore.

src: लेकिन उनका ध्यान रखना उतना ही मुश्किल हो गया.
mt: But it was getting harder to keep track of them.
ref: But it became difficult to take care of.

src: उसे एहसास हुआ कि वह देर तक सोई रही है!
mt: She realized she had slept too late!
ref: She realized she must have overslept!

src: उन्होंने बताया कि उनके पास सिर्फ़ Pepsi के प्रॉडक्ट हैं.
mt: They said they only had Pepsi products.
ref: They told me they only had Pepsi products.

src: चेतवनी में सुनामी आने की आशंका जताई गई थी.
mt: A tsunami warning was issued for Chetwan.
ref: The alert warn the residents of a chance there will be a tsunami.

src: सब बाहर बर्फ़ में खेलने चले गए.
mt: All went out to play in the snow.
ref: Everyone went outside to play in the snow.

src: जो उसे अपने हाथ से एक मूँगफली खिलाने की कोशिश कर रहा था.
mt: Who was trying to feed him a peanut with his hand.
ref: Joe was trying to get it to take a peanut from his hand.

src: कुछ हफ़्तों के बाद, वह खराब हो गया.
mt: After a few weeks, it went bad.
ref: After a couple of weeks it stopped working.

src: ऐरिक उठा और पास वाले बार में चला गया.
mt: Erik got up and went to the bar next door.
ref: Eric woke up and yelped the nearest bar.

src: पीछे से उसकी पैंट की सिलाई बिल्कुल ऊपर तक खुल गई थी.
mt: Her pants were completely unzipped from the back.
ref: The seam of her pants in the back had ripped all the way open.

src: मैं टोइंग कंपनी को कॉल कर सकता था, लेकिन मैंने नहीं किया.
mt: I could have called the towing company, but I didn't.
ref: I could have called the towing company but chose not to.

src: समय के साथ, मैंने उन्हें मुलायम करने की कोशिश करता रहा.
mt: Over time, I tried to soften them.
ref: I tried to break them in over time.

src: वह प्लेन को हवा में ले जाने से घबरा रहा था.
mt: He was afraid of flying the plane.
ref: He was nervous to take the plane up in the air.

src: लैरी, सलाद बनाने के लिए टमाटर, सलाद पत्ता, और दूसरी सब्ज़ियाँ काटता है.
mt: Larry, cutting tomatoes, lettuce, and other vegetables for a salad.
ref: Larry slices tomato, lettuce, and other vegetables for the salad.

src: सारा बहुत खुश थी.
mt: Sara was very happy.
ref: Sarah was very excited.

src: उसे टावर ऑफ़ लंदन के नाम से जाना जाता है.
mt: It is known as the Tower of London.
ref: It was called the Tower of London.

mt: 1200 photos on his phone.
ref: She has 1200 photos on her phone.

src: उसने उसे बदलवा दिया और देखा कि उसकी कार अच्छे से काम कर रही है.
mt: He replaced it and saw that his car was working fine.
ref: He changed it out and made sure her car was working properly.

src: एक दिन जब वह चॉक छिपा रही थी, टीचर ने ग्रेस को पकड़ लिया.
mt: 1 day when she was hiding the chalk, the teacher grabbed Grace.
ref: One day as she was hiding the chalk, the teacher caught Grace.

src: एक बार क्रिसमस के दिन, उसने उनसे फिर से रेसिपी माँगी.
mt: 1. One Christmas day, she asked for the recipe again.
ref: One Christmas, she asked her again for the recipe.

src: कूड़े के ढेर की ओर जाते हुए आधे रास्ते से, उसने बहुत सारे पक्षियों को कूडे़ से खाते हुए देखा.
mt: As he was walking towards the trash heap, he saw many birds eating trash.
ref: Halfway to the dumpster, he saw many birds, feeding on the trash.

src: दूसरे आधे लोगों को सॉसेज खाना चाहते थे.
mt: 50% of the people wanted to eat sausage.
ref: The other half wanted sausage.

src: उसने आगे बढ़ कर अपना परीचय देने की हिम्मत जुटाई.
mt: He mustered the courage to introduce himself.
ref: He worked up the courage to go over and introduce himself.

src: उसके माता-पिता उपस्थित रहने में सक्षम थे.
mt: His parents were able to attend.
ref: His parents were able to attend.

src: वो अगले दिन देर से आया.
mt: He was late the next day.
ref: He came in late the next day.

src: इसके बाद, उसने पत्रिकाओं में अंगूठियों को सर्किल करा.
mt: He then circled his fingers in magazines.
ref: Next, she circled rings in magazines.

src: जब मैंने इसे सुना तो मैं मदहोश हो गया.
mt: When I heard this, I was stunned.
ref: When I listened to it I was blown away.

src: जब लोग रेडियो को ट्यून करते थे, तो सभी स्टेशनों पर एक ही गाना बजता था.
mt: When people tuned their radios, the same song was playing on all stations.
ref: When people tuned in the radio, the same song played on all stations.

src: प्रतियोगिता के एक दिन बाद उसे बचा हुआ होमवर्क याद आया.
mt: 1 day after the competition, he remembered the homework he had left undone.
ref: One day after a competition she remembered overdue homework.

src: तुरंत ही उसे पता लग गया कि वह जीवविज्ञानी बनने जा रही है.
mt: She soon realized she was going to be a biologist.
ref: Immediately she knew she was going to become a biologist.

src: वो प्रेरित हुई और उसने सॉकर टीम में शामिल होने का फ़ैसला कीया.
mt: She was inspired and decided to join a soccer team.
ref: She was inspired and decided to join a soccer team.

src: उसने कुछ कैश निकाला और उसे डिपोसिट के रूप में इस्तेमाल किया.
mt: He withdrew some cash and used it as a deposit.
ref: She took out some cash instead and used that as a deposit.

src: अगले साल, वो कैंप में भाग लेने के लिए बहुत बूढ़ी थी.
mt: 2017, she was too old to participate in the camp.
ref: The following year, she was too old to attend the camp.

src: उसकी मां को शक होने लगा था.
mt: His mother began to suspect.
ref: Her mother was becoming suspicious.

src: उसके पति ने उसे घर की अच्छे से तलाशी लेने की सलाह दी.
mt: Her husband advised her to search the house thoroughly.
ref: Her husband admonished her to search the house more carefully.

src: अमूमन जब बच्चे शांत होते थे तो कुछ करने वाले होते थे.
mt: Children were usually quiet when they were doing something.
ref: Usually, when the kids were quiet, they were getting into something.

src: लेकिन ओरि को बाज़ार में नहीं मिला.
mt: But Oryx was not found in the market.
ref: But Ori couldn't find them at the market.

src: वे क्रिसमसकैरल गाते हुए कमरे-कमरे गए.
mt: They went room to room singing Christmas carols.
ref: They went from room to room, singing Christmas carols.

src: उसके बाद, उन्होंने सांप और छिपकलियों को देखा!
mt: Then they saw snakes and lizards!
ref: After that, they saw snakes and lizards!

src: उसने घर से पैसे कमाने के तरीकों के लिए ऑनलाइन सर्च किया.
mt: He searched online for ways to make money at home.
ref: She searched online for ways to make money from home.

src: हम सबने एक साथ बैठकर खाना खाया.
mt: We all sat down together to eat.
ref: We all sat together and ate dinner.

src: अगले दिन उन्होंने अपनी भूमिकाओं को बदलने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: The next day they decided to change their roles.
ref: The next day they decided to switch their roles.

src: वो कपड़े छाटने लगी.
mt: She started tearing her clothes.
ref: She began to sort through the clothes.

src: वह घर गई और अपना ब्लेंडर निकाला.
mt: She went home and got her blender.
ref: She went home and got out her blender.

src: मैं गैस स्टेशन के तरफ़ जा रहा था.
mt: I was going towards the gas station.
ref: I was headed in the direction of the gas station.

src: वो काफ़ी घबराया हुआ था.
mt: He was very nervous.
ref: He was pretty nervous.

src: एक दिन, उसने स्कूल छोड़ने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: 1 day, he decided to quit school.
ref: One day, she decided to ditch school.

src: ऑनलाइन परिणामों ने उसे यकीन दिला दिया था कि उसे एक भयानक बीमारी है.
mt: Online results had convinced him that he had a terrible disease.
ref: The online results convinced him that he had a terrible disease.

src: वो जाने ही वाला था कि उसने वो देखा.
mt: He was about to leave when he saw that.
ref: He was about to leave when he spotted it.

src: आख़िरकार इसे घटाकर दो कर दिया गया.
mt: It was finally reduced to two.
ref: Eventually it was narrowed down to two.

src: उसने मदद के लिए पड़ोसियों और आसपास के व्यवसायों की तरफ़ रुख किया.
mt: He asked for help from neighbors and nearby businesses.
ref: He turned to neighbors and nearby businesses for help.

src: एक दिन उसकी मुलाक़ात जॉन से हुई जो बिल्कुल एकसा ही मेहसूस करते थे.
mt: 1 day later, she met John, who felt the same.
ref: One day he met John who happened to feel the same way.

src: उसके परिवार ने परम्पराओं को निभाया, आयरिश खाना खाया और आयरिश स्पोर्ट्स देखे।
mt: His family followed tradition, ate Irish food and watched Irish sports.
ref: His family kept customs, ate Irish food, and watched Irish sports.

src: जब वह कमरे से बाहर निकला तो उसे एक अजीब सी गंध आई
mt: When he stepped out of the room, he got a strange smell
ref: When he was out of the room, he smelled a strange sound.

src: बेथ को आलू हाथ से मसलने थे क्योंकि उसकी माँ के पास फूड प्रॉसेसर नहीं था।
mt: Beth was mashing potatoes by hand because her mother didn't have a food processor.
ref: Her mother didn't have a food processor, Beth had to mash by hand.

src: एक दिन प्रिन्सिपल ने उन्हें चूमते हुए पकड़ लिया।
mt: 1 day later, the principal caught him kissing her.
ref: One day the principal caught the two kissing.

src: वेस्टर्न फिल्मों का चलन कम हो गया था और वो थिएटर में नहीं चल रहीं थीं।
mt: Western films were not doing well and were not being shown in theaters.
ref: Westerns had lost favor with the public and none were showing.

src: जब पहले पीरियड में मैं गया तो सब कुछ जाना पहचाना लग रहा था।
mt: When I went to the first period, everything seemed familiar.
ref: When I walked into first period, it was very familiar.

src: वह दुकान पर गई और पिस्सू और टिक शैम्पू खरीद लिया।
mt: She went to the store and bought bug and tick shampoo.
ref: She went to the store and put flea and tick shampoo.

src: मैंने वहाँ कई किताबें खरीदीं क्योंकि उनकी कीमत केवल दस सेंट थी।
mt: I bought many books there because their price was only ten cents.
ref: I bought many books there, since they cost only ten cents.

src: मैं थोड़ा और जानने के लिए पालतू जानवरों के स्टोर पर गया।
mt: I went to a pet store to learn a little more.
ref: I visited the pet store to do some research.

src: वहाँ कई बीगल पिल्ले थे।
mt: There were many bengal kittens.
ref: There were lots of beagle puppies there.

src: उसे अच्छा लगा कि यहाँ लोग कितने दोस्ताना थे।
mt: He liked how friendly people were here.
ref: He loved how friendly the people were!

src: उसने अपने रेज्यूमे को बढ़ाने चढ़ाने के लिए चिड़ियाघर में वालंटियर के रूप में भी काम किया।
mt: He also volunteered at the zoo to beef up his resume.
ref: She even volunteered at the local zoo to pad her resume.

src: मैंने उसे सुधारने के लिए कुछ उपाय किए।
mt: I have made some improvements to it.
ref: I tried a few different things to fix it.

src: जब मैं पाने नोट्स कि तरफ देख रहा था लेकिन मैं ध्यान नहीं दिया।
mt: When I looked at the notes I was getting but I didn't pay attention.
ref: While I was looking at my notes, I barely paid attention.

src: जैक ने अनुमान लगाया इस सप्ताहांत पर स्की के लिए अच्छा मौसम रहेगा।
mt: Jack predicted good weather for skiing this weekend.
ref: Jack theorized that this weekend would have perfect skiing weather.

src: उससे खड़ा भी नहीं हुआ जा रहा था।
mt: He was not even standing up.
ref: He was too weak to move.

src: उसने 3 महीने नौकरी ढूँढी।
mt: 3 months job search.
ref: He searched for 3 months.

src: उन्होंने उसे गहरे पानी में न जाने को कहा लेकिन वो फिर भी गया।
mt: He told him not to go into deep water, but he still went.
ref: They told him to go into deep water and he did.

src: जैसे ही उसने खाना बनाने की शुरुआत की उसे ध्यान आया की वह टोर्टिला तो लाना ही भूल गया!
mt: As soon as he started cooking, he realized he had forgotten to buy the tortillas!
ref: As he was preparing dinner he realized he forgot the tortillas!

src: इसलिए उसने विटामिन खाई।
mt: So he ate a vitamin.
ref: So she took her vitamins.

src: उसने ज़ोर देकर कहा कि वह डॉक्टर से मिले।
mt: He insisted that he see a doctor.
ref: She insisted that he go see a doctor.

src: टिम ने डब्बा खोला और निर्देशों का पालन किया।
mt: Tim opened the box and followed the instructions.
ref: Tim opened the box and followed the instructions.

src: उसने खूब अभ्यास किया।
mt: He practiced a lot.
ref: She practiced and practiced.

src: जीना ने अपना संतुलन बनाए रखने की कोशिश की।
mt: She tried to keep her balance.
ref: Gina tried to keep her composure.

src: उसने स्कूल के रास्ते में ही पूरी चाय पी ली।
mt: He finished the entire cup of tea before he even reached the school.
ref: She drank all of her tea on the drive to school.

src: जल्दी हो बेथ का घर डॉल से भर गया।
mt: 1. Hurry up, fill Beth's house with dolls.
ref: Soon Beth's house was full of dolls.

src: जब वह रेस कर रहा था तो पहिये निकाल गए।
mt: When he was racing, the wheels were removed.
ref: While he raced, his tires fell off.

src: वह जितनों को जानता था उसने सब से पूछा कि उसे क्या खरीदना चाहिए।
mt: He asked everyone he knew what he should buy.
ref: He asked all the people he knew what he should get her.

src: लेकिन फिर उसने देखा कि बाकी लोग निराश नहीं थे।
mt: But he saw that the others were not disappointed.
ref: But then she saw that other attendees weren't upset.

src: उसने घंटी बजाई और पूछा कि क्या वह बवंडर के शांत होने तक रुक सकता है।
mt: He rang the bell and asked if he could wait until the storm calmed down.
ref: He rang the doorbell and asked if he can stay until tornado dies off.

src: कार्यकारी अधिकारी ने हाँ कर दी. उसकी बस इतनी शर्त थी कि वह लेख प्रकाशित होना चाहिए.
mt: The executive agreed. His only condition was that the article be published.
ref: The executive said yes, as long as the story was published.

src: फिर उसे एक तरकीब सूझी.
mt: Then he thought of a plan.
ref: Then she found a solution.

src: उसने जानवरों के बारे में कुछ भी नहीं पता था.
mt: He knew nothing about animals.
ref: He knew nothing about animals.

src: कैशियर गुस्ताख आदमी था, उसने और देर लगाई.
mt: The cashier was a slow man, he took too long.
ref: The cashier was sassy, and egged him on further.

src: हम मेरे गैराज में प्रैक्टिस करते थे.
mt: We practiced in my garage.
ref: We practiced in my garage.

src: जैक ने लगभग तीस मिनट लगाकर ऑनलाइन पिल्ला चुना.
mt: 30 minutes online puppy pick.
ref: Jack spent about thirty minutes looking online for a puppy.

src: उन्होंने प्रैक्टिस में उसकी मदद करने के लिए कहा.
mt: He asked her to help him in practice.
ref: He offered to help her practice.

src: उसकी माँ ने देखा कि उसे रात का आसमान पसंद है.
mt: His mother saw that he liked the night sky.
ref: His mom saw that he loved the night sky.

src: उसने सब तरफ़ देखा, पर वे उसे कहीं नहीं मिले!
mt: He looked all around, but they were nowhere to be found!
ref: He looked everywhere but could not find them!

src: जब जिमी का हाथ बर्नर से छुआ, तो वह जोर से चिल्लाया.
mt: When Jimmy touched the burner with his hand, he screamed loudly.
ref: Jimmy screamed when his outreached hand touched the burner.

src: कई साल बीत गए और बिली का परिवार कहीं और चला गया.
mt: Many years passed and Billy's family moved away.
ref: Years passed and Billy's family moved.

src: मैंने बहुत सारे कैंडी और स्नैक ले लिए.
mt: I have taken a lot of candy and snacks.
ref: I picked out a lot of candy and snacks!

src: माइक एक गोल्डन रिट्रीवर ले आया और उसका नाम स्पॉट रखा.
mt: Mike brought home a Golden Retriever and named him Spot.
ref: Mike got a Golden Retriever and named him Spot.

src: उसे बिल भरने के लिए पैसे चाहिए थे.
mt: He needed money to pay the bill.
ref: He needed money for bills.

src: उसे कोडिंग सीखने वाली कोई वेबसाइट मिल गई.
mt: He found a website to learn coding.
ref: He found a website to teach him to code.

src: राकेश उसे घर ले आया और उसे पानी में उबाल लिया.
mt: Rakesh brought her home and boiled her in water.
ref: Rakesh brings it home and boils it in water.

src: मुझे गाड़ी रोकना नहीं आता था.
mt: I didn't know how to stop the car.
ref: I didn't know how to stop!

src: उस दिन स्कूल रद्द कर दिया गया था.
mt: School was closed that day.
ref: School was canceled that day.

src: उसने रैपर काउंटर पर छोड़ दिए.
mt: He left a rap on the counter.
ref: He left the wrappers on the counter.

src: ब्रैड बहुत देर तक रोया.
mt: Brad cried for a long time.
ref: Brad cried for a long time.

src: पाउलो ने कई छात्रों से चुनाव में उसका सहयोग करने के लिए कहा.
mt: Paul  asked  several  students  to  help  him  in  the  election.
ref: Paulo asked many students for their support in the election.

src: एक बतख उसका पीछा करने लगा!
mt: 1 duck started chasing him!
ref: One of the ducks started chasing him!

src: पार्टी में सभी को वह पसंद आई.
mt: All the party liked it.
ref: Everyone at the party loved it.

src: मैंने तैरना शुरू किया और वजन कम किया.
mt: I started swimming and lost weight.
ref: I took up swimming and lost the weight.

src: घड़ी की सुई आगे बढ़ रही थी और समय खत्म हो रहा था.
mt: The clock was ticking and time was running out.
ref: The clock was ticking and time was running out.

src: एक दिन जेन ने उसके लिए एक गुलाब लेने का तय किया.
mt: 1 day ago, Jen decided to buy a rose for herself.
ref: One day Jane decided to get her a rose.

src: एक दिन वह बहुत ऊँचाई पर चढ़ गया और अंत में चोटी पर पहुँच गया.
mt: 1 day he climbed very high and finally reached the peak.
ref: One day he climbed very high,and finally reached the top.

src: वह उसे कहीं भी नहीं मिला.
mt: He didn't find him anywhere.
ref: He couldn't find it anywhere.

src: वे उसको लेकर बहुत उम्मीदें लगाए बैठे थे, पर वह बेकार निकली!
mt: They were very hopeful, but it turned out to be a waste!
ref: They were looking forward to it so much, but it turned out to be bad!

src: दादी ने खुली बाहों से उनका स्वागत किया.
mt: Grandma welcomed them with open arms.
ref: Grandma welcomed them with open arms.

src: उसकी बिल्ली पेड़ में फंस गई थी।
mt: His cat got stuck in a tree.
ref: Her cat was stuck in the tree.

src: उसे नहीं पता था कि दूसरी मछलियाँ कैसे प्रतिक्रिया देंगी।
mt: He didn't know how the other fish would react.
ref: She wasn't sure how the other fish would react.

src: मेरे घर से लगभग दस मिनट की दूरी पर एक थिएटर था जो बढ़िया था।
mt: There was a good theater about ten minutes from my house.
ref: There was a theater about ten minutes from my house that was decent.

src: अंदर से बहुत ताजा महकती है और साफ है।
mt: It smells very fresh and clean inside.
ref: The inside smells so fresh and clean.

src: उसने एक कला प्रतियोगिता में प्रवेश किया।
mt: He entered an art competition.
ref: She entered it into an art contest.

src: घर लौटने से पहले मैं और कुत्ता ब्लॉक के चारों ओर घूमे।
mt: Before going home, I and the dog walked around the block.
ref: The dog and I walked around the block before returning home.

src: मैट की माँ ने कुछ पड़ोसियों को बुलाया, और अंततः उसका मालिक मिल गया।
mt: Matt's mother called some neighbors, and eventually found his owner.
ref: Matt's mom called some neighbors, and eventually found its owner.

src: रास्ते में उसकी मुलाकात बाइक सवार बच्चों के एक समूह से भी हुई।
mt: On the way, he met a group of children on bicycles.
ref: On the way he met a group of kids riding bikes as well.

src: कुछ देर बाद उसे धुंएं की महक आयी।
mt: After a while, the smell of smoke came.
ref: After awhile, she smelled smoke.

src: उसकी आँख लगने लगी।
mt: His eyes were closing.
ref: He started to nod off.

src: उस व्यक्ति ने जवाब दिया कि किसी भी तरह से उसकी समस्या को स्वीकार नहीं किया।
mt: He replied that he would not accept any kind of problem.
ref: They person gave an answer that in no way acknowledged her issue.

src: अचानक, उसकी स्क्रीन एक बड़े नीले रंग के त्रुटि संदेश में ढक गई।
mt: Suddenly, her screen was covered by a large blue error message.
ref: All of a sudden, his screen was covered in a large blue error message.

src: वे कुत्ते को वापस अपने अपार्टमेंट में ले गए।
mt: They brought the dog back to their apartment.
ref: They carried the dog back to their apartment.

src: अभ्यास के कीमत को समझने के लिए बिल बहुत छोटा था।
ref: Bill was too young to understand the value of practice.

src: दुर्भाग्य से, वह पार्क में गीले पत्ते पर फिसल जाता है।
mt: Unfortunately, he slips on wet leaves in the park.
ref: Carlos has hurt his knee on this walk.

src: वह खाना बनाने पर ध्यान देना भूल गया और किचन को जला दिया।
mt: He forgot to pay attention to cooking and burned the kitchen.
ref: He forgot to check the cooking and burned down the kitchen.

src: मछलियाँ सभी अलग-अलग रंगों और आकारों की थीं।
mt: The fish were all different colors and sizes.
ref: The fish were of all different colors and sizes.

src: उसने स्पेन के लिए एकतरफा टिकट खरीदा।
mt: He bought a one-way ticket to Spain.
ref: She bought a one way ticket to Spain.

src: जे घबरा गया!
ref: Jay was terrified!

src: हालाँकि, उसने पाया कि छोटा लड़का देखने में मज़ेदार था।
mt: However, he found that the little boy was fun to watch.
ref: He found that the little boy was fun to watch, though.

src: वह कुछ अलग करने के लिए उत्सुक था।
mt: He was eager to do something different.
ref: He was eager to make a difference.

src: यह पहाड़ी और फुटपाथ के ऊपर से नीचे लुढ़क गयी।
mt: It rolled over from the mountain and footpath down.
ref: It rolled down the hill and over the curb.

src: मामा बच्चों को देखने आ गयीं।
mt: Mama came to see the children.
ref: Mama came over to watch the kids.

src: जब वो पहुंचा, तो उसे महसूस हुआ कि वो मलेरिया का टीका भूल गया है।
mt: When he arrived, he realized he had forgotten to get the malaria vaccine.
ref: When he arrived, he realized he forgot his malaria vaccine.

src: जॉन का बेटा,कार्ल, सिर्फ दस साल का हुआ।
mt: John's son, Carl, is just ten years old.
ref: John's son, Carl, just turned ten.

src: गला घुटते ही वह बाथरूम की ओर भागी।
mt: He choked and ran to the bathroom.
ref: She ran to the bathroom as she gagged.

src: उसने फैसला किया कि उसे ब्रह्मांड के बारे में और जानना होगा।
mt: He decided that he needed to know more about the universe.
ref: He decided he had to learn more about the cosmos.

src: जूली, जो भोली थी, हैलोवीन पर बिल्ली के रूप में कपड़े पहने काम करने आई थी।
mt: Julie, who was naïve, came to work dressed as a cat for Halloween.
ref: Julie, who was naive, came to work dressed as a cat on Halloween.

src: जेम्स हर दिन काम से पहले दौड़ने लगा।
mt: James started running every day before work.
ref: James began running every day before work.

src: मैं थोड़ी लापरवाही से बाइक चला रहा था।
mt: I was riding my bike a little carelessly.
ref: I was biking a little recklessly.

src: जीना बता सकती थी कि शिक्षक खुश नहीं था।
mt: 1. The teacher was not happy.
ref: Gina could tell the teacher wasn't pleased.

src: उसने फ्रिज चेक किया।
mt: He checked the fridge.
ref: He checked the fridge.

src: वह वापस अपनी कार में चला गया।
mt: He went back to his car.
ref: He went back to his car.

src: मेलिसा ने अपनी मां से सलाह मांगी।
mt: Melissa asked her mother for advice.
ref: Melissa asked her mother for advice.

src: वह घबराया हुआ था लेकिन थकाऊ अभ्यास करता था।
mt: He was nervous but practiced the tedious task.
ref: He was nervous but practiced tediously.

src: आखिरकार उन्होंने अर्जेंटीना के लिए अपनी फ्लाइट बुक कर ली।
mt: Finally, they booked their flight to Argentina.
ref: Finally he has booked his flight to Argentina.

src: वह घर के पास रुक गया और कीमत पर मोलभाव किया।
mt: He stopped near the house and haggled over the price.
ref: He stopped by the house and negotiated a price.

src: उन्होंने टैंक स्थापित किया और एक वेब साइट से कुछ पौधों का ऑर्डर दिया।
mt: They set up a tank and ordered some plants from a web site.
ref: They set the tank up and ordered some plants from a web site.

src: अब कोई भी ड्रिंक ठंडी नहीं होगी!
mt: No drink will ever be cold again!
ref: Now none of the drinks would be cold!

src: पहले तो उसके माता-पिता नहीं माने।
mt: 1st they didn't believe her parents.
ref: At first her parents didn't agree.

src: ज़ोरदार बहस हुई।
mt: A heated debate ensued.
ref: There was a great deal of arguing.

src: उन्होंने स्थानीय विश्वविद्यालय में अकाउंट का अध्ययन किया।
mt: They studied accounting at a local university.
ref: He studied accounting at the local university.

src: हर एक के साथ रिबन के तार जुड़े हुए थे।
mt: Each had a ribbon of thread attached.
ref: Strands of ribbon were attached to each one.

src: मेरी भतीजी उत्साहित थी क्योंकि रेस्तरां बहुत अच्छा था।
mt: My niece was excited because the restaurant was very good.
ref: My niece was excited because the restaurant was so cool.

src: वह जल्दी से स्पेगेटी बनाती है और एक कटोरा खाती है।
mt: She quickly makes spaghetti and eats a bowl.
ref: She quickly cooks and eats a pot of spaghetti.

src: वे सभी हीरो थे।
mt: They were all heroes.
ref: They were all heros.

src: शिक्षक ने फोन रखा और उसे देखने लगा।
mt: The teacher put the phone down and looked at it.
ref: The teacher held the phone and stared at her.

src: वह ध्यान का अभ्यास करने लगी।
mt: He began to practice meditation.
ref: She began to practice meditation.

src: जैन कार में अपनी बेटी का इंतजार कर रही थी, जो नहीं आई।
mt: Jain was waiting in his car for his daughter, who did not show up.
ref: Jan waited in the car for her daughter, who didn't show up.

src: जैसे ही वह प्वाइंट पर जाने के लिए गई, उसने जोर से पॉप सुना।
mt: As soon as she got to the point, she heard a loud pop.
ref: As she went to go on pointe, she heard a loud pop.

src: साल बीत गए और पैट अब बूढ़ा हो गया है।
mt: Years have passed and Pat has grown old.
ref: Year's go by and Pat is now an old man.

src: उसके सारे दोस्त वहां होंगे।
mt: All his friends will be there.
ref: All his friends would be there.

src: उसके रूममेट ने अधिक विचारशील होने का वादा किया।
mt: His roommate promised to be more considerate.
ref: Her roommate promised to be more considerate.

src: वह जिम गया और उसे एक कसरत मशीन मिली।
mt: He went to the gym and found a workout machine.
ref: He went into the gym and found a workout machine.

src: लेकिन सूरज उगने लगा।
mt: But the sun is rising.
ref: But the sun began to rise.

src: वह अपनी बाइक पेपर पकड़ाते चलाती थी।
mt: She was riding her bike with a paper in her hand.
ref: She rode her bike passing out papers.

src: अब उनके पास चर्चा के लिए कुछ नहीं था।
mt: Now they had nothing to talk about.
ref: Now they were out of thing to discuss.

src: वह समझ नहीं पा रहा था कि इसमें गड़बड़ क्या है।
mt: He couldn't figure out what was wrong with it.
ref: He could not figure out what was wrong with it.

src: क्या करना है इसके बारे में सोचने के बाद मैंने एक ईमेल भेजने का फैसला किया।
mt: After thinking about what to do, I decided to send an email.
ref: After thinking about what to do I decided to send an email.

src: उसका दोस्त केविन भी पार्क में था।
mt: His friend Kevin was also at the park.
ref: Her friend Kevin was also at the park.

src: नाश्ते के दौरान ग्लेन के पेट में मरोड़ होने लगती है।
mt: Glen's stomach starts to cramp during breakfast.
ref: During breakfast Glenn stomach starts to cramp.

src: काम थका देने वाला था।
mt: It was a tiring job.
ref: The work was tiring.

src: हम अपने समय का सही इस्तेमाल करने के लिए सुबह जल्दी निकल जाते थे।
mt: We used to get up early to make the most of our time.
ref: We would leave early in the morning to make the most of our time.

src: गिल ने उन सभी का मालिक भी था, जिनमें बाद के कई सीज़न भी शामिल थे।
mt: Gil owned all of those teams, including later seasons.
ref: Gill even owned all of them, including the many later seasons.

src: उनके पास सभी स्ट्राइक थे और केवल दो और की जरूरत थी।
mt: They had all the strikes and only needed two more.
ref: He had all strikes and only needed two more.

src: वहदरवाजा तोड़ कर अंदर आ गया और कुछ क्षणों में उनके ऊपर था।
mt: He broke the door and entered, and in a few moments he was on top of them.
ref: He burst through the door and was atop them in moments.

src: फिर यह बहुत बढ़ गया और पीड़ादायक हो गया।
mt: It then got worse and painful.
ref: Then it swelled up terribly and became sore.

src: हालांकि एक सप्ताह वह बहुत बीमार हो गई।
mt: However, she was very ill for a week.
ref: However one week she got very sick.

src: जॉन ने जेसिका को उसके साथ डेट पर जाने के लिए कहा।
mt: John asked Jessica to go out with him.
ref: John asked Jessica to go out with him on a date.

src: यह आदमी धूल झाड़ता है।
mt: This man is dusting.
ref: This man wipes away the dust.

src: लाइन कम होने पर दोनों सामने आ गए।
mt: 2 lines collided when one line was short.
ref: When the line was shorter the two got to the front.
